description.hltext_display: Montag shows off surgery scars
PSE starts $75M new powerhouse
73.684 y 75.869, primeros quintos
description.author: EL PAÍS
description.content:
El 75.869 ha inaugurado los premios del sorteo de Navidad. A las 9.34 las niñas de San Ildefonso han cantado el primer premio del día y que ha correspondido a un quinto premio, con 50.000 euros a la serie. El décimo se ha vendido, entre otros lugares, en Tarragona, Valladolid y Pontevedra.
El sorteo arrancó a las 9.19. con la novedad de un cambio de escenario. Desde hace 47 años los que los niños de San Ildefonso cantaban los números desde el Salón de Sorteos de Guzmán el Bueno, en Madrid, hoy lo hacen en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, lugar en el que repartirá 2.320.500.000 euros en premios.
A las 8.00 se abrieron las puertas para dejar pasar a un público siempre entregado, que este año es más numeroso: 1.909 personas están viendo en directo el sorteo. Uno de los motivos que provocó al cambio de sede: "Últimamente había ya muchos problemas de espacio, debido a la gran cantidad de público que asiste al sorteo y al gran número de periodistas acreditados", señalaba ayer el director de Gestión y Producción de Loterías del Estado, Eduardo Ovies. La gente ha esperado largas colas para entrar en el salón, donde muchas personas han acudido disfrazadas o con prendas típicas de Navidad.
Ayer se completó en el remozado salón toda la parafernalia propia del sorteo y los empleados de (LAE) procedieron a colgar los números (desde el 00.000 hasta el 84.999) en un total de 170 liras (expositores verticales en los que se ordenan las bolas para facilitar su comprobación). Las liras cuelgan, a su vez, de los "paraguas", dispositivos desde los que se van a volcar hoy las bolas a la tolva, una especie de embudo transparente que se utiliza para introducir las bolas en los bombos. El público presente en la sala han podido comprobar esta mañana que la bolita con el número que juega está entre las 85.000 que se han volcado en el bombo.
Formas de seguir el sorteo
Para el resto de personas que han comprado lotería este año, que no vivan en Madrid o que aún no estén de vacaciones navideñas, lo pueden o comprobar en tiempo real en los números premiados a través de un buscador. Además de la posibilidad de poder consultar si su número ha sido uno de los afortunados a través del móvil, el iPhone o el iPad, o colocando en su blog o página web el widget.
Entre las novedades del sorteo de este año destacan, además del cambio de sede, el décimo electrónico, con el que espera recaudar 40 millones de euros, y la posibilidad de cobrar los premios superiores a 3.000 euros a partir del día siguiente al sorteo (hasta ahora había que esperar al menos nueve días).
Las cifras más significativas del sorteo de Navidad son idénticas a las del pasado año: 195 series, cada una de ella con 85.000 billetes; el precio de cada billete es de 200 euros, dividido en décimos de 20 euros. Los premios también se mantendrán igual que en anteriores ediciones, con El Gordo de tres millones a la serie y un segundo y tercer premio de un millón y 500.000 euros a la serie respectivamente. Además, habrá dos cuartos premios de 200.000 euros a la serie y ocho quintos premios de 50.000 euros a la serie.
Aunque irán cayendo premios a lo largo de las tres horas y media que dura el sorteo, sin duda alguna, y como cada año, la estrella de la jornada será el Gordo de Navidad, el premio más deseado. Si nos remontamos al pasado, quizá se sientan un poco más esperanzados aquellos que tengan en sus manos un décimo que termine en cinco, la terminación que más ha caído en El Gordo a lo largo de toda la historia del Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad de la Lotería Nacional, ya que ha resultado premiado en 32 ocasiones.
10 euros más en el gasto de la lotería
Hace una semana, el director general de (LAE), Gonzalo Fernández, auspiciaba un tibio repunte en la venta de décimos para el sorteo de Navidad. "Los datos que tenemos, que aún no son concluyentes, muestran un ligero incremento respecto al año anterior", ha afirmado Fernández. Para apuntalar este avance, LAE ha informado de otro repunte considerable en el gasto medio por habitante: de 58,55 euros a 68,68.
A mediodía, se sabrá si el sorteo navideño retoma el vuelo en esta edición tras dos años de caídas: en 2009 la recaudación (2.703 millones de euros) bajó un 3% respecto a 2008 (2.786 millones); ese año, los ingresos de LAE descendieron un 2,88% con relación a 2007 (2.867 millones). Que suba el gasto medio por habitante no significa que la recaudación deba subir también. De hecho, el director comercial de LAE, Juan Gallardo, reconoció esta semana que "quizá" el nivel de ventas se sitúe "entre el 1% y el 3% menos".
Lo de que el español gasta más en décimos no lo comparten todos. "Las ventas se han reducido: el cliente habitual que cogía la serie entera ahora no compra más de seis décimos", opone Lucas Montañés, lotero situado en la madrileña Puerta del Sol.Inaugura el sorteo de Navidad, a las 9.34, y da 50.000 euros a la serie.- Por primera vez en 47 años el Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad se celebra en el Palacio de los Congresos de Madrid.- Los españoles han gastado 10 euros más de media para intentar ganar El Gordo

description.hltext_display: Los embalses del Guadiana almacenan casi un 55% más de agua que hace un año
description.content:
La reserva hidráulica de los pantanos españoles está al 72,3% de su capacidad
(0 votos)
Isabel Barrena
Los pantanos ubicados en la cuenca del río Guadiana, a su paso por Extremadura y Castilla-La Mancha están actualmente al 84,3% de su capacidad total. Almacenan 7.277 hectómetros cúbicos de agua, un 54,9% más que hace un año y un 31,86% más que la media registrada en los últimos diez años.
Por su parte, los embalses de la cuenca del río Tajo están al 62% de su capacidad. Contienen 6.825 hectómetros cúbicos de agua, un 42,8% más que en el mismo periodo del año anterior y un 20,6% más que la media registrada en la última década.
Los embalses españoles almacenan esta semana 40.187 hectómetros cúbicos de líquido, un 0,1% menos que la semana anterior situándose al 72,3% de su capacidad total.

description.hltext_display: 水皮：年末不会出现大涨行情 目前不适宜短线操作
description.content:
辑水皮（资料图）
据中国之声《新闻晚高峰》报道，加息的靴子迟迟不落、流动性收紧的信号越来越强，再遇上“让炮弹飞”的朝韩，近期中国A股跌跌不休，沪深两市一度出现了五连阴。
然而昨日的A股强劲反弹51点终于让市场为之一振，在地产股、农林牧渔股的有力拉升下， 投资者对后市的乐观情绪高涨，有调查显示，大约60%的股民都认为年底会出现新一轮的反弹行情。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
大势之下，投资者如何把握最后的机会？记者对话《华夏时报》总编辑、财经评论家水皮。
记者：A股在五连阴之后，周一终于见红了。剩下不到10天的时间，可能很多投资者还在期望出现一轮反弹的行情，您觉得这个可能性有多大？
水皮：年末这么一个时间，即便反弹这个高度也是有限的，每天在涨个几十个点也就三千点不到，也就2900点左右这个位置上。今后几天可能会相对平静，小步的上行，我觉得不会出现一个大涨的行情。
记者：今年总的来说可以说是一个振荡的格局，在现在的走势下，是不是短线的操作更适宜？投资者在操作策略上应该如何调整？
水皮：短线上面并不合适。昨天那两种性质可能就有一个追涨杀跌的过程，等大家都跌下来再走的话，就没必要了。现在这个市场的操作恐怕还是着眼明年的过程，相对来讲中长线布局的过程。虽然年内不会有什么大行情，但是不排除明年第一季度、第二季度可能会有一个比较明朗的向上突破的过程。
记者：在最近一轮的跌市中还是有不少表现抢眼的个股的，航天军工、农业牧渔板块，作为投资者，要怎样把握这样的捕捉个股的机会？
水皮：市场上从来都是两种投资方式：一是潜伏型，看估值低估的；另外一种找交易型，看跟哪些概念相契合。比如军工，恐怕跟最近朝鲜半岛局势有关，也许是半天行情或者一天行情，事实上并没有向失控的局面发展，所以拿军工做文章可能持续性又不强了。关键是这些交易性机会，一是看价格，二是看调整的时间和长度，一般来讲概念股会频频受到大家炒作，就看你拿的点位是不是合理，没有必要追涨杀跌。

description.hltext_display: Wasting customers time
description.content: For the past week, ADT have sent me the same sms every day, warning me that storms cause false alarm activations. Yesterday I called ADT and asked them to stop sending these smses. I was assured that it would not happen again. Today, I received another sms warning me that storms cause false activations. What will it take to get ADT to stop wasting my time with these messages? Should I start pushing the panic button every time I receive one of these messages? If these messages continue, that is what I intend to do.

description.hltext_display: 移动互联网+智能终端助力无线发展
description.content:
2010年12月22日 作者： 转载出处：通信世界网 推荐人：avene 我要爆料
无线互联网正悄然改变生活
目前移动互联网的高速增长，智能终端的快速递增，以及移动终端操作系统的繁荣丰富，都促使手机上的应用更为丰富和多元化。以往只能在计算机上实现的应用，目前在手机上也都可以实现：以前人们用电脑看新闻，现在人们用手机看新闻;以前人们用电脑写博客，现在人们用手机上微博……手机已经开始改变用户的使用习惯，也让用户的无线生活越来越精彩和快意。
手机病毒袭来危害甚于PC病毒，大众认知不足
我们在享受日趋精彩的无线生活时，也不能忽视繁荣背后的潜伏危机。9月初爆发的手机“僵尸”病毒在短短一周内感染了全国近一百万部手机，每天损失话费约200万元。而且手机病毒及恶意软件也进入蓬勃发展期，现在国内被截获的手机病毒及恶意软件总数超过1600个，每天新增2-4种恶意软件，且呈加速增长的趋势;预计到2010年底，手机病毒及恶意软件数将到达2200个左右。
与目前用户对计算机安全认知程度非常高的情况不同的是，目前用户对手机安全的认知还很“初级”，很多用户并没有意识到手机也会存在安全问题，而主动给自己的手机装杀毒软件的用户更是少之又少。其实手机安全的隐患远远大于计算机安全。手机与电脑不同，手机上储存着更多的用户个人信息和隐私，而手机病毒可以直接盗取通讯录和通话记录甚至短信彩信。对个人隐藏安全造成极大威胁。而且手机病毒的扩散路径是沿着用户手机通讯录内的记录进行传播，某些病毒可以在用户不知情的情况下向通讯录内的联系人自动发送短信、彩信发送病毒。最后某些病毒通过一些方法直接盗取用户的通信费，造成直接经济损失。
现在的病毒伪装很高明，他们并不像最初级的病毒一样会导致手机死机而是在不影响用户使用的前提下，在用户不知情的情况下向外发送短信或者彩信，有些会盗取用户的通信录。这些病毒用户很难发现，但对造成的影响却比普通的病毒更大。最可怕的是目前很多病毒软件都是被预装在手机内的特别是现在失眠上流行的山寨机，有些甚至无法删除。
手机安全需要多方共同努力
首先不论是运营商、手机生产厂商、销售商、安全软件供应商都应共同加强手机且安全宣传提升大众对于手机安全的重视。其次应该加大安全软件的预装量，防范于未然。第三应该选择更加专业的安全软件，手机病毒与PC病毒具有较大区别需要长期的病毒库积累，且由于不同操作系统的终端其病毒特点也有所区别因此需要针对不同操作系统开发不同的安全软件以及针对性的病毒库，传统权威的PC安全软件并不一定是最专业的手机安全软件。最后作为普通的消费者应该加强手机安全意识，在购买手机的时候尽量选择更加安全的手机，在遇到手机安全问题时及时向专业机构寻求帮助。
手机安全亟待立法
目前国内仍没有明确的关于手机安全的法律法规，对制造和传播手机病毒的单位个人没有明确的惩罚规定。需要国家尽快立法，保护公众手机通信安全。

description.hltext_display: Siverek Sağlıkta Atağa Kalkıyor
description.content: Şanlıurfa İl Sağlık Müdürü Hasan Demir Siverek?te acil sağlık yatırımları konusunda ilçe Kaymakamı Mahmut Hersanlıoğlu ile görüştü. Şanlıurfa?nın Siverek ilçesinde bir türlü çözüme kavuşturulamayan sağlık sorunları konusunda önemli bir adım atıldı. Şanlıurfa İl Sağlık Müdürü Hasan Demir, Siverek Kaymakamı Mahmut Hersanlıoğlu?nun makamında ziyaret ederek, ilçede acil olarak yapılması gereken sağlık sorunlarını görüştü. Onarımları yapılan Karacadağ, Karabahçe, Karakeçi köylerindeki sağlık ocaklarını yerinde incelediğini belirten Demir, ?Gürakar Beldesinin uzun zamandır beklediği sağlık ocağının ihalesini yaptık. Sayın kaymakamımız Mahmut Hersanlıoğlu ile ilçede acil sağlık yatırımlarını konuştuk? dedi. İlçe Kaymakamı Mahmut Hersanlıoğlu ise adı geçen çalışmaların dışında ilçede Ağız ve Diş Sağlığı Ünitesi ile birlikte aile hekimliği çalışmaları ve devlet hastanesinde yapılacak çalışmalar hakkında il sağlık müdürü ile görüşmeler yaptığını söyledi. Hersanlıoğlu, ?İlçemizde yapılması planlanan çalışmalardan dolayı İl Sağlık Müdürümüze teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum? dedi.(UrfaHA)

description.hltext_display: Liga Darío de León premia a los más destacados torneo béisbol
description.content:
Ayuda. Contó con el respaldo del ministro Felipe Payano
La Liga Darío de León premió a los equipos campeones y atletas más destacados de su XVI Torneo de Béisbol Navideño, dedicado a Jesucristo, en el play ubicado detrás del paredón verde del estadio Quisqueya.
“Misión cumplida”, exclamó el dirigente Darío de León durante la fiesta de premiación en el club deportivo Los Cachorros.
Agregó que los directivos fue un gran honor poder celebrar el evento, ya que el mismo se enmarca dentro del aniversario número 16 de la entidad.
“Queremos agradecer el respaldo una vez más del Ministro de Deportes, Felipe -Jay- Payano, ya que sin su ayuda habría sido imposible la celebración del torneo”, señaló de León.
La categoría (7-8) fue ganada por la Liga Guillén al vencer 6-5 a Darío de León. Darío de León se alzó con la 9-10 al derrotar 3-2 a Toribio. En 11-12, Obras Público venció 4-2 a Fermín Ventura; Darío de León también ganó en 13-14 años al disponer 10 por 1 de Fermín Ventura y Araujo lo hizo en 15-16 al vencer a Guillé, 4-3.

description.hltext_display: ألمانيا: أعياد الميلاد ورأس السنة هي الأفضل لبناء العلاقات العاطفية
description.author: admin
description.content: كشفت أحدث الإحصائيات في ألمانيا أن فترة أعياد الميلاد (الكريسماس) ورأس السنة الميلادية تعد بالنسبة للألمان أفضل أيام السنة لبناء العلاقات العاطفية، وبالتالي، تستحق لقب «موسم الحب». وكالة الأنباء الألمانية (د.ب.أ) نقلت أمس أرقام الإحصائية التي خلص إليها المعهد الاتحادي لأبحاث السكان، ومقره مدينة فيسبادن عاصمة ولاية هيسه بغرب البلاد، وجاء فيها أن شهر سبتمبر (أيلول) الذي يأتي بعد تسعة أشهر من فترة الميلاد ورأس السنة، سجل على مدار سنوات أعلى معدل شهري للمواليد في ألمانيا بلغ 9%. وتابع المعهد، الذي استند في إحصائياته على بيانات المواليد خلال الفترة بين عامي 2000 حتى 2009، أنه في حال توزيع معدلات المواليد السنوية بالتساوي على كل شهر في العام ستكون النسبة 8.3% شهريا. وأشارت تحليلات المعهد التي أجريت على أعداد المواليد خلال السنوات الأربعين الماضية إلى وجود زيادة نسبية في أعداد المواليد خلال شهر سبتمبر تحديدا. وفي المقابل، أظهرت الإحصائيات أن أدنى نسبة شهرية كانت من نصيب شهري نوفمبر (تشرين الثاني) وديسمبر (كانون الأول). كذلك أوضحت أرقام المعهد، بشكل عام، أن إجمالي أعداد المواليد في أشهر الصيف من العام يفوق أعدادهم في أشهر الشتاء منه، وهي الظاهرة التي تجلت خلال العقود الأربعة الماضية. وفي المقابل، كانت أعداد المواليد خلال أشهر الشتاء، قبل هذه الفترة، أكثر منها خلال أشهر الصيف.

description.hltext_display: Eminem tops 2010 Music Moments poll
2011 Chevrolet Cruze Earns IIHS TOP SAFETY PICK
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE General Motors
New model gets highest possible ratings in all Insurance Institute safety tests
DETROIT, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- The 2011 Chevrolet Cruze received the highest possible ratings of "Good" in front, side, rear and rollover crash protection tests by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety, which recognized Cruze as a 2011 Top Safety Pick.
"The new Cruze was clearly engineered from the ground up to meet the highest standards in safety performance," said IIHS President Adrian Lund. "The Top Safety Pick award means that buyers of the Cruze will know they're getting state-of-the-art protection in the most common kinds of crashes."
The 2011 Cruze offers more standard safety features than any vehicle in its class and represents Chevrolet's commitment to continuous safety – before, during and after a crash. Standard features include StabiliTrak Electronic Stability Control with Traction Control, anti-lock brakes, Panic Brake Assist and Enhanced Smart Pedal/Brake Override.
The Cruze is the first car in its class with 10 standard air bags, including dual-stage frontal air bags, seat-mounted side-impact air bags and head curtain side air bags in the front and outboard rear seating positions and front knee air bags – a first for the segment. OnStar's standard safety and security package is included.
"The IIHS Top Safety Pick Award builds on the already strong global safety reputation of the Cruze," said Chris Perry, vice president of Chevrolet Marketing. "Cruze delivers the level of comfort, quality and safety that customers expect in larger, more upscale vehicles with the fuel economy of a compact."
Cruze continues to be a strong contributor to Chevrolet's sales momentum, helping the brand increase retail sales by 13 percent in November. The new Cruze Eco arrives in showrooms in January with segment-leading fuel economy, beating its non-hybrid competitors. Cruze Eco delivers an EPA-estimated 42 mpg on the highway, and 28 mpg city fuel economy. The model will carry a suggested retail price of $18,895.
About Chevrolet
Founded in Detroit in 1911, Chevrolet celebrates its centennial in 2011 as a global automotive brand with annual sales of about 3.5 million vehicles in more than 130 countries. In the U.S., the Chevrolet portfolio includes: iconic performance cars, such as Corvette and Camaro; dependable, long lasting pickups and SUVs, such as Silverado and Suburban; and award-winning passenger cars and crossovers, such as Malibu, Equinox and Traverse. Chevrolet also offers "gas-friendly" solutions, such as Chevrolet Cruze Eco with an EPA-estimated 42 miles per gallon highway, and the Chevrolet Volt offering 35 miles of electric driving and an additional 344 miles of extended gasoline range, according to EPA estimates. Most new Chevrolet models offer OnStar safety, security, and convenience technologies including OnStar Hands-Free Calling, Automatic Crash Response, and Stolen Vehicle Slowdown. More information regarding Chevrolet models, fuel solutions, and OnStar availability can be found at www.chevrolet.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

SUV市场近两年来增长态势强劲，除了操控感和视野带来的享受，追求个性、时尚也是主要趋势。20
通用汽车高层看好中国产雪佛兰赛欧的发展前景，并预测该车型2011年出口量将增持3倍以上。
雪佛兰 赛欧
据了解，上海通用所生产的雪佛兰赛欧车型主要出口到智利等国家，2010年1-10月该车型总计出口了5000多辆。
“明年赛欧车型的出口数量将增长好几倍。;上海通用汽车副总经理蒋泰瑞(Terry Johnsson)表示，“最少将达到1万辆，有可能超过2万辆。;
据悉，新赛欧是通用在今年初上市发布的。通用表示，最新发布的数据显示，在今年1-9月，这款车已经累计出售了90000辆，成为该门类下最为畅销的车型。

description.hltext_display: DGAP-News: Softing AG: Neuer Großauftrag von Premium-Automobilkonzern
description.author: feed_dgap_corporate
description.content:
DGAP-News: Softing AG / Schlagwort(e): Umsatzentwicklung/Prognose Softing AG: Neuer Großauftrag von Premium-Automobilkonzern
22.12.2010 / 09:43 Softing AG: Neuer Großauftrag von Premium-Automobilkonzern 22.12.2010 Die Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH, eine 100%-Tochter der Softing AG, hat zusätzlich zu den bereits ad hoc gemeldeten Neugeschäften einen weiteren Großauftrag eines namhaften deutschen Pkw-Herstellers erhalten. Damit ist Softing innerhalb kurzer Zeit der Zugang zu einem weiteren Hersteller der Premium-Klasse gelungen. Der langfristige Auftrag zur Weiterentwicklung und Lieferung von Diagnose- und Messtechnik wird sich ab dem Geschäftsjahr 2011 in den Umsatz- und Gewinnzahlen des Softing-Konzerns niederschlagen. Das hieraus resultierende Auftragsvolumen wird in den nächsten Jahren durch Projektleistungen und Produktlieferungen einige Mio. EUR betragen.
Der Vorstandsvorsitzende Dr. Wolfgang Trier sieht in dem neuen Großauftrag eine Bestätigung der jüngsten Vertriebsoffensive und eine Signalwirkung für die Branche: 'Dieser Auftrag ist ein weiterer wichtiger Meilenstein in der Historie der Softing Automotive Electronics und bestätigt unsere starke Position im Bereich der Diagnose- und Messtechnik. Wir konnten einen bedeutenden Referenzkunden im Premium-Sektor mit einem langfristigen Exklusivvertrag für uns gewinnen. Daraus ergeben sich große Chancen auf Folgeaufträge und eine Fortsetzung der dynamischen Umsatz- und Ergebnisentwicklung in den kommenden Jahren.'
Über Softing: Softing ist eine weltweit agierende Management Holding. Die Gesellschaften erstellen und vertreiben Hard- und Software für die Industrielle Automatisierung sowie für die Fahrzeugelektronik. In enger Kundenbeziehung werden technologisch hochwertige Standardprodukte sowie individuelle Lösungen realisiert. Die Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH ist ein Spezialist für die Kommunikation mit Steuergeräten bei der Fahrzeugentwicklung, der Fahrzeugproduktion sowie in der Fahrzeugdiagnose. Die Hauptkunden der Softing Automotive Electronics sind die großen Fahrzeughersteller und deren Zulieferer.
Ende der Corporate News 22.12.2010 Veröffentlichung einer Corporate News/Finanznachricht, übermittelt durch die DGAP - ein Unternehmen der EquityStory AG. Für den Inhalt der Mitteilung ist der Emittent / Herausgeber verantwortlich.Die DGAP Distributionsservices umfassen gesetzliche Meldepflichten, Corporate News/Finanznachrichten und Pressemitteilungen. description.hltext_display: OUR VIEW: County government needs gift and gratuity policy
description.content:
Much of good local government is about conducting business out in the open, where the public and media can watch and report.
Indiana law is clear as to what's acceptable in regards to where business is conducted, but a large, gray area shrouds the dealings of government officials away from the meeting room, and away from public scrutiny. But local government can right that wrong -- and sometimes, it has.
In a step forward for transparency, the Muncie Sanitary District board adopted a policy this year prohibiting employees from receiving gifts and gratuities in excess of $50 in value in any personal or professional capacity.
Of special note are the words "that could even create the impression that the giver was seeking favor or trying to influence an opinion or judgment from the employee or official."
MSD should be applauded for adopting a policy that appears to be strict.
It seems strange that, with more than 500 full-time people working in Delaware County government, there isn't a similar policy that prohibits gifts and gratuities. Human resources director Amy Hall said this week that it's never been an issue.
That could be true now, but what about in the future?
County government deals with hundreds of vendors, and there are probably hundreds more who would like to receive taxpayer funds in exchange for providing goods or services. There is always the potential for someone to try to gain an edge with free tickets or a couple of lunches and dinners. And it would all be above board.
We take no issue with a box of candy or a calendar. But should an elected official be treated to dinner -- a line has been crossed.
When an elected official meets face-to-face with a potential business contact over dinner, that's gaining a level of access not afforded by the general public. That's wrong. Even if such a relationship is just for friendly purposes, it gives an appearance to the contrary.
Commissioner Larry Bledsoe stated in an article that a limit on gifts "would be a good idea."
We think so, too.
Local government needs to be transparent in its dealings with outside interests.
At the state and national level, the public takes a dim view of lobbying activities. There really is no difference if this activity occurs at the local level, as well. It can all be repugnant.
Last legislative session, Indiana lawmakers voted to tighten reporting requirements and lobbying rules.
At the bare minimum, gifts should be limited to $50, and disclosure reports should be issued periodically so everyone can see what's going on with elected officials beyond the government meeting rooms.
Most of our elected officials are above reproach, but a policy would not hurt.
Would a gift and gratuity policy result in better government? Would it make a difference?
The answer to each is yes.
County officials should begin the process of drafting a policy so that 2010 is the final year Delaware County goes without a policy.

event_or_fact.property: in an article that a limit on gifts "would be a good idea.

description.hltext_display: 困った時の有名人頼み！ 大みそか「Dynamite!!」に元横浜ベイスターズ・古木克明投入！
description.content: -PR- TBS系列で放送される、大みそか恒例の格闘技イベント「Dynamite!!」(さいたまスーパーアリーナ＝FEG主催)で、プロ野球横浜ベイスターズ、オリックス・バファローズでプレーした古木克明(30)がデビュー戦を行なうことが決定した。対戦相手はタレントのボビー・オロゴンの弟、アンディ・オロゴンで、総合のDREAMルールで相まみえる。 古木は98年のドラフト1位で横浜に入団。03年にはレギュラーを獲得し、22本塁打をマークする長打力を発揮したが、その後低迷。07年オフにオリックスにトレードされたが、結果が出せず、09年オフに自由契約。合同トライアウトを受けたものの、獲得する球団は現れず引退。同年12月に格闘家転向を決意し、新興団体のSMASHに入団。1年間のトレーニングを経てのデビュー戦となる。 実力未知数のルーキーの大舞台への抜てきに不安も覗くが、背景には有名人の起用での視聴率稼ぎの思惑が見え隠れする。 ベテランのスポーツライターのA氏は、「今年は青木真也対長島☆自演乙☆雄一郎など、格闘技ファンをうならせる好カードが多いです。しかし、『Dynamite!!」』は視聴率を取ることが至上命題です。昨年は魔裟斗の引退試合、石井慧の国内デビュー戦や山本“KID”徳郁の参戦も?って、話題性が?りました。今年はそういったものがないですね。格闘技ファンではない人にも見てもらわないと、大みそかはダメなんです。そのための古木起用でしょう。“元プロ野球選手の格闘技デビュー戦”という冠がつけば、それなりに注目は集めますから。『Dynamite!!』の定番です」と語る。 これまでも、ボビー、DJ OZMA、俳優の金子賢らを投入してきた「Dynamite!!」。視聴率獲得要員となった感が?る古木。リング上のファイト内容で、世間の色メガネをはずさせてほしいものだ。(ジャーナリスト/落合一郎)

* 完成580万套保障住房用地供应
* 房地产业不应成为重要经济支柱产业
路透北京12月22日电---中国国土资源部称,至今年11月底,全国房地产用地供应总量创新高达12.82万公顷,其中保障性住房用地供应1.34万公顷,确保了国务院下达的580万套保障性安居工程建设用地供应.
中国藉由行政力量主导更多的保障性住房建设,已为落实房地产调控的重要举措之一.
国土部数字数据显示,今年前11个月房地产用地供应同比增长47.8%,� 土地供应总量的36%;住宅用地供应9.56万公顷,同比增� 50.6%,� 房地产用地供应总量约75%;保障性住房用地供应同比增� 43.5%,� 住宅用地比例达14.01%.国土部并援引该部有关司局负责人称,11月高地价再次出现总体上仍属个别现象,多集中在部分重点城市的个别优质地块,尚未形成群发效应.
该负责人并称,国土部稍早出台的落实调控政策的通知,旨在"继续� 抓宏观调控不放松,进一步巩固调控已有成果".
国土部周日称,近期少数城市部分优质地块出让溢价率偏高,地方国土资源主管部门要坚决抑制地价过快上涨,并落实房地产用地调控政策.中国指数� �究院公布数据显示,上周(12月13-19日)全国单价"地王"频现,并刺激土地价� �进一步走高;同期主要城市住宅用地放量入市,成交量创周度新高.
待续

description.hltext_display: Palestine - Israel: Đấu pháo, không kích dữ dội
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Bờ Tây, các cuộc đàm phán, cuộc tấn công, cuộc không kích, vụ tấn công, Quân đội Israel, dữ dội, hôm qua, cho hay, nhằm vào, đáp trả, tiến hành, Palestine, Gaza, người
Israel hôm qua đã tiến hành một loạt các cuộc không kích dữ dội bất thường nhằm vào Gaza nhằm đáp trả các cuộc tấn công bằng rocket của Palestine, làm tăng nguy cơ về một đợt giao chiến đẫm máu mới sau 2 năm khá yêu ắng.
Một địa điểm ở Gaza bị Israel không kích ngày 21/12.
Quân đội cho biết các cuộc tấn công của Israel nhằm trúng 7 mục tiêu khác nhau ở Gaza. Giới chức Palestine cho hay 8 chiến binh bị thương. Sau đó, người Palestine đã bắn một quả rocket khác vào miền nam Israel, làm một bé gái 16 tuổi bị thương nhẹ.
Vụ việc nổ ra sau cái chết của 5 chiến binh Gaza vào hôm thứ bảy vừa qua, trong một vụ tấn công đẫm máu nhất của Israel nhằm vào dải ven biển này suốt nhiều tháng, cho thấy căng thẳng có nguy cơ leo thang. 2 năm trước đây, những đợt rocket không ngừng được bắn từ Gaza đã khiến Israel tiến hành một cuộc xâm chiến đáp trả kéo dài 3 tuần, làm hơn 1.400 người Palestine thiệt mạng, trong đó có rất nhiều dân thường.
Trong một dấu hiệu căng thẳng gia tăng khác, người đứng đầu quân đội Israel, Trung tướng Gabi Ashkenazi cho hay các cuộc tấn công ngày hôm qua là cuộc tấn công đầu tiên nhằm vào nhóm Hamas đang nắm quyền tại Gaza kể từ cuộc tiến quân 2 năm trước của họ. Quân đội Israel cũng nhấn mạnh các cuộc tấn công là nhằm đáp trả vụ nã 13 quả rocket và pháo cối vào Israel trong vòng một tuần qua.
Xuất hiện trước Ủy ban đối ngoại và quốc phòng của quốc hội, ông Ashkenazi miêu tả tình hình là rất “mong manh và dễ bùng phát”.
Cho tới gần đây các cuộc tấn công của chiến binh Gaza đã giảm khá nhiều kể từ cuộc tiến quân của Israel cuối năm 2008.
Mặc dù Hamas, nhóm đang nắm quyền ở Gaza, đã giới hạn các vụ tấn công vào Israel kể từ đó, nhưng Israel cho rằng nhóm này phải chịu trách nhiệm cho tất cả các cuộc tấn công vào đất nước họ. Một số các nhóm chiến binh nhỏ hơn khác vẫn tiến hành bắn rocket và pháo cối.
Quân đội Israel cho hay các cuộc không kích hôm qua đã nhằm vào một nhà máy vũ khí và các đường hầm buôn lậu mà Isreal cho rằng được thiết kế để cho phép chiến binh thâm nhập vào Israel.
Trong khi đó, phía Palestine cho biết một trong những địa điểm bị tấn công là một nhà máy sữa của chính quyền.
Các vụ tấn công trên đã làm gia tăng căng thẳng trong khu vực chưa thoát khỏi bế tắc này. Không giống như Hamas, chính quyền Palestine được phương Tây ủng hộ ở Bờ Tây ủng hộ các cuộc đàm phán hòa bình với Israel. Song các cuộc đàm phán do Mỹ làm trung gian đã không giải quyết được vấn đề xây dựng khu định cư của Israel tại Bờ Tây.
Trong khi các cuộc đàm phán vẫn còn đang giậm chân tại chỗ, người Palestine đã phát động một chiến dịch vận động quốc tế công nhận một nhà nước Palestine mà không cần một thỏa thuận hòa bình với Israel.
Bộ ngoại giao Israel hôm qua cho hay họ sẽ tích cực chiến đấu chống lại ý tưởng của Palestine. Người phát ngôn Yigal Palmor cho biết Israel tin tưởng các cuộc đàm phán hòa bình là cách thức tiến lên duy nhất.
Trong một động thái nữa chứng tỏ căng thẳng đang gia tăng, Israel hôm qua đã phê chuẩn kế hoạch trị giá nhiều triệu đô la nhằm nâng cấp Herodian, một địa điểm lịch sử lớn ở Bờ Tây, khiến người Palestine phản đối kịch liệt.
Herodian là cung điện mùa đông của Vua Herod, người trị vì Vùng đất Thiêng từ năm 37-4 trước Công nguyên. Israel cho hay sẽ đầu tư khoảng 4,5 triệu USD để sửa chữa địa điểm bởi nơi đây có mối liên hệ với di sản của người Do thái. Herod đã mở rộng Đền Do thái thứ hai ở Jerusalem.
Người phát ngôn của chính quyền Palestine Ghassan Khatib cho hay các địa điểm ở Bờ Tây là di sản của người Palestine, chứ không phải Israel và các hành động như trên đã khoét sâu thêm căng thẳng.
Hồi tháng 2 đầu năm, Israel đã gộp một số địa điểm ở Bờ Tây, bao gồm cả Herodian, vào danh sách những di sản quốc gia. Palestine phản đối và Mỹ gọi danh sách là “khiêu khích”.
Việt Báo (Theo Dân trí)
Tìm hiểu: Bờ Tây, các cuộc đàm phán, cuộc tấn công, cuộc không kích, vụ tấn công, Quân đội Israel, dữ dội, hôm qua, cho hay, nhằm vào, đáp trả, tiến hành, Palestine, Gaza, người

description.hltext_display: India’s Congress on a Sticky Wicket
description.content:
BY KULDIP NAYAR WHEN the efficacy of the parliamentary system is doubted in a democratic polity, the finger may well be pointed at governance. The rulers make a mess of things and blame the system. This is what has been happening in India which, otherwise, remains an open society.
Prime Minister, Dr Manmohan Singhs remark that he is worried over the future of parliamentary system in the country is misplaced and speaks more of his governments failure than the system. No doubt, the winter session of Parliament has been a washout and both the houses were stalled for 21 days (224 hours and 40 minutes), a record of sorts in Indias parliamentary history. Yet the problem is not the failure of the system. Both the ruling Congress and the Opposition could not agree upon a mechanism to probe into the 2G spectrum concerning mobile telephones. (The scam runs into an abnormal figure of ` 175-lakh crore, $12 billion). Pot Calling Kettle Black There has naturally been a countrywide debate on corruption. Congress president, Ms Sonia Gandhis attack on the BJP does not absolve the Congress because both the parties are corrupt in the public estimate. One was found guilty when it ruled for six years from 1998 to 2004 and the other since then. The Congress has stuck to its stand that the Public Accounts Committee (PAC), headed by an opposition leader, is the best authority to hold an inquiry. The Opposition which includes the Left has demanded a Joint Parliamentary Committee (JPC) probe. The BJP was first alone but then the governments obduracy led other parties, including the Left, join a common front to have a comprehensive investigation by the JPC. Probably, it would have been better if the PAC had come to be accepted because the JPCs in the past have not done an effective job. But is the inquiry by the JPC such an impossible proposition that the Prime Minister should go to the extent of questioning the parliamentary system? The United Progress Alliance (UPC), headed by the Congress, has a majority in the JPC. But it is a divided house now. The more the Congress opposes the JPC, the firmer becomes the conviction that the party wants to hide something because the JPC is an open-ended inquiry. Worried about Wikileaks The Prime Ministers worry ventilated before the press is not an off-the-cuff remark. He did not say anything for 21 days when the two houses did not transact any business. That he should now doubt the future of the parliamentary system is indeed disconcerting. The standoff in parliament is nothing new. I was in the Rajya Sabha when the Congress had stalled the proceedings for nearly two weeks. Mr Atal Behari Vajpayee, the then Prime Minister, never said that the parliamentary system was in jeopardy. In fact, Dr Manmohan Singhs worry tantamount a threat to the political parties that the parliamentary system could undergo a change if the Congress stance is not accepted. The situation may worsen because Opposition leader, Ms Sushma Swaraj from the BJP has said that the confrontation may spill over to the Budget session. This should be a warning for the ruling party that it has to either break the opposition unity or think of reaching a consensus. Otherwise, the Congress must consider going back to the people to ask for a verdict on its stand. A mid-term poll, when the present Lok Sabha has still another three years to go, is a hard choice to make. Yet there is no option when both sides do not want to resile from their position. There is no other way out in a democratic society. In fact, the Prime Minister should be more concerned what Wikileaks has revealed in the assessment US ambassador, Mr David C Mulford conveyed to the State Department on the 26/11 terrorist attack in Mumbai. He has said that a section of the Congress leadership was seen playing religious politics after one of its leaders, Mr A R Antulay, implied that Hindutva forces may have been involved in the attack. The Congress explanation is that it cannot react until Mr Mulfords cable is authenticated. This is neither here, nor there. Probably, the party felt that way. Unfortunately, the State Department is not willing to either to confirm or deny on Mr Mulfords communication. The suspicion gets strengthened when Congress secretary-general, Mr Digvijay Singh, former Madhya Pradesh chief minister, says a few hours before Mr Mulfords cable became public that police officer Hemant Karkare, who was killed during the 26/11 rang him up (Digivjay Singh) hours before the attack began to say that he (Karkare) had received death threats. The people threatening him, Karkare said, were those opposed to his probe in which Hindu groups were allegedly involved. Mystery deepens when Mumbai Police allege that there was no call made to Mr Divijay Singh according to its records. Mr Digvijay Singh sticks to his statement that he did receive the call. Karkares wife has justifiably criticised Mr Digvijay Singh for politicising the terrorists attack. He has not withdrawn his words and has stuck to the line that Karkare was harassed by the BJP leaders. It is true that the Congress has distanced itself from Mr Digvijay Singhs disclosure. But that is not enough. The Manmohan Singh government must look into Mr Digivjay Singhs charge which is very serious and has wider implications. More so because two years ago, Congress minister, Mr Antulay had said: They (terrorists) had no reason to kill Karkare. Whether he was a victim of terrorism or terrorism plus something, I do not know. Karkare found that there are non-Muslims involved in the act of terrorism in some cases. There is more than what meets the eye. Mr Antulay was a member of Dr Manmohan Singhs cabinet in the first term. He did not question him, nor was there any action taken on his allegation. Mr Antulay was defeated at the polls and hence it cannot be said that he was not included in the new ministry because of his allegation. Still, the charge remains hanging. The BJP is understandably angry. It has attacked Mr Digvijay Singh for helping Pakistan and Ajmal Kasab. The RSS too has made some harsh remarks against Mr Digvijay Singh. Since he continues to stick to his charge, the Congress-led government, for his credibility sake, has to entrust the matter to a Supreme Court judge who should have his own special investigation team as has been done in certain cases of mayhem in Gujarat in 2006. They were closed by Narendra Modis government. The parliamentary system sustains confidence when people know, particularly the minorities, that those who indulge in killings and excesses will not go unpunished. The Prime Ministers worry should be on this point, not on the deadlock in Parliament that a democratic nation can take in its stride.

description.hltext_display: MATRIX NOT WORKING
description.content:
I have had a matrix unit installed because my husband has had such fantastic service from Matrix but my unit has not been working for the last 2 months or so. They asked me to take it in to wynberg and it was there a full day in early november and they said the problem was solved. I took their word for it and as a by the way, decided to test it in December- it wasnt working. They asked me to take it in again and i asked them to send a mobile unit which they did. Teh guy spent a goo damount of time working on it and testing the unit. Now the unit cannot be tracked on their system. I called yesterday and they always keep you on hold for long whil ethey fumble around trying to track the evehicle. Wasting your airtime because they know its not working. Tumi form your customer care guaranteed that she would call or arrange for someone to call by end of day yesterday and this is 3 pm the next day and no news.
I am fed up because i am paying almost 300 rand a month and the unit is not working. I would like unit out of my car and the contract cancelled. I would rather moveto tracker or anyone else.

description.hltext_display: The Bermuda Triangle
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
The "Bermuda Triangle" or "Devil's Triangle" is an imaginary area located off the southeastern Atlantic coast of the United States of America, which is noted for a supposedly high incidence of unexplained disappearances of ships and aircraft. generally believed to be Bermuda; Miami, Florida; and San Juan, Puerto Rico. The US Board of Geographic Names does not recognize the Bermuda Triangle as an official name. The US Navy does not believe the Bermuda Triangle exists. It is reported that Lloyd's of London, the world's leading market for specialist insurance, does not charge higher premiums for vessels transiting this heavily traveled area.
The most famous US Navy losses which have occurred in the area popularly known as the Bermuda Triangle are USS Cyclops in March 1918 and the in December 1945. The ship probably sank in an unexpected storm, and the aircraft ran out of fuel and crashed into the ocean -- no physical traces of them have ever been found. Another well known disappearance is the civilian tanker carrying bulk molten sulfur which sank in February 1963. Although the wreck of Marine Sulphur Queen has not been located, a life preserver and other floating artifacts were recovered. These disappearances have been used to provide credence to the popular belief in the mystery and purported supernatural qualities of the "Bermuda Triangle."
Since the days of early civilization many thousands of ships have sunk and/or disappeared in waters around the world due to navigational and other human errors, storms, piracy, fires, and structural/mechanical failures. Aircraft are subject to the same problems, and many of them have crashed at sea around the globe. Often, there were no living witnesses to the sinking or crash, and hence the exact cause of the loss and the location of the lost ship or aircraft are unknown. A large number of pleasure boats travel the waters between Florida and the Bahamas. All too often, crossings are attempted with too small a boat, insufficient knowledge of the area's hazards, and a lack of good seamanship.

description.hltext_display: 圣诞元旦关注手机安全 专家支招解决三大难题
description.content:
圣诞、元旦双节将至，节日期间，在大家通过手机传递祝福，享受3G时代带来的便捷体验同时，手机安全也正成为用户的关注焦点。网秦手机安全专家指出，每到节日，垃圾短信、骚扰电话数量都会迅增，手机病毒也呈现泛滥势头，年底是手机失窃的高发期，手机防盗问题也成为热点。对此，专家提示用户在手机时，应格外谨防手机安全威胁。
1.垃圾短信迅增 专家支招遏制方法
“每天至少收到6、7条垃圾短信，有房屋租赁的，有婚恋咨询的，还有伪装成好友，骗我给汇款的，真是无奇不有……”。北京的陈女士当前正备受垃圾短信困扰。临近圣诞期间，骚扰问题更加严重，由于号码已使用多年，换号显然并不现实。“现在每天之只能睡前关机，否则经常会在半夜被垃圾短信惊醒”。
据12321网络不良与垃圾信息举报受理中心的数据显示，2010年中国手机用户每周平均收到短信43.4条，其中垃圾短信12.0条。垃圾短信占比27.6%以上，并保持高速增长。
网秦手机安全专家表示，当前，垃圾短信量的激增，让很多手机用户都和陈女士一样，面临着上述困扰，但是对于如何遏制垃圾短信，用户却并没有好的办法。“不过如果您用的是智能手机，那么安装一款专业的通讯管理软件，是一个很有效的办法”。
专家介绍，结合用户饱受垃圾短信、骚扰电话困扰的情况，如网秦通讯管家等专业手机安全软件，具备垃圾短信过滤、分类管理等功能。例如通过自定义来电、来信的黑/白名单，可以从源头掐断骚扰内容的传播渠道。软件便捷的操作体验和管理方式，也很适合陈女士这样的手机用户使用。
2.手机病毒泛滥 盗号窃密实难防范
大学生小赵是手机达人，自从买了新的智能机后，自己就在手机里装了大量的应用程序，从QQ、MSN等聊天软件，到各类手机工具和游戏等。“现在，我的手机就如同一个小电脑了，想做什么，就做什么……”小赵介绍，但是，最近小赵发现，登录手机QQ后，自己的QQ密码被盗了，给女朋友买QQ秀的50Q币也不翼而飞。
“用手机也会被盗号?”小赵疑惑不已。
网秦手机安全专家指出，当前，伴随智能手机应用的丰富，很多病毒作者已将重心转移到移动终端，通过手机病毒实现如盗号、窃取隐私等目的。其中，小赵QQ号码被盗的原因，正是感染了不久前肆虐的“终极密盗”病毒。
专家介绍，当前手机病毒多将自身伪装成手机程序，骗取用户下载安装，其中，“终极密盗”会将自身伪装成诺基亚手机的系统升级程序。并会提示下载更新后能享受到更多、更好的系统服务。但在用户下载此程序后便会立即被其感染。“此病毒会在后台运行，自动监听如手机QQ、MSN、手机银行和炒股软件等账户密码，通过短信的方式直接发给病毒作者，实现其远程盗号的目的。”专家指出。
对此，专家表示，手机病毒是当前的关注热点，据《2010年中国大陆地区手机安全报告》数据显示，据网秦“云安全”数据分析中心统计：截至2010年11月，新增手机病毒1513个，累积病毒数量达2357个。预计2010年手机病毒总数将超过2500种以上，同比增长193%，累计感染手机800万部以上。其中，我国广东地区，以21%的感染比例位居首位，北京，上海，福建、江苏等地位居其后。
从“手机骷髅”到“手机僵尸”，一系列手机病毒也席卷了数以千万的手机用户。扣费、窃取隐私，乃至今年增长迅速的“盗号”病毒，都给用户的手机应用造成了极大威胁。对此，选购手机同时，选择一款专业的手机安全软件，已成为当前用户间的共识。其中，如网秦手机杀毒等专业手机安全软件，通过本地+“云安全”技术引擎，可快速检测手机中存在的安全隐患。
3.手机失窃隐私难回 防盗需求日益凸显
业务员老马每天大部分时间，都在“地下”度过，乘坐地铁穿梭于都市南北，拜访客户和往返于公司。但在前天，他的手机丢了。
“手机里保存了好多电话，都是一些重要客户的，另外，我担心别人会拿我的手机去骗人，比如电视里说过的，用偷到的手机去诈骗等”。老马对此无比担忧。他试图求助中国移动的客服中心，但要求提供SIM密码。“我这个号都用七八年了，密码我也早忘记了”，老马表示，补卡也是个办法，但他更关心的如何找回是里面的数据。
网秦手机安全专家指出，当前，手机防盗需求正日益凸显，很多用户的手机被盗后，都有如何找回数据，和远程锁定SIM卡，防止被利用的要求。媒体中也多次曝光了一系列假借机主名义，给其通讯录好友发短信或拨打电话，以如“手机停机了，给我充点钱”或“亟需1万元现金，请速汇款给我”等内容，实时诈骗行为。尤其来源属实，诈骗成功的机率也更大，令人防不胜防。
对此，专家表示，防止手机被盗后被他人利用，最好的办法就是安装“手机防盗”软件，当前，如网秦手机杀毒等软件，都具备对应功能。初次安装软件后，根据向导可分别设置一系列的防控密码，并对包括手机通讯录等信息进行服务器备份。这样，一旦手机被盗，用户可通过网络账户，将通讯录快速同步到新的手机。
同时，开启手机防盗功能后，用户还可远程发送防盗指令，快速锁定或直接销毁被窃手机内的重要数据。“手机防盗还能实现远程定位和被窃后，通过短信指令让手机发出警报，让小偷快速现形，通过一系列的防盗服务，把大家的损失降低到最小”专家介绍。
网秦手机安全专家指出，垃圾短信、手机病毒和手机防盗，这三大困扰手机用户的难题，将在圣诞、元旦乃至春节期间呈现上升趋势。手机应用率的提升，更促进了病毒作者对此平台的关注。但尽管安全形势不容乐观，但若用户提高手机安全意识，通过上述一些举措来加以防范，依然可有效确保手机安全，在节日期间享受移动生活带来的便捷。

description.hltext_display: Nyt udspil om Guantánamo fra Obama
description.content:
USA´s præsident, Barack Obama, er på vej med et nyt udspil om, hvad der skal ske med de tilbageholdte fanger på den amerikanske flådebase i Guantánamo-lejren i Cuba.
Det Hvide Hus er ved at gøre klar til at formalisere en bestemmelse, der gør det muligt at tilbageholde nogle af de 174 tilbageværende fanger på ubestemt tid i Guantánamo-lejren.
Men samtidig vil de nye regler give de tilbageholdte fanger mulighed for at gøre indsigelser og få behandlet deres sager.
Det nye dekret fra præsidenten kommer til at gælde for fanger, der er mistænkt for at være terrorister, og som anses for at være for farlige til at blive løsladt eller som ikke kan stilles for retten.
Flere juridiske eksperter siger, at bevismateriale mod mange topterrorister måske ikke vil blive tilladt ved traditionelle domstole, fordi det kan være opnået ved tortur eller er upålideligt eller måske omfatter hemmelige informationer.
Præsident Obama under pres Præsident Barack Obama er under pres for at lukke Guantánamo-lejren, da han under præsidentvalgkampen i 2008 lovede at få detentionscentret nedlagt inden for et år.
Obama sagde imidlertid i maj 2009, at det måtte være muligt at skabe forsvarlige og lovlige vilkår for de terrormistænke, som anses for at være farlige.
Omkring 35 af de 174 terrormistænkte i lejren ventes at blive retsforfulgt ved enten civile eller militære domstole i USA.
Republikanerne kræver imidlertid, at retssagerne finder sted i Guantánamo-lejren.
Blandt de terrormistænkte er Khalid Sheikh Mohammad, som er anklaget for at være hjernen bag terrorangrebet mod USA 11. september 2001.

description.hltext_display: 금융투자업계 '나눔 펀드' '디딤돌 펀드' 출시
description.content:
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=김명회 기자] 한국금융투자협회(회장 황건호)와 금융투자업계는 오는 23일부터 투자자가 펀드투자금의 일부로 소외계층을 지원하는 '나눔 펀드'와 저소득 서민에게 펀드보수를 할인해주는 '디딤돌 펀드'를 4개 운용사와 5개 은행·증권사가 공동으로 출시한다고 22일 밝혔다.
이번에 출시되는 상품은 증권유관기관과 금융투자업계가 자본시장의 성과를 소외계층과 공유하기 위해 마련한 '따뜻한 자본시장을 위한 금융투자업계의 노력'의 일환으로 추진되는 것으로 금투협, 산은자산운용(김호경 대표), 신한BNP파리바자산운용(최방길 대표), 우리자산운용(차문현 대표), KB자산운용(조재민 대표) 등 5개 유관기관이 참여한다.
이 상품의 주요 특징은 나눔펀드(기부참여형)의 경우 투자자가 기부대상(클래스로 구분)을 선택해 투자금의 일정비율(0.14~0.18%)을 기부하는 것이며, 디딤돌펀드(보수 할인)은 저소득자의 펀드투자를 통한 재산형성 지원한다.
산은자산운용은 저소득층 장학사업 및 독거노인 지원을 휘한 상품을 산업은행과 대우증권을 통해 판매하고, 신한BNP파리바자산운용은 어린이 및 장애인 지원 상품을 신한은행을 통해, KB자산운용은 다문화가정 및 결식아동 지원을 위한 상품을 국민은행을 통해 각각 판매한다.
우리자산운용은 기초 생활수급자, 장애인 등에 대해 보수를 할인(1.34%→0.73%)해주는 디딤돌펀드를 우리은행을 통해 판매한다.
김철배 집합투자서비스본부장은 "투자자와 업계가 자본시장의 성장혜택을 소외계층, 서민과 나눌 수 있는 계기가 마련된 만큼, 투자자의 다양한 기부욕구를 충족할 수 있는 추가 상품개발과 홍보활동을 지원함으로써 기부 문화가 정착될 수 있도록 노력하겠다"고 말했다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: 久高は計量１回でパス「何が何でも勝つ」
Club Mirador llega 4to; Marte visita Fed. Qatar
description.content:
Acuerdos. Dice busca hacer acuerdos de cooperación entre NORCECA y Qatar
Qatar.- El Foppapedretti Bergamo de Italia ganó la medalla de bronce en el Campeonato Mundial FIVB Femenino de Clubes tras vences al Mirador 25-8, 23-25, 25-8, 25-15 en un juego lleno de altas y bajas.
Bergamo dominó los parciales 1 y 3 pero lo que parecía un juego fácil se extendió eventualmente a cuatro parciales cuando las italianas repentinamente bajaron su ritmo y eficiencia en la segunda sección del encuentro. Dominicana llegó en cuarto puesto.
Habla Marte. El Presidente de la Confederación NORCECA, Cristóbal Marte Hoffiz, visitó las oficinas centrales de la Federación Nacional de Qatar donde fue recibido por su presidente Khalid Ali Al Malawi.
Durante el encuentro los dos líderes deportivos discutieron un programa de cooperación que permitiría al Equipo Nacional de Hombres de Qatar realizar una gira alrededor de América como parte de su proceso de desarrollo.
Los equipos de la Confederación NORCECA también visitarían Qatar como parte del programa de intercambio actualmente en gestación. Qatar fue la sede del Campeonato Mundial de Clubes FIVB.
Zoom
Seguirá como sede
Qatar tiene un acuerdo para ser sede de la competencia al menos hasta 2013. Marte Hoffiz elogió el nivel de organización de la competencia y la clase de hospitalidad que han disfrutado por todos los equipos participantes en el evento en Doha. Dijo que pudo ver a los atletas en ambas ramas con una gran calidad técnica. “El futuro del voleibol está garantizado por muchos años”.

description.hltext_display: Reinvented 2011 Ford Explorer Earns IIHS Top Safety Pick; Delivers Suite of Standard Safety Features
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Ford Motor Company
DEARBORN, Mich., Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ --
All-new 2011 Ford Explorer earns Insurance Institute for Highway Safety Top Safety Pick, adding to Ford's leading number of top safety ratings
The reinvented Explorer offers a class-leading array of airbags, including industry-exclusive inflatable second-row seat belts, Safety Canopy® side curtains, Trinity front crash architecture and collision warning with brake support
Explorer also features AdvanceTrac® with RSC® (Roll Stability Control™) with Curve Control, and MyKey® teen-safety technology – all class-exclusive innovations to help drivers reduce the risk of accidents on the road
Explorer's innovative driver-aid technologies such as BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert and rear view camera are proving popular with buyers
The reinvented 2011 Ford Explorer, which offers a suite of innovative safety technologies, is the latest Ford vehicle to earn a Top Safety Pick rating from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety.
Ford now has eight vehicles on the road in the U.S. that have earned Top Safety Picks, which adds to Ford's leading number of top U.S. safety ratings ever.
"The Ford Explorer sets a new standard for high-tech safety innovation," said Sue Cischke, Ford group vice president of Sustainability, Environment and Safety Engineering. "The Explorer offers several new innovative technologies, including available industry-first production rear inflatable seat belts, and Curve Control, which can help drivers maintain control of a vehicle if they enter a curve too quickly."
To earn a Top Safety Pick, a vehicle must receive a rating of "good" in offset frontal-, side- and rear-impact crash tests and roof strength evaluations, as well as offer electronic stability control.
Initial demand for the driver-aid technologies on the new 2011 Explorer has been strong. Of the first 19,000 orders received:
22 percent include adaptive cruise control with forward collision warning, active park assist and rain-sensing wipers
40 percent include BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert
87 percent include rear view camera
"Explorer has a history of safety innovation, from side-curtain airbags to AdvanceTrac® with RSC® (Roll Stability Control™), and now offering the world's first production rear inflatable seat belts," said Craig Patterson, Explorer marketing manager. "Explorer customers value safety and security. Safety features are one of the top reasons customers cite for their purchases of Explorer and SUVs in general."
World's first production inflatable rear seat belts
The new Ford inflatable rear seat belts spread impact forces across five times more area than conventional seat belts to reduce pressure on the chest while helping to control head and neck motion. The auto industry's first-ever production inflatable seat belts are designed to provide additional protection for rear-seat occupants, often children and older passengers who can be more vulnerable to head, chest and neck injuries.
Explorer's Curve Control
Ford is pioneering the next frontier of safety with crash-avoidance innovations such as Curve Control, designed to help drivers maintain control of their vehicle when taking a curve too quickly, a situation found to contribute to approximately 50,000 crashes on curves each year in the U.S. alone.
Curve Control senses when a vehicle is entering a curve too quickly, and can apply four-wheel smart braking to reduce vehicle speed by up to 10 mph in approximately one second and help drivers follow their intended path.
Additional driver-assist and safety features
"The new Explorer delivers features that both help prevent a crash and help minimize occupant injuries when a crash is unavoidable," said Erika Low, Explorer safety manager. "It's a comprehensive safety story from bumper to bumper."
The new Explorer comes equipped with technologies to help prevent crashes – from parking lot fender benders to high-speed collisions – by warning drivers of the potential for a crash. Driver- aid and safety technologies include options such as:
Adaptive cruise control, which slows the vehicle to adapt for traffic conditions and maintain a preset distance between vehicles
Collision warning with brake support, which helps reduce speed, automatically pre-charges brakes, provides a red warning light on the windshield as well as an audible beep to help drivers stop more quickly when the system detects a collision is imminent
BLIS with cross-traffic alert, which helps detect vehicles in blind spots during normal driving, as well as traffic approaching from the sides when reversing out of parking spots
Tire Pressure Monitoring System, which alerts drivers when it senses tire pressure is low
MyKey, which allows parents to limit speed and audio volume in their vehicles and is designed to help parents encourage safe driving habits in their teens
Structural safety and crash protection
Explorer features a unibody configuration body structure with nearly half of the stiff shell comprised of high-strength steels, such as boron. A-pillars, rocker panels and front beams are made out of boron steel for both increased strength and reduced weight. This structure was designed and developed to meet global crash standards.
Explorer features Ford's Trinity front crash structure, so named for its three components designed to absorb and redirect crash forces in the event of an incident.
When a crash becomes unavoidable, Explorer relies on a class-leading array of airbags to protect occupants. Two front and two side second-generation airbags are joined by a Safety Canopy® consisting of side-curtain airbags for all three rows of passengers. Personal Safety System™ safety belts feature pretensioners and an energy management system with adjustable D-ring height in the first row.
Other Ford vehicles that have earned a Top Safety Pick rating include:
2011 Ford Taurus
2011 Ford Fusion
2011 Ford Fiesta
2011 Ford Flex
2011 Lincoln MKS
2011 Lincoln MKT
2011 Lincoln MKZ
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F), a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Mich., manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 163,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford, Lincoln and Mercury, production of which has been announced by the company to be ending in the fourth quarter of 2010. The company provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company. For more information regarding Ford's products, please visit www.ford.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Afscheid van 'De missionaris van de Leur'
description.content:
ETTEN-LEUR - Oud-wethouder, raadslid, bakker en organisator Jan van Harssel (66) is gisteren onder grote publieke belangstelling begraven op de Leur.
De St. Petruskerk zat tot de laatste bank toe vol. Het stoffelijk overschot van Van Harssel werd door het Sint Hubertusgilde begeleid vanaf zijn woning in appartementencomplex Leliezicht naar de kerk. De tocht voerde langs twee passies van de man uit Leur, de Leurse haven en het beeld van Adriaan van Bergen. Oud-burgemeester Mart van der Ven roemde Van Harssels inzet. Niet alleen voor Leur, maar voor de hele gemeenschap. Pastor Jan Munsters maakte een verwijzing naar het Bijbelverhaal over talenten. 'Jan, je hebt je talenten goed gebruikt', aldus Munsters. De pastor onthulde verder dat Van Harssel eigenlijk missionaris had willen worden. Volgens Munsters is dat in feite ook gebeurd, als 'missionaris van de Leur.' foto Edmund Messerschmidt/het fotoburo

description.hltext_display: VNA to provide help for grieving children, families
description.content:
Provided Karen, Grace, Matthew and Bill Higbie oversee a Visiting Nurse Association campaign that helps families and children who have lost a loved one cared for by hospice.
The death of a loved one can be a difficult experience for those left behind, and families are often enveloped in physical, emotional and financial upheaval.
Parents and family members are dealing with their own grief and sometimes aren't able to be present emotionally for their young ones. Or, they simply just don't know how to help.
The Visiting Nurse Association provides grief support to families and friends who have lost loved ones cared for by hospice.
The VNA has developed a program to provide age-appropriate support groups and activities such as art and music therapy, writings, recreation and memory projects to help children, teens and young adults from toddler to college age learn to cope with their grief. The children's groups meet biweekly over an extended period of time, allowing the children to guide their own healing process.
The program requires that all children who participate be accompanied by an adult, either a parent, guardian or other adult family member. Group support and networking opportunities are provided for the adults, allowing them to also share feelings, emotions and ideas within a compassionate environment.
When the VNA moved to its new administrative building at 2401 Valley Drive in Valparaiso, the former building around the corner at 501 Marquette Street became home to the new program. The building has been renovated to provide space for support groups; an arts and crafts room; an activity room; a play room; a "volcano" room, where children are able to relieve feelings of anger; teen and young adult gathering rooms; a kitchen and a dining room.
The program relies heavily on volunteer support. Trained volunteers facilitate the children's peer support groups, oversee and direct children's activities, work at the reception desk and serve as "house parents" during the sessions.
There is no fee to participate in the program because a death in the family is so often accompanied by financial turmoil. The VNA wants to be sure help is available regardless of families' financial situation. Laura Harting, executive director, said the VNA is confident that families, once back on their feet, will help support the program for other families. The VNA also is counting on support from the community.
The VNA is kicking off the $750,000 capital campaign to help pay for the renovation, furnishings and supplies and to raise funds for the first year of operation. Bill and Karen Higbie and their children, Grace and Matthew, serve as chairs of the campaign. Grace and Matthew raised the first $141 of the campaign with a lemonade stand during the Kouts townwide garage sale in May.
Donations in support of the program may be made online at http://www.VNAportercounty.org or mailed to the VNA at 2401 Valley Drive, Valparaiso, IN 46383. For more information, call the VNA at (219) 462-5195.

event_or_fact.property: families, once back on their feet, will help support the program for other families.

description.hltext_display: La Juez que instruye el caso de la menor retenida en Arroyo de San Serván decreta "expresamente secreto de sumario"
description.author: Isabel Barrena
description.content:
Algunas fuentes señalan que cuatro vecinos de la localidad han sido puestos en libertad
(0 votos)
Isabel Barrena
Vivienda de la calle La Sierra de Arroyo, habitada por familias rumanas, en la que presuntamente estuvo retenida la joven durante unos días
Pocos datos trascienden de lo ocurrido en el municipio pacense de Arroyo de San Serván. Algunos medios nacionales se han hecho eco de la noticia e incluso el policía local que ayudó en las investigaciones figura como testimonio. Pero lo cierto es que la Juez que instruye el caso ha decretado "expresamente el secreto de sumario" según informan a Extremadura al Día desde el Tribunal Superior de Justicia de Extremadura (TSJEx).
Otros medios regionales señalan que los cinco detenidos españoles acusados de mantener relaciones sexuales con la menor han sido puestos en libertad. Algunas fuentes indican a este diario que son cuatro los detenidos del municipio puestos en libertad. Pero ni la Delegación del Gobierno, ni la Policía Local, ni la Guardia Civil confirman ni desmienten este hecho. Remiten al secreto de sumario dictado por la juez que instruye el caso.
A la espera de conocer nuevos datos, algunos vecinos de Arroyo de San Serván destacan que la menor podría pertenecer a una familia acomodada residente en Madrid pero es una información sin confirmar que circula como otras a estas horas por esta localidad extremeña sorprendida por lo sucedido.
Los comentarios no reflejan la opinión de Extremadura al día
Deben ser acordes al tema tratado.

description.hltext_display: Trung Quốc cấm lạm dụng tiếng nước ngoài trên truyền thông
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Trung Quốc, tiếng nước ngoài, đặc biệt là, nhà xuất bản, truyền thông, quốc cấm, tiếng Anh, Tiếng Trung, sử dụng, lạm dụng
Trung Quốc cấm các cơ quan truyền thông, nhà xuất bản sử dụng lẫn lộn giữa tiếng Trung với tiếng nước ngoài, đặc biệt là tiếng Anh khi đăng tải.
Theo đó, khi cần thiết phải sử dụng các từ, cụm từ nước ngoài, các cơ quan này buộc phải dịch hoặc diễn giải lại bằng tiếng Trung.
Cơ quan Quản lý báo chí và xuất bản Trung Quốc (GAPP) cho biết mục đích của quy định mới này nhằm chuẩn hóa ngôn ngữ của các hãng truyền thông, giữ gìn sự trong sáng của tiếng Trung Quốc, đặc biệt là khi ngôn ngữ nước ngoài ngày càng du nhập mạnh vào đây.
GAPP yêu cầu báo chí tránh dùng các từ viết tắt trong tiếng Anh như GDP (Tổng sản phẩm quốc nội), CEO (Giám đốc điều hành), CPI (Chỉ số giá tiêu dùng).
Trước đây Trung Quốc từng yêu cầu hạn chế sử dụng một số từ viết tắt tiếng Anh trong các chương trình truyền hình, nhưng nay, quy định này đã được mở rộng cho toàn bộ lĩnh vực truyền thông và xuất bản.
Về vấn đề này, có không ít ý kiến phản đối. Tổng biên tập giấu tên của một tạp chí lớn ở Bắc Kinh cho rằng: “Ý tưởng giữ gìn sự trong sáng của tiếng Trung là rất toort. Tuy nhiên, trong thời đại toàn cầu hóa, nhiều cụm từ tiếng Anh đã trở nên quá quen thuộc với người đọc như WTO, UN, thì quy định mới này còn quá nhiều bất cập, gây thiếu sự thống nhất giữa văn nói và văn viết.”
Việt Báo (Theo DVT)
Tìm hiểu: Trung Quốc, tiếng nước ngoài, đặc biệt là, nhà xuất bản, truyền thông, quốc cấm, tiếng Anh, Tiếng Trung, sử dụng, lạm dụng

description.hltext_display: Unwetter: Notstand in Teilen Kaliforniens
description.content: Nach anhaltenden Regenfllen mit berschwemmungen wird der Sden Kaliforniens auch von orkanartigen Strmen bedroht. Das nationale US-Wetteramt hat fr die Metropole Los Angeles und die Region eine Sturmwarnung ausgegeben. Die Evakuierung besonders gefhrdeter Regionen werde vorbereitet, berichtet die "Los Angeles Times". Durch die schweren Regenflle drohe Flutgefahr auch in den ebenen Gebieten rund um die Millionenmetropole. Der Wetterexperte Stuart Seto sagte der Zeitung: "Dieses Unwetter ist sehr dynamisch und intensiv." Es knnten sich auch Tornados entwickeln, sobald der Sturm das Festland erreicht habe. Bewohner der Stadtteile La Canada Flintridge und La Crescenta sollten sich auf die Evakuierung vorbereiten, teilten die Behrden mit.Bereits am Dienstag hat Gouverneur Arnold Schwarzenegger angesichts weiterer schwerer Regenflle fr einige Teile Kaliforniens den Notstand ausgerufen. In der Innenstadt von LA war innerhalb einer Woche ein Drittel der jhrlichen Regenmenge niedergegangen. Auch in San Diego rumte die Polizei Dutzende Huser und Geschfte. In einem Obdachlosenlager in Riverside gab es drei Leichtverletzte, als eine Flutwelle ber das Gelnde rollte und etwa 50 Menschen ihrer Habseligkeiten beraubte.

description.hltext_display: [综述]沪指收市跌0.9% 不利言论打击地产股大跌
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
全景网12月22日讯 周三A股市场明显收低，上证指数 上证指数收市报2877.90点，跌0.90%；深证成指 按照新财富行业分类，除钢铁、交通运输仓储、基础化工三个行业小幅收高外，其余行业全线下跌，非银行金融、传播与文化、煤炭开采、银行、房地产等行业均跌幅居前。
作为昨天的领涨龙头，今天地产股的回落令市场人气涣散。地产龙头万科A 据《上海证券报》周三报道，国土资源部副部长?小苏在20日召开的一个会议上表示，房地产业是重要的基础产业，而不应成为重要的经济支柱产业。这一言论令市场担心未来房地产行业将面临更为严厉的调控政策。
金融股也普遍收低，广发证券、中国太
发改委昨天宣布上调成品油价格，石化股今天普遍冲高回落，中国石油 （陆泽洪）

description.hltext_display: SYNC AppLink Now Available as Free Download; Ford Fiesta Owners First With Voice Control of Apps
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Ford Motor Company
DEARBORN, Mich., Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ --
SYNC® AppLink, the industry-first software application that gives SYNC users hands-free voice control of their smartphone apps, is now available as a free download for 2011 Ford Fiesta owners at www.syncmyride.com
Ford announces that Apple iPhone will be compatible with AppLink, along with initially announced BlackBerry by RIM and Android-based smartphones
Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak are the first SYNC-enabled mobile apps, some of which can be downloaded today from Android Market and BlackBerry App World, and soon from Apple App Store
SYNC AppLink comes first to 2011 Ford Fiesta owners, with more SYNC-equipped vehicles soon to follow
More than 14,000 owners of SYNC®-equipped Ford Fiesta vehicles can start celebrating the holidays now by treating themselves to the gift of AppLink, a free software program that gives SYNC users voice control of apps stored on their smartphone.
The industry-first capability puts Ford out front in the race to integrate smartphone apps into the car. The AppLink download for Fiesta owners went live today on the SYNC owner website, www.syncmyride.com.
"More and more drivers are using their devices and their apps while in the car," said Doug VanDagens, director of Ford Connected Services. "With AppLink, SYNC is a smarter solution for these drivers who choose to use these apps while driving – making it the only connectivity system available that can extend app functionality to the car using both voice and steering wheel controls."
Ford is also announcing a surprise new member to the AppLink family: the Apple iPhone. The popular smartphone makes for a powerful addition, and will be joining Android and BlackBerry smartphones as compatible devices with the software that allows apps to be controlled through the SYNC voice recognition system – a smarter alternative to manually controlling apps while driving.
Recent studies indicate 46 percent of adult smartphone users have apps on their phones and 36 percent of those admit to using those apps while commuting. Moreover, the 2010 study "Staying Connected on the Go: A Look at In-Vehicle Smartphone Integration Systems" conducted by the Consumer Electronics Association reports that 55 percent of smartphone owners prefer voice commands as their user interface for in-car smartphone integration, making the business case for SYNC and AppLink even more compelling.
"SYNC and AppLink work hand-in-hand to answer consumer demand for safer, smarter control of smartphones while in the car," said VanDagens. "Ford has worked hard to be a step ahead or at least in step with the speed of the consumer electronics market, and to leverage the technologies, features and services we know our customers want to be connected to while driving."
Easy downloading
2011 SYNC-equipped Ford Fiesta owners need to log in to their account on www.syncmyride.com to access the free AppLink download in the Update & Customize section.
As with any typical download, the AppLink software can be stored on a USB memory stick, and then inserted and uploaded to the vehicle via the SYNC system's USB port. In-car installation takes less than 10 minutes.
The first SYNC-enabled apps to market are Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak for listening to Twitter posts. Once the AppLink upload is complete, customers can then visit their phones' respective app store to download the latest SYNC-enabled Pandora, Stitcher or OpenBeak app to their smartphone as they would any other app.
Current availability of SYNC-enabled apps:
Pandora
Apple iPhone: Coming early 2011
Android: Available now (V1.5.3 or higher)
BlackBerry: Available now (Version 1.1.6 or higher)
Stitcher
Apple iPhone: Coming early 2011
Android: Coming early 2011
BlackBerry: Late availability
OpenBeak
BlackBerry: Available now from http://m.openbeak.com and soon in Blackberry App World (Version 1.4 or higher)
Seamless voice control
AppLink makes the connection between app and SYNC fairly seamless and simple, using Bluetooth streaming on paired Android and BlackBerry smartphones and the USB port for a connected Apple iPhone.
To access a mobile app with a SYNC-paired phone, the user simply has to press the VOICE button on the steering wheel and say the command, "Mobile applications," followed by the name of the app he or she would like to launch.
Once linked to Pandora, SYNC users can access their favorite personalized radio features, including creating and choosing stations, bookmarking songs for purchase, and giving songs a thumbs up/down all through voice. Command structure is intuitive and simple: "Play station classic rock radio," "Bookmark song," "Thumbs up" or "Thumbs down."
"Where before users would pick up their phone, taking their eyes off the road and hands off the steering wheel while driving to select a station and hit play, AppLink makes all of that functionality available through voice control, just like managing AM and FM radio or your MP3 player through SYNC," said Julius Marchwicki, SYNC product manager.
Similar voice command pathways and functionality exist for the Stitcher and OpenBeak apps. With Stitcher, for example, you can say the command, "Play station news" to listen to your favorite news radio or "Play station sports" to hear on-demand sports programming. Other popular Stitcher features such as skip station, thumbs up/down and "Add to favorites" are also available via voice.
Through the OpenBeak app, drivers can simply say the SYNC command, "Read timeline." In seconds, their feed is read aloud using the SYNC text-to-speech engine – a very similar experience to listening to talk radio.
Additional SYNC-enabled apps and smartphone integrations are coming soon, said Marchwicki. AppLink will also be introduced on other SYNC-equipped new model vehicles in 2011.
Ford will feature demos of AppLink at the Pepcom Digital Experience media event in Las Vegas on Jan. 5, 2011, and then at the 2011 International CES consumer technology trade show in Las Vegas between Jan. 6 and Jan. 9, 2011.
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F), a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Mich., manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 163,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford, Lincoln and Mercury, production of which has been announced by the company to be ending in the fourth quarter of 2010. The company provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company. For more information regarding Ford's products, please visit www.ford.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: 44年の歴史に感謝を込めて、〈さよならヤマハ渋谷店コンサート〉が開催決定！
description.content:
12月22日(水)16時31分配信 44年の歴史に感謝を込めて、〈さよならヤマハ渋谷店コンサート〉が開催決定！ 2010年12月26日をもって44年の歴史に幕を降ろす「ヤマハ渋谷店」。ヤマハ直営の楽器店としての側面だけではなく、音楽教室やライヴハウス、R＆Dなども併設し、音楽の情報発信、交流の場として、プロ・アマ問わず、多くの音楽家から愛されて続けて来た場所でもあったその足跡へ感謝をこめて、2011年1月19日（水）、東京・SHIBUYA-AXにて〈さよならヤマハ渋谷店コンサート〉が開催されます。 このイベントは、閉店のを知った数多くの人たちの中の1人、ミュージシャンの松武秀樹がTwitter上で「渋谷店にお世話になったミュージシャンのみんな、渋谷店へのお礼にコンサートをやろう！」という掛け声のもと、まずはTwitterを通じて、向谷 実、倉田信雄、ホッピー神山、山川恵津子らが参加を表明。そこからさらに広がり、日本の音楽シーンを牽引してきた重鎮が集結、出演ミュージシャンは総数40名以上にも！
ステージでは、普段はあまり観ることができないミュージシャンの組み合わせによるユニットでのアンサンブル、歴代のシンセサイザーとキーボーディストが総動員で演ずるセクション、このコンサートのためだけに、松井五郎・作詞、山川恵津子・作曲で特別に書き下ろされる曲など、今までの日本国内音楽シーンの中においてもほかに例を見ない、まさにヤマハ渋谷店44年の歴史とリンクし、リスペクトする幅広い楽曲の数々が繰り広げられます。 さらに、ミュージック・トラック社の協力により、ヤマハが1983年に発表した名器「DX-7」を軸とした、歴代のシンセサイザー群が用意され、往年のシンセサイザー・サウンドがSHIBUYA-AXに轟く、デジタル・シンセサイザーの原点から見つめてきた渋谷店にふさわしいステージとなるのでは。
ヤマハ渋谷店と共に歩んできたミュージシャンたちの決起による〈さよならヤマハ渋谷店コンサート〉、ぜひぜひ会場へ！
【関連記事】(((オーディオ))) 高さ方向の音場をリアルに再現する新機能搭載中村 中、移籍第1弾シングル「家出少女」PVを初公開＆先行配信スタート！、、を調べる 最終更新:12月22日(水)16時31分

description.hltext_display: Celtics notebook: Celtics practice turns into big deal, topped by return of Perkins
description.author: Michael Vega
description.content: Pierce honored Paul Pierce was named Eastern Conference Player of the Week after averaging 21.7 points, 8.7 assists, 8.3 rebounds, and 2.3 steals. Pierce no doubt sealed the award with his triple-double in Sunday’s 99-88 triumph over the Pacers with 18 points, 12 assists, and 10 rebounds as the Celtics extended their winning streak to 13 games . . . After tonight’s game, the Celtics will play the Magic in Orlando on Christmas Day in a nationally televised game. For Rivers, it means a trip home, which softens the disappointment of having to work on the holiday. “People look at it differently,’’ he said. “Obviously, when you play on Christmas Day, some guys are upset over it because they can’t spend time with their family. But I look at it as a privilege, because to play on Christmas Day means you’re one of the good teams, one of the featured teams.’’ The players’ families have the option to be with the team in Orlando . . . Rivers sided with UConn women’s basketball coach Geno Auriemma, who felt not enough attention was being paid to his team’s quest for an NCAA-record 89 consecutive victories, which would trump the 88-game streak of the UCLA men’s team. “I don’t care what people say, when you win that many in a row, it’s extraordinary,’’ Rivers said. “Penn State women’s volleyball just did the same thing and they got a mention late about breaking the record, and they won four national titles in a row. People should know that. Geno’s absolutely right. What he’s doing is extraordinary, and when you look at it, you don’t see an end in sight, and that’s even more amazing.’’
