description.hltext_display: Mystery of Monsignor Accused of Molesting: Book of Redemption, Published by Outskirts Press
description.author: Outskirts Press, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Outskirts Press, Inc. has published Book of Redemption by Evon Smith. The author's most recent book to date is a 5 x 8 paperback in the mystery and detective fiction category and is available worldwide on book retailer websites such as Amazon and Barnes & Noble. The webpage at www.outskirtspress.com/BookOfRedemption was launched simultaneously with the book's publication.An elderly priest has been found dead. The police investigation by the LAPD has begun to determine whether Monsignor Leland committed suicide or was murdered. Monsignor Leland had been accused of molesting young boys many years ago, though no charges were ever filed.A Los Angeles Times staff writer, Marco Vori, is writing an investigative series regarding the priest sex abuse in the Catholic Church when Monsignor Leland contacts him to provide information regarding his investigative series. Now the priest has been found dead and Marco Vori is missing. Days later, Marcos best friend, Elizabeth Pearson, begins receiving e-mails from the dead priest asking her if shes received the book.Elizabeth eventually stumbles upon the evidence that the monsignor was trying to reveal to Vori. Having such damaging information in her possession, Elizabeth has to run for her life from extremely powerful individuals who act to ensure that the truth never comes to light.164 pages in length, Book of Redemption is being aggressively promoted to appropriate markets with a focus on the mystery and detective fiction category. With U.S. wholesale distribution through Ingram and Baker & Taylor, and pervasive online availability through Amazon, Barnes & Noble and elsewhere, Book of Redemption meets consumer demand through both retail and library markets with a suggested retail price of $14.95.Additionally, Book of Redemption can be ordered by retailers or wholesalers for the maximum trade discount price set by the author in quantities of ten or more from the Outskirts Press Direct bookstore at www.outskirtspress.com/bookstore.ISBN: 9781432763459Format: 5 x 8 paperback creamSRP: $14.95For more information or to contact the author, visit www.outskirtspress.com/BookOfRedemption.About the author:Evon Smith is an educator with the Los Angeles Unified School District. She is currently the site Administrator of Doyle Career and Transition Center. As a districtlevel administrator, she previously served as the coordinator of the districts Subject Matter Preparation Program, which provides training for hundreds of beginning teachers in effective pedagogy and core subject matter topics. Evons responsibilities included curriculum development and the coordination of the training of beginning teachers who instruct in the districts shortage areas of math, science, and special education. A graduate of the University of California, Irvine, and Cal State University, Northridge, Evon has realized her dream of writing her first novel, Book of Redemption. She resides in Torrance, California.About Outskirts Press, Inc.Outskirts Press, Inc. offers full-service, custom self-publishing and book marketing services for authors seeking a cost-effective, fast, and flexible way to publish and distribute their books worldwide while retaining all their rights and full creative control. Available for authors globally at www.outskirtspress.com and located on the outskirts of Denver, Colorado, Outskirts Press represents the future of book publishing, today.###Outskirts Press, Inc., 10940 S. Parker Rd - 515, Parker, Colorado 80134http://outskirtspress.com 1-888-OP-BOOKS

description.author: Av: TT
description.content: Sedan det ungerska parlamentet natten till tisdagen ändrade författningen och införde en lag om statlig kontroll av press, radio, tv och internet möter den ungerska regeringen, som nästa vecka övertar EU-ordförandeskapet, mycket hård kritik från utlandet. Luxemburgs utrikesminister kräver att EU-kommissionen omedelbart agerar mot planerna och han ifrågasätter om Ungern är värdigt att leda EU. Av: TT

description.hltext_display: Isae/ A dicembre migliora la fiducia dei consumatori
description.author: Red/Vis
description.content: Roma, 22 dic. (Apcom) - A dicembre migliora la fiducia dei consumatori. Lo rileva l'Isae. L`indice aumenta infatti per il quarto mese consecutivo da 108,5 a 109,1 tornando in prossimità dei livelli raggiunti lo scorso gennaio. Migliorano in particolare le valutazioni sul quadro economico generale (da 80,7 a 82,2). Aumentano anche, in maniera più contenuta, quelle relative al quadro personale (da 121,7 a 121,9), oltre ai giudizi sulla situazione corrente (da 115,8 a 116,3) e alle attese su quella futura (da 98,1 a 98,2). In particolare sono favorevoli le previsioni sull`evoluzione del paese, del mercato del lavoro e i giudizi sulla convenienza di acquisto di beni durevoli. Sono invece negative le opinioni sulle opportunità e possibilità di risparmio. Riguardo ai prezzi, i giudizi circa la dinamica degli ultimi dodici mesi segnalano un rallentamento, mentre si stabilizzano le attese di decelerazione per il breve termine. Le valutazioni sul mercato dei beni durevoli sono positive. La fiducia migliora nel Nord-Ovest e nel Mezzogiorno del paese, ma scende nel Nord-Ovest e nel Centro.

description.hltext_display: Bensinen dyrare till julhelgen
description.content: Ledande bensinbolag höjde på onsdagen sina riktpriser, sedan världsmarknadspriserna stigit flera dagar i rad. Priset på 95-oktanig bensin höjdes med 10 öre till 13,33 kronor per liter. Dieselpriset höjdes med 8 öre till 12,99 kronor per liter. TT

description.hltext_display: Elförbrukningen nära rekordnivåer
description.content:
Kylan får elförbrukningen att skjuta i höjden. I morse förbrukades över 26.300 Mwh per timme. Prognoserna talar om över 27.000 Mwh senare i eftermiddag, vilket i sådana fall skulle innebära en tangering av den högsta förbrukningen hittills. Det tidigare rekordet är från januari 2001.
Men det är ingen fara för effektbrist i dagsläget sedan Oskarshamn nu fått fart på sin reaktor 3.
"Alla reaktorer är i gång", säger Maria Jäderberg på Svenska Kraftnät. TT

description.hltext_display: South Korea to hold largest-ever live-fire drill
description.author: staff writers
description.content:
UPDATE 2:50pm: Reuters reports six South Korean naval ships are mobilising and heading into the fray. SOUTH Korea pledged today to conduct the largest-ever live-fire drill on the mainland near its border with North Korea.Reuters said the drill, reportedly scheduled for Thursday, will come just days after a live-fire artillery exercise near the rival countries' disputed maritime border.
Monday's drill on the island of Yeonpyeong - hit by the North in a fatal artillery bombardment in November - caused Pyongyang to accuse officials in Seoul of behaving like "warmongers", and of deliberately stoking tensions as foreign nations called for restraint.

description.hltext_display: Saudi king leaves hospital in good health: agency
description.content:
Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah has left a New York hospital in good health, the kingdom's state news agency said on Wednesday.
Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah has left a New York hospital in good health, the kingdom's state news agency said on Wednesday.
"King Abdullah left the Presbyterian Hospital on Tuesday evening...as God gave him good health," the Saudi Press Agency said.
"He moved to his place of residence in New York to recuperate and continue with physical therapy," the statement said but did not say when he might return to Saudi Arabia.
Earlier in December, the state news agency said the king, believed to be 86 or 87, had a successful second operation to stabilise vertebrae in his spinal column.
The second operation was the completion of earlier surgery after a blood clot complicated a slipped disc.
Crown Prince Sultan, who has health problems of his own, returned from abroad to govern the world's largest oil exporter while Abdullah is away.
King Abdullah, who came to power in 2005, is the sixth leader of the top OPEC exporter.

description.hltext_display: Abu Dhabi to build world's largest underground water reservoir
EBM överklagar friande Carnegiedom
description.content:
Ekobrottsmyndigheten (EBM) har överklagat den dom där Stockholms tingsrätt helt frikänner tre före detta värdepappershandlare på Carnegie, som åtalats för grov otillbörlig marknadspåverkan. I sitt överklagande begär åklagaren Yngve Rydberg att hovrätten utser en ledamot med särskilda kunskaper om handeln med finansiella instrument.
Enligt Rydberg har männen fifflat med optionskurser, men tingsrätten fann att deras handel varit legitim. TT

description.hltext_display: Equip Your Car with Bluetooth Rear View Camera
description.content: Most of the car owners have experienced the difficulty of backing their cars into an unknown object. It inevitably causes some serious financial problem or a tragic accident if you have no right guide. In addition, the simple combination of night time and the awkward motion of turning around in our chair can prevent us from seeing obstacles clearly. If you have the same annoyance, you can have a look at this new In-Dash Car DVD Player with Bluetooth rear view camera. These parking aides allow you to see your reverse path clearly, and tell you the exact distance between your used Toyota and the brand new Mercedes behind you. A 2-in-1 device with both aides can be purchased online for just over $100. At that price, if you avoid just one fender bender over the lifetime of the product, the device pays for itself. In fact, you will probably avoid several minor accidents, and this product is therefore worth its weight in gold. Equipping your car with a parking sensor and a rear view camera is likely to save you money and stress. Not only will this device likely save you money, it will also save you time. With this system installed in your car, you will be able to fit into smaller parking spots that require parallel parking. This will most likely allow you to park closer to your destination, therefore saving you time. In addition, these parking aides will allow you to park more quickly. No longer will you have to take several attempts to get the correct angle, or have a friend get out of the car to guide your forward and backward movements. You can do it all from the driver's seat, and be sure to get it right the first time.Furthermore, these devices are very easy to use. The system consists of ultrasonic sensors, camera, and monitor. Once installed, the Distance Detection System will turn on automatically when you put your car into reverse. If an object is detected while backing up, the system will beep. In addition, the screen will show the exact distance between your car and the object. You can see the back view clearly on the monitor, and use both visual and distance information to park your car safely.Think about how much time you spend in your car. We add numerous devices to our cars to make driving more convenient and enjoyable, including cup holders, radios, MP3 players, DVD players, and in dash Navigation DVD systems. A rear view camera with a built-in parking sensor will be useful every time you drive. This device will save you money in the long run, and make the challenge of parking much less difficult. Best of all, if you buy from a china wholesale manufacturer, you don't need to break the bank to purchase this technology.

description.hltext_display: Rene Le Berre, 78, entomologist led fight against river blindness
description.author: Richard Goldstein
description.content:
NEW YORK ? Rene Le Berre, a French entomologist who helped inspire an international campaign that saved millions of West Africans from the parasitic disease river blindness, died Dec. 6 in l?Aiguillon-sur-Mer on France?s western coast. He was 78.
The cause was cardiovascular disease complicated by diabetes.
Onchocerciasis, the formal name for river blindness, had once been a scourge in the fertile river basins of tropical Africa.
Transmitted when black flies living in rapidly running rivers bite a victim repeatedly, releasing parasitic worms into the body, the disease brings excruciating itching, creates nodules under the skin, and often results in blindness. Victims can remain infected for 15 years.
The path toward conquering river blindness in Africa began in 1972 at a small medical clinic in Upper Volta, now Burkina Faso.
Dr. Le Berre, who had long been working in West Africa on insecticide programs to kill black flies, met for three hours at that clinic with Robert S. McNamara, former secretary of defense in the Kennedy and Johnson administrations, who was visiting Africa as president of the World Bank.Dr. Le Berre, who had contracted a mild form of river blindness in Africa, spoke halting English, but the photographs he showed to McNamara told a gruesome tale. They depicted African youngsters guiding lines of men who had been blinded, and portrayed river-blindness sufferers with disfiguring nodules.
In September 1973, the World Bank announced plans for a 20-year, $120 million program to fight river blindness in Africa. It joined with the World Health Organization and other international agencies to form the Onchocerciasis Control Program.
Dr. Le Berre, who had mapped thousands of breeding sites for black flies during the 1960s, directed aerial attacks on them for the international control program, deploying small planes and helicopters to spray insecticides.
The focus on combating the disease changed in the 1980s when Merck & Co. in the United States began donating millions of doses of the drug ivermectin to Africans in river blindness regions.
According to the World Health Organization, the control program, which ended in 2002, protected millions of people in 11 African countries from the effects of river blindness and enabled cultivation and resettlement in river basins after villagers terrified of the disease had fled to less productive uplands.

description.hltext_display: YN athletes back with 27 gold & 18 silver medals
description.content:
Yunnan athletes come back with 27 gold and 18 silver medals from the 2010 Asian Para Games. [yunnan.cn]
Yunnan athletes come back with 27 gold and 18 silver medals from the 2010 Asian Para Games that was held from 12nd to 19th in December, 2010 in Guangzhou yesterday (December 20).
The 2010 Asian Para Games, also known as the First Asian Para Games, was a parallel sport event for Asian athletes with a disability held in Guangzhou, China. It opened on December 12 and closed on December 19, 2010, two weeks after the conclusion of the 16th Asian Games.
Approximately 5,500 athletes from 45 Asian member nations participated in this paralympic multisport competition, making this the most comprehensive Asian event as a steppingstone for elite Asian athletes aiming for the London 2012 Paralympics. Competition and training venues plus all other facilities to be used for the 16th Asian Games were converted to meet the disability-accessible requirements for Asian Para Games athletes, officials, staff and audience.(Editor:Minnie Mao)
Click here to view Chinese report

description.hltext_display: 리딩증권, 영천시와 자매결연으로 농촌사랑 실천
description.content:
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=정금철 기자] 리딩투자증권(대표 박철)은 지난 21일 영천시 임고면 덕연리와 자매결연을 맺고 1사1촌 농촌사랑을 실천한다고 22일 밝혔다.
이 증권사는 이번 자매결연식을 기념해 덕연리 노인정에 냉난방기를 기증하고, 고객 및 임직원 선물용으로 농산물을 구매하는 등 지원 활동도 실시할 예정이다.
리딩투자증권은 이 외에도 세계 재난지역 구호단체인 팀앤팀 및 인폴루션ZERO, 아트페어 후원, 사회복지재단 들꽃마을에 음악회 수익금 기부 등 다양한 분야에서 문화지원 및 사회공헌 활동을 펼쳐왔다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: Uppåt för producentpriserna
description.content:
Producentpriserna steg med 0,2 procent i november, jämfört med månaden före, och steg med 2,2 procent jämfört med samma månad föregående år, enligt statistik från SCB. Enligt SME Direkt räknade analytiker med att PPI skulle stiga med 0,5 procent från månaden före och stiga med 1,9 procent från samma månad i fjol.
Elektricitetspriserna steg med 5,8 procent jämfört med oktober, och med 11,7 jämfört med november 2009.
Enligt tullverkets valutakurser stärktes kronan med 1,4 procent mot dollarn, stärktes med 1,2 procent mot brittiska pund samt försvagades med 2,3 procent mot euron. Kronan stärktes samtidigt med 1,1 procent mot den norska kronan.

description.hltext_display: Indorama扩充PET薄膜业务点评
description.content:
http://www.chinairn.com发稿日期:2010-12-22
【打印文章】 【字号 大 中 小】 【关闭窗口】
【搜索关键词】：PET薄膜产业研究报告 投资策略 PET薄膜产业市场分析 发展前景 竞争调研 趋势预测
中研网讯：
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
Indorama Ventures Ltd.Plc公司（IVL）已定下了宏伟的五年期目标，力争成为PET薄膜制造行业无可争议的全球领先企业。
该公司在12月17日宣布，将斥资38亿美元扩充PET薄膜业务，这一投资额比之前宣布的20亿美元整整高出了90％。
从现在起到2014年，该公司将通过这笔投资把薄膜年产能扩大至1000万吨，而之前宣布的目标是在现有产能基础上翻番至320万吨。
IVL公司CEOAlokeLohia在12月17日在曼谷召开股东会议时说："无论在规模、创新实力还是品牌创建上，我们都力争成为这一行业内无可争议的领先企业。"
Indorama公司股东已批准发行4.8159亿股可转让认购权（TSR），每股价格36泰铢（1.20美元）。售股所得将用于扩能工程。
美国《塑料新闻》在10月曾报道说，由于一些工厂停产，进口薄膜关税上调，加上经济的不景气，美国薄膜加工行业出现了严重的PET薄膜短缺。
IVL已宣布斥资9亿美元在全球展开收购和投资，特别是在中国和印度。该公司还计划在2011－2014年间再投入29亿美元。
作为控股IVL公司70％的家族的一员，Lohia对聚酯业务的前景仍充满乐观，特别是考虑到聚酯正在作为棉的替代材料用于制衣行业，此外还在包装材料上取代玻璃和铝。
Lohia在股东会议上说，这些市场潜力推动着IVL在新建和扩建项目及并购上展开投资。
眼下，IVL正在向韩国SK化工株式会社收购其在波兰的SKEurochem公司以及在印度尼西亚的PTSKKeris公司及其下属的PTSKFibre公司。
在完成近期宣布的对中国、美国、墨西哥、欧洲和印度尼西亚企业的一系列收购后，Indorama公司的全球PET聚合物年产能将达到303万吨。据该公司称，其中21％的产能将来自亚洲，北美占到51％，还有28％来自欧洲。

description.hltext_display: Vaticano-Cina/ Pechino: Critiche S.Sede imprudenti e infondate
description.content: Roma, 22 dic. (Apcom) - Le critiche del Vaticano contro la Chiesa ufficiale cinese sono "infondate" e "imprudenti". Lo ha dichiarato oggi l'Ufficio cinese degli Affari religiosi, dopo le accuse di azioni "inaccettabili" e "ostili" formulate dal Vaticano contro la chiesa del regime di Pechino.(fonte Afp)

description.hltext_display: Ekonom: Styrräntan bör höjas till 5 procent
description.content:
Riksbankens räntebana innebär en upprepning av amerikanska Feds misstag. Räntan borde höjas betydligt snabbare för att undvika en fastighetsbubbla. Det skriver nationalekonomen Anders Åslund på DN Debatt. Med den nuvarande lågräntepolitiken bäddar Riksbanken för en fastighetsbubbla. Styrräntan borde höjas i steg om 50 punkter upp till 5 procent för att undvika en bubbla och i förlängningen en krasch. Det skriver Anders Åslund, senior fellow vid International Economics i Washington, på DN Debatt:
”Relationen mellan inkomster och fastighetspriser förefaller orimlig, på grund av rörliga boräntor som fortfarande är så låga som 2,8 procent.”
Med tillväxt 2010 på 5,5 procent och väntade 4,4 procent 2011 är svensk ekonomi i början av en högkonjunktur och behöver en positiv realränta, menar Åslund. Risken är annars att vi kan få en situation som liknar den i USA.
”USA har i genomsnitt haft en marginellt negativ realränta sedan januari 2002, vilket ledde till en ohygglig fastighetsbubbla”, skriver Anders Åslund som har en bakgrund som rådgivare åt blad annat Boris Jeltsins regering i Ryssland.
Att höja räntan skulle inte bara lugna ned prisutvecklingen på fastighetsmarknaden utan även stödja banksparandet och stärka svenska banker, skriver Åslund, som kallar Feds lågräntepolitik för ”det största ekonomiska misstaget världen sett efter att kommunismen föll”. di.se

description.hltext_display: Stort boksebrag er en realitet
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
WBO-verdensmester i weltervægt Manny Pacquiao gør klar til et boksebrag.
Den 7. maj næste år venter nemlig amerikaneren Shane Mosley.
Filippineren havde kæmpet for at få en kamp om flere verdensmesterskabsbælter, men den ubesejrede Floyd Mayweather Jr. svarede ikke på Pacauiaos henvendelser.
Den filippinske bokser har vundet titler i otte forskellige vægtklasser: Superweltervægt, weltervægt, letweltervægt, letvægt, superfjervægt, fjervægt, superbantamvægt og fluevægt.

来年早々にオンエアされる「2011ユーキャン」CMは、このきびしい時代に前向きに“ゆけ、ゆけ”と応援する内容となっており、「It's My Life」は、YUIがCMのために書き下ろした作品。CDは1月26日（水）にリリースです！

description.hltext_display: Bruce Levy sues forensics company for $5 million
description.content:
Nashville's former chief medical examiner is suing the company he once worked for, saying they reneged on an exit deal worth about $1.6 million when he left the business. In dispute is whether Dr. Bruce Levy resigned or was terminated in March, shortly after he was arrested on a marijuana possession charge in Mississippi, and what, if anything, he's entitled to for his 14 percent stake in the company. Levy is suing his former employer, Forensic Medical, demanding more than $5 million in pay, benefits and damages in Davidson County Chancery Court.
John Voigt, attorney for Forensic Medical, said they had only just received the lawsuit Tuesday and were still reviewing it. Levy's attorney, Kenneth Jones, declined to comment.
The suit stems from Levy's trouble in March, when authorities intercepted a package of marijuana bound for his Madison County, Miss., hotel room. Authorities said they searched his room and found more marijuana, some of it in evidence bags from the Metro Medical Examiner's Office, leading to Levy being charged with official misconduct in Tennessee.Related According to the lawsuit, Levy quickly worked out an exit deal with Forensic Medical's parent company, Associated Pathologists, where he would resign but retain his salary for a month, some benefits and he would receive up to $1.5 million for his 14 percent stake in the company. But shortly after Levy sent in his resignation, Forensic Medical responded that the company's board had already expelled him and that he would receive nothing of the sort, according to court filings.
More accusations lobbed
Letters between Jones and Voigt also indicate that Forensic Medical had accused Levy at one point of receiving "unauthorized compensation and benefits" and allowing other doctors within the company to receive the same. Levy's attorney denied the accusation in a letter to Forensic Medical, pointing out that a $50,000 bonus he received in January was actually part of his 2009 bonus.
The letters do not elaborate on the accusations.
Levy has since gone into a pretrial diversion program in Mississippi and recently pleaded guilty to official misconduct in Tennessee, in connection with the marijuana having been taken from an evidence locker. If he completes his probation, both charges will be removed from public view.
In another court case, Levy indicated that he was courting clients to continue consulting on forensics matters with a new company he has formed.
Forensic Medical maintains its contract in Nashville and Mississippi and recently promoted longtime Deputy Medical Examiner Amy McMaster to the agency's top spot.

description.hltext_display: Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild
description.content:
Offenbach (dpa) - Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen. « », bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach am frühen Mittwoch. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus.
Ein Mädchen arbeitet in Wenzenbach (Oberpfalz) an einem Wikingerschiff aus Schnee. Die Meteorologen in haben Tauwetter für den ganzen Süden vorausgesagt.
Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall.
Für den Heiligabend am Freitag sagt der DWD für weite Teile Deutschlands leichten Schneefall voraus. Bei Temperaturen um den Gefrierpunkt soll es zunächst am Vormittag in Berlin, Frankfurt/Main, Stuttgart und München noch Regen oder Schneeregen geben, zum Abend hin wird es dann laut Prognose aber deutschlandweit leicht schneien.

description.hltext_display: R. R. Rubottom, 98; diplomat helped shape US policy on Cuba
description.author: Douglas Martin
description.content:
NEW YORK ? R. Richard Rubottom, a diplomat who influenced and helped hone US policy toward Latin America in the late 1950s, a time of economic and political tumult that culminated in Fidel Castro?s takeover in Cuba, died Dec. 6 in Austin, Texas, his family said. He was 98.
Mr. Rubottom rose from modest roots ? his parents ran a boardinghouse in central Texas ? to become the ?official most responsible for defining United States Cuban policy?? in the years immediately surrounding the 1959 Cuban revolution, the historian Thomas G. Paterson wrote in ?Contesting Castro: The United States and the Triumph of the Cuban Revolution?? (1994).Mr. Rubottom began grappling with foreign policy issues in Latin America as assistant secretary of state for inter-American affairs from 1956 to 1960.
In 1958 he accompanied Vice President Richard Nixon on a widely publicized tour of Latin America that was marred by violent demonstrations against the United States. After protesters in Caracas shattered windows in the vice president?s car, news reports suggested that Nixon partly blamed Mr. Rubottom for allowing his motorcade to be put in harm?s way.As a high-level strategist on US policy toward Cuba in the late 1950s, Mr. Rubottom was portrayed in books and news reports as a strong early supporter of the country?s repressive leader, Fulgencio Batista, as he battled the rebellion led by Fidel Castro.
But Mr. Rubottom later worried that Batista?s ?brutal retaliatory tactics?? were eroding his support and questioned whether the United States should continue to sell tanks to Cuba after it became known that Batista was using them against his domestic opponents, a violation of US law. Batista ultimately canceled the tank order.
With the rise of Castro, Mr. Rubottom represented the State Department in meetings with military and intelligence officials on whether, how, and when to try to eliminate him ? both before and after he seized power in January 1959.
Yet when Castro visited the United States in April 1959 as Cuba?s new leader, Mr. Rubottom greeted him, and he was deputized to ask Castro what US aid he would like. Castro said none.
Some politicians and historians have criticized Mr. Rubottom for not identifying Castro as a Communist before he took control.
In 1960, Mr. Rubottom created a controversy by telegraphing Governor Edmund G. Brown of California with an appeal by the Uruguayan government to halt the planned execution of Caryl Chessman, a convicted robber and rapist who had become a global cause celebre for opponents of capital punishment. Brown granted Chessman a 60-day reprieve, although he was ultimately executed.
Mr. Rubottom said he had merely been passing on information that related to US foreign policy ? Uruguay opposed the death penalty ? but his action ignited a debate over federal intervention in state matters and prompted President Dwight D. Eisenhower to issue a statement saying the execution was entirely a California matter.
Roy Richard Rubottom Jr. was born in Brownwood, Texas. During World War II he served in the Navy in Mexico and Paraguay.
After his discharge as a commander in 1946, he became vice president of a bank in Corsicana, Texas. But his interest in foreign affairs led him to join the Foreign Service after taking a special exam for war veterans. His postings included Colombia and Spain.
After leaving the State Department, Mr. Rubottom had a second career in higher education, serving as president of the University of the Americas in Puebla, Mexico; and as a professor of political science at SMU.
When it came to improving inter-American relations, Mr. Rubottom was not above counting beans ? literally. In 1958 he said in a speech that if each American used 12 more coffee beans in each cup, stability and prosperity would be enhanced in coffee-growing nations.

he had merely been passing on information that related to US foreign policy

description.hltext_display: الفجيرة للإعلام تطلق قناة إيه بي سي
description.content:
أعلنت مجموعة الفجيرة للإعلام (Fujairah Media Group)، وهي مشروع مشترك بين هيئة الفجيرة للثقافة والإعلام وعرب الدولية للخدمات الإعلامية، بالتنسيق مع "ماموث هولدينجز" (Mamoth Holdings)، عن بدءها مؤخراً البث لقناة "إيه بي سي" (ABC TV) التلفزيونية الجديدة التي تم إطلاقها مؤخراً وهي قناة مجانية عائلية التوجه تتميز بعرضها لبرامج عربية وغربية.
تابع المقال في الأسفل▼
مكي عبد الله، الرئيس التنفيذي لمجموعة الفجيرة للإعلام.
وقال مكي عبد الله، الرئيس التنفيذي لمجموعة الفجيرة للإعلام، "يتماشى إطلاق قناة "إيه بي سي" التلفزيونية مع مهمتنا المتمثلة في إيصال ترفيه عالي القيمة للجمهور التلفزيوني في المنطقة، قناة "إيه بي سي" التلفزيونية هي قناة مجانية تتميز بعرض برامج من النوعية الممتازة وتتضمن عدة برامج غربية لا تُعرض على القنوات الأخرى في السوق، مما يجعل منها خياراً جذاباً لمشاهدي التلفاز في جميع أنحاء المنطقة. كما تعرض القناة الجديدة برامج ترفيهية عامة تستهدف شريحة متنوعة من المشاهدين، وقمنا على وجه الخصوص باختيار مجموعة فريدة من البرامج التي تستهدف الشباب من المشاهدين في الفترة الصباحية ومجموعة من البرامج ذات التوجهات العائلية في فترة ما بعد الظهيرة والمساء".
وأضاف هاني بركات، مدير قناة "إيه بي سي" التلفزيونية، "لدينا فريق رائع في "إيه بي سي" ومجموعة ممتازة من البرامج والتي سوف تستقطب جمهوراً من فئات عمرية مختلفة بالتأكيد. كما تم تطوير برامجنا الفريدة بناء على بحوث مكثفة حول ما يفضله الجمهور المستهدف. ونحن واثقون في هذا الصدد من تلبية المطالب المتنوعة لمشاهدي التلفاز في جميع أنحاء المنطقة".
تتميز قناة "إيه بي سي" التلفزيونية بإدارة بركات الذي يوظف خبراته الإعلامية الواسعة فيها، بفريق متميز من مقدمي البرامج من جميع الجنسيات العربية والذي يقومون مجتمعين بتزويد الجمهور بمجموعة متنوعة من البرامج، وتغطي العروض الأولى للقناة أطياف متنوعة بما فيها الترفيه والألعاب وفن الطبخ والرياضة والثقافة وغيرها - والتي يتم تقديمها مجتمعة بطريقة مبتكرة للجمهور بمختلف فئاته العمرية.
ومن الشخصيات البارزة على القناة "تاج" وهو مقدم برامج الأطفال والفنان الكوميدي المشهور والذي أصبح الآن جزءاً من فريق "إيه بي سي"، وسيقوم "تاج" بتقديم برامج خاصة بالأطفال وبرنامج ممتع خاص بعالم الطبخ، ومن البرامج الأخرى "كرايزي تي في" (Krazee TV) وهو برنامج للتسوق يعرض يومياً مزادات متنوعة بين الساعة الواحدة ليلاً حتى السابعة صباحاً، ومن المتوقع أن يتم توسيع نطاق هذا البرنامج ليشمل قنوات تلفزيونية أخرى.

description.hltext_display: 海信LED液晶能效水平分析
description.content:
http://www.chinairn.com发稿日期:2010-12-22
【打印文章】 【字号 大 中 小】 【关闭窗口】
【搜索关键词】：LED液晶产业研究报告 投资策略 LED液晶产业市场分析 发展前景 竞争调研 趋势预测
中研网讯：
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
【出版日期】 2010年12月 【报告页码】 350页 【图表数量】 150个
12月初，随着《平板电视能效限定值及能效等级》国家标准的实施，平板产业拉开新一轮洗牌序幕，市场资源将进一步向优势品牌集中。作为中国平板电视领军企业的海信不仅提前实现了平板电视能效全部达标，而且海信LED液晶电视全部达到了一级能效标准，海信成为推动中国彩电业绿色产业升级的急先锋。
据了解，从2007年起，海信就参与了平板电视能效标准制定工作，不仅推动平板能效标准尽快出台，而且积极进行产业升级、结构调整，今年7月，海信还发布了旨在引领产业绿色发展的《海信绿色发展纲要》，将绿色发展理念融入到企业经营的研发、采购、制造、服务等全过程。
海信电器营销公司副总经理胡剑涌介绍：“从1999年推出中国001号环保电视至今，海信始终注重研发、推广节能环保电视产品。截至目前，海信平板电视在绿色节能领域拥有专利600多项，居业内前列。通过动态背光控制技术、光感变频背光系统、机芯、电源等整机系统优化设计以及模组自制优势，目前海信所有平板电视产品全部实现达标，海信LED电视达到一级能效标准，明年海信研发规划的大部分新产品也都是一级能效产品”。
今年，海信获得“2010中国彩电行业绿色成就杰出贡献奖”和“绿色创新奖”的荣誉，海信最新上市的Hi-smart智能电视XT39系列、蓝擎LEDT29系列和K16系列液晶电视被评为“节能之星”。
平板能效标准的实施不仅加速了平板产业的整合和升级，也有利于消费者选购真正的绿色节能产品，具有节能环保技术优势的LED电视普及速度将进一步加快。
海信从2005年开始涉足LED液晶电视研发领域，2008年海信投产了中国第一条LED液晶背光模组生产线，推出中国首批LED液晶电视，据中怡康的统计数据显示，自2009年11月份以来，海信LED电视累计市场份额已超过30%，遥遥领先于国内外品牌。
绿色节能成为平板电视市场的主旋律，在LED液晶电视领域率先实现成功转型并高居中国LED市场龙头的海信，将获得更大的发展机遇和市场领先优势。
■ 与【海信LED液晶能效水平分析】相关研究报告

description.hltext_display: 대구도시가스, 24일 코스피 입성
description.content:
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=정금철 기자] 대구도시가스가 오는 24일 코스피에 첫발을 디딘다.
한국거래소 유가증권시장본부는 22일 대구도시가스가 24일 유가증권시장에 상장된다고 22일 밝혔다.
대구도시가스는 지난해 10월 대성홀딩스로부터 도시가스 사업부문 등의 물적분할로 설립됐으며 대성홀딩스가 대구도시가스 지분을 72.3% 가지고 있다. 대구광역시와 경상북도 일부 지역에 도시가스를 공급하고 있으며 올해 3분기 누계 매출액 5417억원, 당기순이익 128억원을 기록했다.
대구도시가스 주권의 시초가는 상장일인 24일 오전 8~9시에 공모가격(5400원)의 90~200%사이에서 호가를 접수해 매도호가와 매수호가가 합치되는 가격으로 결정되며 이 시초가를 기준으로 상하 15%의 가격제한폭을 적용한다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: James Franco to Open New Art Exhibit in Germany
description.author: MICHAEL PRESTON
description.content:
Hollywood's hottest renaissance man is taking his act abroad. "127 Hours" star and jack-of-all-trades James Franco is producing his first stand alone art gallery show in Germany, reports New York.
Franco had his art debut with "The Dangerous Book Four Boys," a multimedia experience that first showed at the Clocktower Gallery in New York's Tribeca neighborhood last summer. The new exhibit, which will be based at the Peres Projects galley in Berlin, will feature many of the same videos that were at the Clocktower show and will be supplemented with more drawings, photos and paintings.
Gallery owner Javier Peres said that Franco's particular brand of professional curiosity will likely gain an interested audience overseas. "An actor-artist like James is better received in Europe than in the U.S. He does other projects that people in the U.S. think are 'out there,' but in Europe avant-garde films are more mainstream," he said. The show is set to open during the Berlin Film Festival, at which Franco will be screening a new movie, naturally.
Suggested Reading: New York, ArtInfo, L Magazine

event_or_fact.property: Franco's particular brand of professional curiosity will likely gain an interested audience overseas.
out there,' but in Europe avant-garde films are more mainstream

description.hltext_display: Lower Your Electricity Usage - Simple and Easy Ways
description.content: Electricity consumptions can be a little bit stressful sometimes. There are plenty of ways to reduce the electricity consumptions. In this article I will show you the simplest and easy way to minimize your daily electric consumption. To reduce the consumption of electricity not only save money but nevertheless you're doing a part to protect the environment. I'll give you the simplest explanation how electricity help the environment. As we all know and the most common to generate electricity is through coal burning. Coal is a pure carbon and if merge with oxygen this will result to CO2 or Carbon dioxide which has a greenhouse effect. Before anything else let's start to deal with electricity conservation.To keep our home at adequate temperature is one way to reduce electricity usage. How can we achieve this? We can attain this by reducing the thermostat during winter and keeping it up during summer. The reason for this is electricity use in running furnaces and air conditioning system generates the major of our electricity consumption. It is best to maintain the thermostat around 70 degrees during winter and 78 degrees during summer.Check the insulation of your home. Defective insulated walls of the outside and crawlspaces allow cool air and warm to escape from the dwelling, the effect is air conditioner and furnace work harder to keep a pleasant temperature in our home. If your anticipating your home requires a good insulation, hire a professional and qualified to determine the problem areas, you can also provide solutions to assist your home more warm during winter and cool during summer.Old or outdated appliances consumes much energy compared to the new models which is more efficient. The star labeled in your appliances is 75 percent more efficient compared to manufactured in a few years ago. Did you know that other electric companies offer discounts to those appliances who generates less electricity during usage? Keep this as an opportunity.This is the most important that anybody can do. Turning off the appliances or any electricity usage when not in use. Leaving the television or lights on when no one is using is a waste of electricity and can add to a much greater power bills. If your going out in a room for about 15 minutes, turn everything off to lessen your electricity usage.Another thing is the incandescent light bulbs, replace this with florescent bulbs which uses lesser energy, burn brighter and it would last long compared to the typical light bulbs. Using them can lessen electricity usage and minimize your power bills in time.Use Home Electricity Monitor to know your daily or monthly bill. Even the average electricity your using. It is the best way to know our electricity bills. A huge number of Americans are using this and they achieve lesser energy consumption. Try to manage your home, appliances, individual appliances and small commercial. Check our website to know more about the usage of Electricity Monitor http://currentcost.net/.

description.hltext_display: Bromyard launches Bromyard Against Night-Time Disorder scheme
description.content:
A PARTNERSHIP which is calling time on troublesome drinkers has been launched in Bromyard.
Christmas could be a sobering time for some drunks thanks to the Bromyard Against Night- Time Disorder (BAND) scheme.
The partnership consists of eight town centre licensees who share information on antisocial drinkers.
Members have agreed to impose a blanket ban on any troublemaker who is barred from one of their venues.
The scheme has already seen seven people barred for 12 months.
A similar programme ran two years ago but was relaunched because several pubs have new licensees and owners.
They include Henry Topham of the Queens Arms, which re-opened in September following a lengthy closure.
The licencee and BAND chairman said the scheme could make Bromyard a friendlier place to drink at the weekend.
Mr Topham said: “I think the scheme will be effective in calming things down – being banned could help them change their behaviour.”
Sergeant Andy Scott said the scheme was needed due to a small minority of anti-social drinkers in the town.

event_or_fact.property: ?I think the scheme will be effective in calming things down ? being banned could help them change their behaviour.? Sergeant Andy Scott said the scheme was needed due to a small minority of anti-social drinkers in the town

description.hltext_display: Banana stems used for making paper in Jinghong
description.content:
Banana stems have been used for making paper in Jinghong, the capital city of Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, which is the first practice in China. [yunnan.cn]
Banana stems have been used for making paper in Jinghong, the capital city of Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, which is the first practice in China. [yunnan.cn]
Banana stems have been used for making paper in Jinghong, the capital city of Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, which is the first practice in China.
There are more than 100,000 mu land being used for banana cultivation in Jinghong. Every year, more than 100,000 tons of banana stems used to be scrapped here, which had caused serious pollution to the environment.
To improve the situation, a factory has been built here in June this year to produce paper by banana stems, stalks and leaves. The technology is the first practice in China’s paper-making field. (Editor:Minnie Mao)
Click here to view Chinese report

description.hltext_display: MAY'Sがワンマン・ライヴをニコ動で生配信！
description.content:
12月22日(水)16時32分配信 MAY'Sがワンマン・ライヴをニコ動で生配信！ 本格派R＆Bユニット、MAY'Sが、12月23日（木・祝）、東京・恵比寿The GARDEN HALLにてワンマン・ライヴ〈MAY'S X'mas Special Live 〜SING SING SING!!〜〉を開催！ その模様が「ニコニコ生放送」にて生配信されます。
MAY'S初となるこのクリスマス・ワンマン・ライヴでは、2010年にリリースするヒット・シングルはもちろん、過去のヒット曲やクリスマスにふさわしいナンバーなど、盛りだくさんな内容となる予定。“ゲレンデソングの女王”と呼び声の高いMAY'Sのステージに注目です！
またMAY'Sは、2011年1月19日に両A面シングル「君に届け... / WONDERLAND」をリリース。同シングル1曲目に収録される「君に届け...」は、2011年1月4日（火）より日本テレビ系にて毎週火曜深夜24:59〜より（一部地域除く・時間変更の場合あり）放送が開始される超人気アニメ『君に届け 2ND SEASON』のエンディング・テーマという大型タイアップが決定しています。まだ楽曲はお披露目されていないため、もしやクリスマス・ワンマン・ライヴで聴けるかも？ 会場ヘ足を運べない方も、生配信に注目です！
【関連記事】KG、リリース＆バースデー・イベントに超豪華女性ゲストが大集結！MAY'S初の“痛ラブ”ソング、着うたフル（R）解禁！ 特設ページでは“うたコミック”も公開、、を調べる 最終更新:12月22日(水)16時32分

description.hltext_display: ارتفاع قيمة الإيرادات في سوق أبوظبي الحرة بمطار أبوظبي الدولي بنسبة 44.5% خلال موسم الفورمولا ™1
description.content:
وقد قامت شركة أبوظبي للمطارات بالكشف عن هذه البيانات الإحصائية الجديدة خلال حفل لسحب جوائز السوق الحرة تم فيه الإعلان عن أسماء الرابحين، وذلك في حلبة مرسى ياس بأبوظبي مساء أمس، بحضور عدد من كبار المسؤولين في الشركة وحشد كبير من الجماهير.
وبهذا الخصوص، صرح حريز المر بن حريز، الرئيس التجاري لدى شركة أبوظبي للمطارات، قائلاً، "إن إطلاق الهوية التجارية لسوق أبوظبي الحرة بمطار أبوظبي الدولي في بداية العام الجاري شكل بمثابة رصيد استثماري ناجح ضمن محفظة الأصول التي تمتلكها شركة أبوظبي للمطارات، لما لها من آثار إيجابية انعكست من خلال كثافة حركة المسافرين وارتفاع القيمة الشرائية ونسبة الإيرادات بصورة واضحة، نظراً للفعاليات والأحداث التي يتم تنظيمها على مستوى عالمي في إمارة أبوظبي، وبالتحديد سباقات الفورمولا1 ™ ".
وأضاف بن حريز قائلاً، "واليوم، أود أن أنتهز هذه الفرصة لتهنئة الرابحين بجوائز السحب التابع لسوق أبوظبي الحرة، ونأمل بأن يستمر ضيوفنا الكرام من المسافرين وعملائنا من شركات الطيران بزيارة مطار أبوظبي الدولي والاستمتاع بكافة الامتيازات التي نوفرها لهم، من مرافق متطورة وعمليات تشغيلية ذات كفاءة عالية وخدمات متميزة".
هذا، وقد قامت سوق أبوظبي الحرة بتخصيص مجموعة مميزة من الهدايا الحصرية للمسافرين المشاركين في السحب، والتي تزامنت مع موسم سباقات الفورمولا1 ™ ، وقد شملت الجوائز على سيارة فيات إيطالية الصنع، موديل رقم 500، مقدمة من شركة فيات لصناعة السيارات، ومجسم لسيارة سباق الفورمولا من الذهب الخالص عيار 24 قيراط يبلغ حجمها 400 جرام، وأطقم من الساعات الفاخرة مقدمة من مجموعة روليكس العالمية للساعات، وقسائم شرائية لسوق أبوظبي الحرة بقيمة 15 ألف دولار أمريكي.
بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن سوق أبوظبي الحرة ستمنح أحد الرابحين جائزة حصرية تشمل تذاكر سفر على درجة رجال الأعمال وإقامة فارهة في فندق الفيرمونت بإمارة موناكو لحضور سباقات الفورمولا1 ™، التي من المقرر أن تعقد هناك في شهر مايو من العام المقبل.

description.hltext_display: Rånades på bilen av pistolman
description.content:
En man skulle sälja sin Audi via Blocket. När han träffade vad han trodde var den intresserade köparen på Östastigen i Ronna, hotade mannen honom och rånade honom på bilen.
Anmälan kom in till polisen vid 20.30-tiden på tisdagen och enligt den rånade mannen riktade tjuven en pistol mot hans mage. Polisen har inlett en förundersökning om grovt rån, men ingen skadades vid händelsen.
Rånaren, som körde i väg med bilen, var i 20-års åldern och klädd i svart mössa och svarta kläder enligt anmälan.
– Han tvingar till sig värstingaudin, säger Södertäljes stationsbefäl Kahan Ahlbäck som varit med om liknande händelser tidigare.

description.hltext_display: Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale to star in film set in Nanjing during the war.
description.content:
BEIJING, China - Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.
Zhang says shooting is to start Jan. 10. He says he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries.
Historians say the massacre, known in the West as the "Rape of Nanking," resulted in the slaughter of at least 150,000 civilians. China puts the number killed at 300,000, making it one of the worst atrocities of the World War II era.

event_or_fact.property: he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries

description.hltext_display: Groupon入华悬疑问点评
description.content:
【搜索关键词】：互联网产业研究报告 投资策略 互联网产业市场分析 发展前景 竞争调研 趋势预测
中研网讯：
Groupon的游戏只能有两种结局：要么吃掉别人，要么被别人吃掉。
Groupon首席执行官兼创始人安德鲁・梅森正站在重要的十字路口：是接受Google高达60亿美元的丰厚现金，还是选择独立运营争取上市。这决定了在未来Groupon是要成为规模超越Google的互联网行业巨头，还是会像YouTube一样在被收购后惨淡经营。现在，关键在于梅森是否要赌一赌。
今年11月，Google向Groupon发出收购邀约，报价从15亿美元一路上涨至60亿美元。最新的消息是：Groupon已经拒绝了Google的收购，并准备于2011年独立上市运营。
值得注意的是，自身正在洽谈“被收购”的同时，Groupon正在大肆进行海外收购。
今年5月以来，Groupon陆续收购了欧洲最大的团购网站Citydeal、日本最大的团购网站Qpod，12月又宣布收购了新加坡和菲律宾等地的三家亚洲网站以扩大在东亚和东南亚的版图。
目前，华尔街很多人都在猜测，还有哪家网站会合乎这家公司的胃口。与此同时，也有很多人在进行相反的猜测，哪个巨鳄会将这家公司一口吞掉。
对Google说不
Groupon拒绝的是Google的足足60亿美元，如果这笔交易成功，它将成为Google历史上最昂贵的一笔买卖，要知道在2008年Google收购DoubleClick时只花了32亿美元。
实际上最早有意向收购Groupon的并不是Google，而是美国的另一个互联网巨头――雅虎。10月份就曾传出消息，雅虎计划以20亿美元收购Groupon，这个报价很快被Groupon拒绝。
随后Google跳入战圈，首轮试探性报价25亿美元，Groupon对这个报价未作任何回应。甚至有该公司相关人员发表博客称该报价简直就是对Groupon的侮辱。11月，Google又试探性报价30亿美元，依然很快被Groupon拒绝。
Google第三季度的财报显示，目前该公司拥有至少334亿美元的现金，财大气粗的Google随后直接拍出60亿美元，终于把Groupon拉到谈判桌前。虽然双方对媒体依然保持沉默，但还是不断有内部消息流出，称Groupon正在认真的考虑这份报价。
可谈判最终还是走向破裂，Groupon拒绝了Google的这个收购交易，目前已经转而希望通过首次公开募股(IPO)来进行融资。
很明显，梅森想赌一把。事实上，梅森确实有筹码博一博。
美国风投公司光速风投伙伴的风险投资人表示，效仿Groupon公司的模式需要有强大的工作团队拓展新交易商和数百万客户参与交易，进入该业务的门槛可能较低，但是要想获得类似Groupon的发展规模却非常困难。
Groupon的发展速度很快，而那些复制Groupon模式的公司，包括雅虎、Facebook和Yelp等，其收入增幅都难以与Groupon相比。据称Groupon现在年收入可达5亿美元，而AllThingsD的报告则显示，目前Groupon的年收入已经达到了20亿美元，超出之前预计的盈利水平。当然，这20亿美元是所有Groupon用户的售额总值――包括需要返回商家的部分。
以上种种，绝非一朝一夕可以实现，所以Google宁愿以高价收购Groupon，也无意自行开发团购平台。
对于Groupon而言，拒绝巨头Google的高额收购是需要勇气的，不过Facebook以及正要收购他们的Google应该是Groupon最好的榜样。
四年前，Facebook拒绝了雅虎10亿美元的收购，如今，它们的市值高达500亿美元。要知道，在几年前，Facebook的年收入不足1亿美元，现在Groupon的年收入已经达到了5亿美元，看起来他们的潜力要远远高于Facebook。而当年的Google如果同意了雅虎的收购，那么Google也未必会发展成现在的巨鳄。
梅森就曾表示：“我不认为这是一个可以诞生于旧金山或Palo Alto的科技公司。Groupon对人力非常依赖，这与外界对硅谷创业的看法并不相同。”
记者找到了一段关于梅森的视频，在这段今年10月初拍摄的视频中，梅森表示：宁愿被麦当劳、埃克森石油、通用电气之类的公司收购，也不愿意将公司卖给Google。而拍摄这段视频的时候，Google还没有对Groupon提出收购。
Groupon不差钱
但也有业内人士认为Groupon之所以没有选择卖出主要还是认为这个价格没有达到心理预期。Groupon在中国的收购对象――拉手网的CEO吴波对《中国经济和信息化》记者表示：“梅森对自己公司的估值心理价位很可能已达到100亿美元。”
Groupon总裁索罗门此前在接受采访时甚至声称该站市场价值1万亿美元，团购不仅已经彻底打垮了离线广告，并且还是“互联网上前所未见的最大门类”。
目前Groupon拥有3100名员工，这个数字比创建于四年前的社交网站Facebook的员工人数超出1000多，是美国著名社交游戏公司Zynga员工人数的两倍多，是Twitter员工数量的九倍。这3100人中至少有80%是销售人员，如果说过去的互联网CEO更多的是和工程师打交道，那么Groupon的CEO梅森更多的则是和销售团队打交道。索罗门就在某次访问中宣称：“硅谷永远不可能诞生Groupon，因为在硅谷，技术人员享有更高的地位，他们更倾向于以技术的解决方案来对待问题。”
如果Groupon继续保持独立的地位，那么现年30岁的梅森将有更多时间去打造一个全球发展速度最快的公司。Groupon当前每年营收达到5亿美元，这一增长速度已把谷歌、亚马逊等网络先驱当年的发展速度甩在了身后。
Groupon被硅谷称为有史以来发展最快的企业，梅森认为Groupon取得成功有以下四个原因：Groupon是按营销效果付费(pay-for-performance marketing)，顾客只有走进商店后才会付费，这样产生的广告效果要远远超过传统的搜索引擎；给消费者带来惊喜和期待；帮助商家抓住客户；最后也是最关键的一点，梅森期望通过Groupon改变人们的消费模式，这是Groupon和以前的团购网站最大的不同――Groupon清醒地认识到自己的市场定位就是一个消费者服务公司和一个广告公司。
在拒绝了Google收购后，有消息人士透露，Groupon将进行新一轮融资。Groupon希望通过本轮融资帮助其在目前的230个市场以外进行扩张。目前Groupon正与多家公司进行磋商，而这些公司对Groupon的估值范围达到20亿美元至30亿美元。本轮资金将用于雇佣销售人员和维持其在团购网站中的领先地位。
Groupon继续保持独立的决定，可能得到了俄罗斯投资人DST的支持。DST在今年4月曾向Groupon注资1.35亿美元，该公司有从创新企业高管和风险资本家手中收购被投资公司股份的习惯，以缓解这家公司面临的收购压力。Groupon一直没有透露过详细的数据，但梅森已表示，他已经兑现了部分的持股。
游戏规则
市场如战场，在战场中已经称霸的一方，要么守住自己的地盘防范被别人霸占，要么继续扩大自己的地盘。梅森领导的Groupon显然属于后者。
在Google收购案谈判期间，Groupon于12月1日宣布，收购香港的uBuyiBuy、新加坡与菲律宾的Beeconomic以及台湾的地图日记，藉此进军中国香港、新加坡、菲律宾和中国台湾四地，成为Groupon攻入东南亚市场的桥头堡。
早在今年7月，梅森就曾流露出进军中国市场的念头。在某次会谈中谈到中国市场时梅森表示：“如果你所在的城市现在还没看到我的网站，将来一定会。”
10月初，国内知名团购网站满座网CEO冯小海接到来自美国的电话，对方自称是Groupon管理团队中的一员，希望能跟满座网进行接触，随后双方以电话和邮件的方式进行了沟通。
10月15日，Groupon邀请冯小海在上海浦东机场附近的华美达大酒店会面。
紧接着在中国进行了一次团购网站的“海选”，意欲了解中国团购市场的状况并伺机开展收购。
洽谈以乎并不顺利。他们的“选秀”活动引起了强烈的反感，有不愿透露姓名的团购网站CEO向记者表示：“整个会谈现场，Groupon的团队一直显得非常傲慢无礼，他们只是用电话通知我们过来，当我们赶到现场时发现整个过程看起来就像是面试一样――他们坐在里面，国内的团购网站负责人轮番进去进行会谈。”
冯小海看到这个情况以后，也觉得没有谈下去的必要，于是直接返回了北京。
此后Groupon选择和拉手网进行相关合作谈判，但双方分歧非常大。
10月18日上午，双方进行深层洽谈，有消息称Groupon要求占股49%。11月30日下午，拉手网传出消息，双方正式谈崩。
吴波介绍，Groupon给出了5亿美元的估值，不过要求控股49%。而拉手网曾经获得金沙江等投资方1000万美元的投资，如果Groupon实现控股49%，则成为拉手网第一大股东，这意味着拉手网创始人团队将失去拉手网的控制权。
“我们不想做第二个ebay，我们和Groupon此前一直就股权方面进行沟通。最后还是正式拒绝了他们的入股要求。”吴波说。
据记者和多家团购网站负责人了解得知，Groupon在世界扩张一般是采用直接收购当地最知名的团购网站的办法，今年5月，Groupon收购移动应用开发公司Mob.ly和总部位于德国的欧洲最大团购网站Citydeal，后者在欧洲17个国家有分站。6月，Groupon通过收购智利团购网站ClanDescuento的方式进入拉美市场。8月，Groupon进入亚洲市场，收购日本最大团购网站Qpod的多数股权并收购俄罗斯团购网站Darberry的多数股权。
吴波介绍：“Groupon在世界各地采用的是代理店的运营模式，在购买某团购网站的股份后，该团购网站即成为Groupon的分店，原来的创始人并不会享受到任何Groupon飞速发展的利益。”
“Either you let us in，or we will around you。”这是Groupon在收购谈判谈崩时对吴波撂下的狠话。
吴波在微博上表示：“我们会勇敢应战！”12月3日，拉手网推出台湾分站，宣布和Groupon的对台戏正式开打。
看来，Groupon的游戏里只能有两种结局：要么吃掉别人，要么被别人吃掉。
■ 与【 】相关研究报告

description.hltext_display: 증선위, 주가조작 코스닥사 주요주주 고발
description.content:
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=윤광원 기자] 증권선물위원회(위원장 권혁세 금융위원회 부위원장)는 22일 정례회의를 열고, 주가를 조작한 상장사 주요주주 등 5명을 불공정거래행위 혐의로 검찰에 고발했다고 밝혔다.
증선위에 따르면, 코스닥 상장사인 H사의 주요주주인 A씨는 주가가 떨어지고 거래량이 줄어 빚을 갚기 위한 주식 매도가 여의치 않자, 시세조종 전력자들과 함께 지난해 3~6월 차명계좌를 이용한 통정매매 등의 수법으로 H사 주가를 조작한 혐의를 받고 있다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: Cowboys to place Romo on IR
description.content: Arlington, TX (Sports Network) - The Dallas Cowboys are set to officially end the season of quarterback Tony Romo, and will place the starter on injured reserve. The team's website reported on Tuesday afternoon that the move was imminent. Romo hasn't taken a snap since October 25, when he suffered a fractured left collarbone in a 41-35 loss to the New York Giants. In six games this season, the Eastern Illinois product threw for 1,605 yards, 11 touchdowns and seven interceptions on 148-of-213 completions.

description.hltext_display: Janice Miller, 85; artist brightened lives, workplaces
description.author: Gloria Negri
description.content:
Janice Miller believed that life was beautiful and used her art, her sculpture, her fine sense of interior design, and her skill in arranging flowers to convince others to share her opinion.
John Miller, her husband of 61 years, recalled the many years she would get up at 4 a.m., drive from their Brookline home to the flower market on Albany Street in Boston to buy flowers, and deliver them by 6 a.m. to the Church of Our Savior in Brookline, where they worshiped. She chose flowers that would blend with the sermon for that week or a special observance.
Mrs. Miller, who pioneered the use of fine art in the workplace, brightening the walls and corporate meeting rooms of big-name business and industrial offices, died Dec. 12 at Sakonnet Bay Manor in Tiverton, R.I. Her husband said the cause of death was Alzheimer?s disease. The Westport Point resident was 85.
Although Mrs. Miller could have filled a gallery with her artworks in multimediums, she preferred to promote other artists, particularly those from New England, whose work she would find at galleries on Newbury Street, among other places.
She promoted them through Art for Industry, a small art leasing business she purchased in 1972 and operated for 25 years.
She started Janice Miller Interior Design in 1964 and operated it until 1995, when she retired.Mrs. Miller?s achievements were great considering the glass ceiling facing women in business, said her daughter Rebbeca of Highland Beach, Fla.?Mother was really in the forefront of women taking charge,?? she said. ?She went back to get her master?s degree so she could have validations of her capability. She wanted to make a statement about her life and at the same time support her husband. She was an excellent mother and wife. In her work she tried to broaden people?s perspectives . . . through the use of art.??Mrs. Miller had clients throughout the country who came to her after hearing of her work. In Massachusetts, she was especially known for her interior design at the Parkman House on Beacon Hill, listed as a historic landmark.
Another daughter, Patricia Keppler of Budd Lake, N.J., worked with Mrs. Miller on the Parkman House. She said that her mother worked hard to find items that were historically correct for houses on which she worked. For her interior design of the Parkman House, which was built in 1865, Mrs. Miller?s research was, as always, extensive.?Mother had amazing passion and creativity in all aspects of life,?? Keppler said. For the Parkman House, she ?researched every kind of antique store and spent hours?? searching for the correct era items ?from flooring to furniture to silverware.??In her modern-day interior design work, Mrs. Miller would interview clients ?thoroughly, using psychology,?? to ensure that her work captured the suitable ambience. In her Art for Industry work, Keppler said, her mother would change the artists she featured every six months. ?Mother had this remarkable ability in working under budget,?? Keppler said. ?She knew how to stretch a dollar.??Janice W. (Walker) Miller was born in Jacksonville, Fla., and grew up with her parents and grandparents in Athens, Tenn. She graduated from St. Mary?s High School in Sewanee, Tenn., and from Wesleyan College in Macon, Ga., in 1947 with a bachelor?s degree in fine arts.
About 1944, she met John Miller while he was in the Army in Georgia. When he enrolled at the United States Military Academy at West Point, N.Y., she took an art teaching post nearby with the Lowville public schools. They had a classic West Point military wedding in 1949.
After his graduation from West Point, John Miller served Air Force assignments throughout the country before the couple settled in Massachusetts in 1958. ?This is when Janice became very active in art locally,?? he said.They lived in Weston and then in Brookline, where Mrs. Miller taught art in the public schools. She also taught at what is now Bridgewater State University.
Although raising her family was her priority, Mrs. Miller took on another challenge, earning a master?s degree in fine arts at Boston University in 1966.?Over the years,?? her husband said, ?Janice amassed a sizable collection of unique works dominated by New England contemporary artists.??She donated 800 of them to BU in 1998, a university spokesman said. In 1999, the school honored Mrs. Miller with an award for distinguished service.?Janice was very committed to the arts, and she and her husband, John, were great benefactors and friends of Boston University,?? Walt Meissner, former dean of BU?s College of Fine Arts, said in a statement. ?They enabled us to share their paintings and their love of art, with students, faculty, and colleagues across campus.??Mrs. Miller also loved to host dinners at her home. ?Janice loved people and everyone loved her,?? her husband said. ?She had blue eyes, a wonderful smile, and was always doing nice things for people.??To her friends and her colleagues in the art world, Mrs. Miller will be remembered as one of a kind, a rare painting.?Janice Miller was a person of impeccable taste,?? said Belmont art historian Mary Crawford-Volk. ?Aided by her training as an artist, she brought to her work, and to her life, a sophisticated aesthetic sense that was unerring. It was manifest in the work she chose by contemporary artists for corporate locations in her Art for Industry endeavor.???It was manifest in her personal style [partial to blues and greens]. It was manifest in the extraordinary gardens she designed for her home in Westport . . . and in the gracious, informal manner she welcomed friends interested in the superb collection of modern prints. She was special.??In addition to her husband and two daughters, Mrs. Miller leaves two sisters, Laura Stamp of Charlottesville, Va., and Elizabeth Willson of Knoxville, Tenn.; three grandchildren; and three great-grandchildren.
Burial was private. A celebration of her life will be held after Easter, her family said.
Gloria Negri can be reached at negri@globe.com.

description.hltext_display: Police: Thousands of tons of wild animals smuggled through Vietnam to China in past year
description.content:
HANOI, Vietnam - Police in Vietnam say an estimated 4,500 tons of wild animals — mostly snakes, turtles and pangolins — have been smuggled through the Southeast Asian country during the past year.
Lt. Col. Vu Duyen Hai of the Department of Environmental Police says the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines.
Hai says the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials. He says he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals.
He said Wednesday that the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

description.hltext_display: Cool Inter-boss: Ingen fyring
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Inter lægger en foreløbig dæmper på spekulationer om, at træner Rafael Benitez snart bliver fyret.
Præsidenten i den italienske fodboldklub, Massimo Moratti, afviser således historier om, at spanieren allerede skulle være fyret.
- Jeg har hørt om det, og jeg har læst om kontakter, der skulle være lavet med andre trænere, men klubben har ikke lavet aftale med nogen anden træner, og det sker ikke, før situationen er afklaret, siger Moratti.
Med en aktuel syvendeplads i Serie A har Rafael Benitez ikke formået at løfte arven fra Jose Mourinho, som vandt både mesterskab, pokal og Champions League med klubben i fjor.

description.hltext_display: French Polynesia supplementary budget passed
description.content:
French Polynesia’s assembly has passed its 2010 supplementary budget after a previous vote was unsuccessful.
The government had the backing of 35 of the 57 members, with the Tahoeraa Huiraatira dropping its reservations and now approving the measure.
The supplementary budget was in part needed to maintain subsidies for food and fuel.
Earlier this month, the government was ten votes short when it tried to have it adopted.
One party leader, Jean-Christophe Bouissou, said after the vote late last night that the 2011 budget will be a different matter, suggesting more strain for the government to win the support needed.

description.content:
El Tesoro Extiende el DepÃ³sito Directo a Millones de Estadounidenses, Eliminando Gradualmente los Cheques Impresos para los Pagos de Beneficios Federales WRK. Noticias hispÃ¡nicas 21/12/2010 22:12h El cambio a los pagos electrÃ³nicos le ahorrarÃ¡ al Seguro Social mil millones
de dÃ³lares
WASHINGTON, 21 de diciembre de 2010 /PRNewswire-HISPANIC PR WIRE/ -- Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos dictÃ³ hoy la norma definitiva para extender la seguridad y conveniencia de los pagos electrÃ³nicos a todos los estadounidenses que reciban pagos de beneficios federales y no impositivos.
Cualquier persona que solicite beneficios despuÃ©s del 1 de mayo del 2011 recibirÃ¡ sus respectivos pagos de manera electrÃ³nica, mientras que quienes ya estÃ©n recibiendo cheques impresos deberÃ¡n realizar el cambio al depÃ³sito directo antes del 1 de marzo del 2013.
La campaÃ±a de educaciÃ³n pÃºblica Directo A Su CuentaÂ® del Departamento del Tesoro brindarÃ¡ informaciÃ³n a los estadounidenses acerca del cambio y de cÃ³mo serÃ¡n entregados los pagos de beneficios federales, y facilitarÃ¡ a los beneficiarios de cheques efectuar el cambio a travÃ©s de Internet o llamando al nÃºmero gratuito de la lÃ­Â­nea de ayuda."Ocho de cada diez destinatarios de beneficios federales utilizan el depÃ³sito directo, y ahora millones de otras personas retiradas, veteranos y otros estadounidenses tambiÃ©n recibirÃ¡n su dinero de la manera mÃ¡s segura y confiable -- electrÃ³nicamente," seÃ±alÃ³ el subsecretario fiscal del Tesoro, Richard L.
Gregg."Este importante cambio brindarÃ¡ ahorros significativos para los contribuyentes de los Estados Unidos, quienes ya no tendrÃ¡n que incurrir en el costo anual de $120 millones asociado con los cheques impresos.
Este cambio le ahorrarÃ¡ al Seguro Social mil millones de dÃ³lares durante los prÃ³ximos diez aÃ±os."DespuÃ©s de consultar a la opiniÃ³n pÃºblica acerca de la norma propuesta emitida en junio del 2010, se modificaron regulaciones federales para exigir que, en general, todos los pagos de beneficios federales --incluyendo el Seguro Social, Seguro de Ingreso Suplementario, Asuntos de Veteranos, Junta de Retiro Ferroviario, la Oficina de AdministraciÃ³n de Personal, y otros pagos no impositivos-- se realicen de manera electrÃ³nica.
Los beneficiarios tienen la opciÃ³n de recibir sus pagos por depÃ³sito directo en una cuenta de banco o cooperativa de ahorro y crÃ©dito que ellos escojan, o en una cuenta de una tarjeta de dÃ©bito Direct ExpressÂ® MasterCardÂ®.
MÃ¡s de 1.5 millones de beneficiarios se han inscrito en la tarjeta Direct ExpressÂ®, una tarjeta de dÃ©bito prepagada emitida por Comerica Bank --agente financiero del Tesoro-- que fue introducida por el Departamento del Tesoro en el 2008."Insto a todos los que reciben cheques impresos del Seguro Social o del Seguro de Ingreso Suplementario a cambiarse a los pagos electrÃ³nicos ya mismo, a travÃ©s de la campaÃ±a Directo A Su Cuenta, en lugar de esperar hasta la fecha lÃ­Â­mite," afirma el comisionado de la AdministraciÃ³n del Seguro Social, Michael J.
Astrue."Cambiarse ahora elimina el riesgo de que los cheques sean robados o extraviados, y le brinda acceso inmediato a su dinero el dÃ­Â­a de pago."En el dÃ­Â­a de hoy, el Tesoro estÃ¡ lanzando una campaÃ±a de educaciÃ³n pÃºblica para informarles a los estadounidenses acerca del cambio en la normativa y para ayudarlos a entender quÃ© necesitan hacer para recibir sus pagos electrÃ³nicamente, ya sea que ya estÃ©n recibiendo pagos a travÃ©s de cheques o que vayan a solicitar beneficios federales prÃ³ximamente.
Los beneficiarios actuales de cheques recibirÃ¡n informaciÃ³n junto con sus pagos y la campaÃ±a nacional tambiÃ©n incluirÃ¡ anuncios de servicio pÃºblico, un sitio en Internet que ha sido recientemente rediseÃ±ado -http://www.directoasucuenta.org-/ programas continuos sobre educaciÃ³n financiera y asociaciones con cientos de organizaciones locales, regionales y nacionales.
Personas que soliciten beneficios despuÃ©s del 1 de mayo del 2011: Las personas que soliciten beneficios federales por primera vez despuÃ©s del 1 de mayo del 2011 deberÃ¡n escoger una opciÃ³n de pago electrÃ³nico al momento de inscribirse para recibir sus beneficios.
Si desean dirigir su dinero a una cuenta de banco o cooperativa de ahorro y crÃ©dito, deberÃ¡n tener a la mano la siguiente informaciÃ³n en el momento de solicitar sus beneficios:
-- NÃºmero de ruta de la instituciÃ³n financiera (a menudo aparece en los cheques personales) -- Tipo de cuenta -- de cheques o de ahorro -- NÃºmero de cuenta (a menudo aparece en los cheques personales)Las personas que no dispongan de una cuenta en una instituciÃ³n financiera o prefieran recibir sus pagos en una tarjeta de dÃ©bito prepagada, podrÃ¡n obtener una tarjeta Direct ExpressÂ®.
Para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n, visite el sitio en Internet http://www.directoasucuenta.org/.
Personas que actualmente reciben pagos de beneficios a travÃ©s de cheques impresos: Los beneficiarios de cheques deberÃ¡n cambiarse al pago electrÃ³nico antes de la fecha lÃ­Â­mite del 1 de marzo del 2013.
Realizar el cambio de cheques al depÃ³sito directo es rÃ¡pido, fÃ¡cil y gratuito a travÃ©s del sitio en Internet http://www.directoasucuenta.org/, llamando al nÃºmero 1-800-333-1795 de la lÃ­Â­nea gratuita de ayuda del Centro de Procesamiento del Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos, o comunicÃ¡ndose con un representante de la instituciÃ³n bancaria o cooperativa de ahorro y crÃ©dito.
Personas que ya reciben sus pagos de beneficios de manera electrÃ³nica: Todas las personas que ya reciben sus pagos de beneficios federales electrÃ³nicamente continuarÃ¡n recibiendo su dinero como es habitual en su dÃ­Â­a de pago.
No es necesario realizar ninguna acciÃ³n.
Normas Relacionadas con el Tesoro
El Departamento del Tesoro estÃ¡ emitiendo una norma para brindarles a los estadounidenses que reciben beneficios federales mÃ¡s opciones para recibir sus pagos electrÃ³nicamente, asegurÃ¡ndose al mismo tiempo de proveerles protecciones apropiadas al consumidor.
A comienzos del 2011, el Tesoro emitirÃ¡ una norma para proteger los pagos de beneficios federales contra embargos despuÃ©s de haber sido depositados en cuentas.
Acerca de la Tarjeta Prepagada Direct ExpressÂ®
Si el depÃ³sito directo en un banco o en una cooperativa de ahorro y crÃ©dito no es una opciÃ³n viable, la tarjeta Direct ExpressÂ®, suministrada por Comerica Bank --agente financiero del Tesoro-- es una alternativa segura y conveniente a los cheques impresos para los pagos de beneficios.
El 94% de los titulares de la tarjeta seÃ±alan que se sienten satisfechos con Ã©sta, de acuerdo con una encuesta realizada durante la campaÃ±a Directo A Su Cuenta 2010.
Las ventajas de la tarjeta incluyen:
-- Los titulares de la tarjeta pueden realizar compras, pagar cuentas y obtener dinero en efectivo con sus compras en miles de tiendas de todo el paÃ­Â­s. -- Los titulares de la tarjeta tienen acceso a un retiro de efectivo gratuito con cada depÃ³sito en su cuenta de la tarjeta Direct ExpressÂ®.
(Por cada depÃ³sito que el gobierno federal realice en su cuenta, Comerica Bank le brindarÃ¡ un retiro de efectivo sin costo en cajeros automÃ¡ticos de los Estados Unidos.
El retiro gratuito otorgado con cada depÃ³sito expira el Ãºltimo dÃ­Â­a del mes siguiente al depÃ³sito en la cuenta de la tarjeta.
Para retiros de efectivo en cajeros automÃ¡ticos fuera de la red Direct ExpressÂ®, el propietario del cajero puede aplicar cargos adicionales).
-- No es necesario tener una cuenta bancaria ni realizar verificaciones de crÃ©dito.
-- Las cuentas de las tarjetas se encuentran aseguradas por la CorporaciÃ³n Federal de Seguro de DepÃ³sitos (FDIC, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) hasta el mÃ¡ximo permitido por la ley.
-- No existen cargos de inscripciÃ³n, cargos mensuales ni cargos por sobregiros.
Se podrÃ¡n aplicar cargos por servicios opcionales.
-- El dinero se encuentra disponible al instante, el mismo dÃ­Â­a del pago.
Para solicitar la tarjeta u obtener mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n acerca de sus caracterÃ­Â­sticas y cargos, puede visitar el sitio en Internet http://www.directoasucuenta.org/, llamar al 1-800-333-1795 o comunicarse con su oficina local del Seguro Social, de Asuntos de Veteranos, o de otra agencia de beneficios federales.
La campaÃ±a Directo A Su CuentaÂ® es patrocinada por el Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos y los Bancos de la Reserva Federal.
El logotipo de Direct ExpressÂ®, Directo A Su CuentaÂ® y Direct ExpressÂ® son marcas de servicios registradas, y el logotipo de Directo A Su Cuenta(sm) es una marca de servicio, del Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos -- Servicio de AdministraciÃ³n Financiera.
El Banco Comerica emite la tarjeta de dÃ©bito Direct ExpressÂ® MasterCardÂ®, de conformidad con una licencia otorgada por MasterCard International Incorporated.
MasterCardÂ® y el logotipo de MasterCardÂ® son marcas registradas de MasterCard International Incorporated.

description.hltext_display: Zapatero asegura que España cumplirá y que la reacción de los mercados no responde a los fundamentos del país
description.content:
MADRID, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
El presidente del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, ha asegurado que España cumplirá en 2010 las previsiones de déficit público, que pasan por situar el saldo negativo de las cuentas públicas en el 9,3%, y las de PIB por segundo año consecutivo, que prevén una caída de la economía del 0,3%.
Durante su comparecencia en el pleno del Congreso para dar cuenta sobre la última cumbre europea, Zapatero ha reconocido que la reacción de los mercados financieros está afectando a España aunque, a su parecer, es una reacción "que no responde" a los fundamentos de la economía española.
El jefe del Ejecutivo ha repasado el actual contexto económico y ha expresado "con claridad y firmeza" el compromiso de la UE de hacer "todo lo necesario" para garantizar la estabilidad del euro en el futuro y ha defendido la acción de la Unión Europea contra la crisis, a pesar de que no estuviera escrito que pudiera hacerlo en un momento en el que muchos de los estados miembros han atravesado "serias dificultades" propias.
"Y ha sido capaz, lo está siendo porque aún el peligro no está conjurado", ha señalado Zapatero, tras destacar la capacidad de la UE para sostener la fortaleza de la moneda común y la capacidad del sistema financiero.
A su parecer, la dirección que hay que seguir es la reforzar la gobernanza europea, la de incentivar la coordinación de las políticas comunes, la de afirmar la solidaridad con los países miembros a partir del compromiso de todos y cada uno de ellos con las exigencias de la Unión. "Éste es el camino que estamos recorriendo y por el que tenemos que seguir avanzando pues aún hay pasos que dar", ha indicado.
((HABRÁ AMPLIACIÓN))

description.hltext_display: シューゲイジング・エクスペリメンタル・ドゥーマーNADJA、bandcampを開設
description.content:
12月22日(水)16時32分配信 インプロヴァイズ / アヴァンギャルド・ミュージックの現場で幅広く活躍するマルチ・インストゥルメンタリストAidan Bakerと、ヘヴィ・ミュージック界で最も眼鏡の似合う女子ベーシストLeah Buckareffの2人によるシューゲイジング・エクスペリメンタル・ドゥーム・ユニット、NADJA（ナジャ）。彼らの運営するレーベル“Broken Spine Productions”が、bandcampを開設！
bandcampでは現在、NADJA及びAidan Bakerソロ作品の一部がダウンロードで購入可能。多作な上、そのほとんどが限定プレスのため、ヒーヒー言いながら追いかけている方も多いであろうNADJA / Aidan Baker作品の数々。bandcampでは試聴が可能ですので、買い逃して気になっていた作品の内容を確認するのにももってこい！NADJAファンは今後も要チェックです！
【関連記事】ダーティ・プロジェクターズ（DIRTY PROJECTORS）とビョークがコラボ・アルバムをリリースポスト・メタル / ハードコアの雄、ISISが解散を表明、を調べる 最終更新:12月22日(水)16時32分

description.hltext_display: Redstor announces successful 2010
description.content: Redstor, a leading managed services, cloud storage and IT solutions provider, has announced 2010 as one of its most successful years. It has continued to invest in its cloud storage strategy and the creation of a business grade backup and storage grid for its end users and growing partner community.

description.hltext_display: Should Not Be Forgotten Internet Marketing Tips
description.content: Internet marketing is nothing but selling products online. There are certain techniques that successful internet marketers use; below you will find out what they are.SEO can work wonders for your traffic but for some reason it is all but ignored by new internet marketers. With SEO, you have the opportunity to consistently get your site in front of thousands of people, for free, who are searching for a site similar to yours. The main reason that SEO is ignored by many marketers is because it takes a substantial amount of work upfront but they tend to forget how much traffic a front page position can bring to your site. Quite frankly, if you are ignoring search engine traffic then you are potentially leaving thousands of dollars on the table. Search engines such as Google and Yahoo! Have the potential to send thousands of visitors to your site in a short time period, so it would be smart to optimize your sites for them. There are other advantages to SEO besides affiliate marketing. Local businesses are selling a lot of products in getting lots of in store visitors because of their ranking. Basically all you have to do is give the search engines what they want. They can send you a windfall of traffic if you actually get ranked for your targeted keywords. SEO takes time to reap the rewards but those rewards can be huge and long lasting. If you're an Internet marketer who wants to reach out to his/her target audience with least effort, then you should consider starting a blog that targets your market. This will give you a platform to interact with your prospects/customers and know what they actually want. The golden rule of Internet marketing is to make your moves based on what your target market wants. With a blog, you have the ability to find out all about your target audience and to post content for them. Your blog will act as a vehicle to grow your reputation and at the same time drive traffic to your website. When you also consider that blogs are easy to rank with the search engines, you really should take the time to build a blog.You should also leverage the power of social media sites such as Twitter and Facebook in your internet marketing efforts. Just about everybody who uses the internet is a member of some social media site or another. These sites give internet marketers the ability to connect with people in their target niche. With Twitter, it's easy to target people based on their preferences and follow them or have them follow you. Facebook also gives you the potential to reach a very large number of people in your target market. You only have to take the time to participate on these social networks. Internet marketing takes some time, study and work, but if you are willing to commit to it, the rewards can be outstanding.

description.hltext_display: إتش بي تشحن أول محولات إي سيريزالحافظة للطاقة بمعيار IEEE الجديد لتسريع استخدامها من قبل العملاء
description.content:
أعلنت "إتش بي" أنها أول شركة تقوم بشحن منتجاتها الجديدة التي تعتمد معيار "إيثرنت" لحفظ الطاقة، لتمكين العملاء من الحد من الطاقة المستهلكة، وتخفيض تكاليف العمليات التشغيلية، التي تتطلبها المعدات التقنية.
تابع المقال في الأسفل▼
ويعمل معيار إيثرنت لحفظ الطاقة(IEEE 802.3az) على تخفيض معدل استهلاك الطاقة في الأجهزة التقنية، من خلال تعديل استخدام الطاقة آليا، بالاعتماد على حركة التدفق الفعلي للبيانات على الشبكة بين المحولات والأجهزة الشبكية الأخرى ضمن الوقت الحقيقي.
وتعتبر نماذج "إي سيريز zl" الجديدة من "إتش بي" أول نماذج IEEE لحفظ الطاقة تمكن المحولات من اتخاذ "وضعية السكون"، وكذلك الأجهزة الأخرى المتصلة بها، في حال عدم وجود حركة تدفق على الشبكة، الأمر الذي من شأنه تخفيض معدل استهلاك الطاقة على طرفي المحول والأجهزة الأخرى، مما يؤدي إلى تخفيض كلفة الامتلاك الكلية بنسبة 51%.
وأثناء النشاط المنخفض، تستطيع المنتجات التي تعتمد معيار إيثرنت لحفظ الطاقة، الدخول في "وضعية السكون" التي تستهلك طاقة أقل من المنتجات الموصولة إلى الطاقة وتبقى دون عمل لفترة من الزمن. لكنها تسمح للأجهزة المتصلة بالعودة للعمل فوراً عندما يتم إرسال البيانات، وذلك يوفر الطاقة بشكل كبير مقارنة مع الطاقة التي تستهلكها المحولات التقليدية، التي تقدم ارتباطاً محدوداً بين استهلاك الطاقة والتدفق الفعلي للبيانات على الشبكة.

description.hltext_display: 'China committed to building two more units at Pak's Chashma Nuclear Plant'
description.content:
China is committed to construct Unit no.3 and Unit no.4 of the Chashma Nuclear Power Plant (CHASNUPP) in Pakistan, Board of Investment (BoI) Chairman Saleem Mandviwala has said.
Addressing a press conference, Mandviwala said that the Memoranda of Understanding (MoU) worth 10 billion dollars had been signed with China to enhance power generation in the country, the Daily Times reported.
China helped Pakistan in constructing CHASNUPP-1, which started its commercial operations from September 2000, and the construction of CHASNUPP-2 also started with the help of China in 2005, and is expected to start power generation from 2011, he said.
Pakistan wants China to help in adding two more units to produce cheap nuclear electricity, he added.
Mandviwala also said a 6.5-billion-dollar worth MoU was signed between the China Three Gorges Corporation and the Alternate Energy Development Board to undertake development of 3,000MW of wind and solar power projects on a build, operate and own (BOO) or build, operate, own and transfer (BOOT) basis.
He said that many important MoUs could not be signed due to time constraints, and these would be taken up in the bilateral fora.
The agreements signed by the private sector would be executed immediately, while the government-to-government deals would take a little longer for implementation, he added. (ANI)

description.hltext_display: Gigabyte GTX 480 e 460, ventole a profusione
description.content:
Stampa Commenti (6) Condividi Buzz it
Gigabyte migliora il sistema di raffreddamento delle soluzioni GeForce GTX 460 e 480 adottando la propria soluzione WindForce. Per la prima un dissipatore a due ventole, per la seconda uno con tre ventole.
Gigabyte ha presentato una nuova GeForce GTX 480 dotata di raffreddamento WindForce 3X. L'azienda, nonostante l'uscita dei nuovi modelli GTX 500, vuole dare nuovo appeal alla propria offerta esistente. La GV-N480UD-15I Revision 2.0 sostituisce il dissipatore standard con una versione dotata di tre ventole e un grande radiatore con alette in alluminio. Il prezzo di questa proposta non è noto.
GV-N480UD-15I Revision 2.0
Questo prodotto non però l'unica nuova entrata nella lineup dell'azienda. Gigabyte ha infatti rinnovato anche la GTX 460 (GV-N460OC-1GI). La seconda revisione (nelle immagini vedete la prima versione e quella nuova) ha un PCB più lungo e una soluzione WindForce 2X con due ventole e tre heatpipe (contro le due della prima versione).
GV-N460OC-1GI Revision 1.0
GV-N460OC-1GI Revision 2.0
La scheda è overcloccata di fabbrica, lavora infatti a 715, 1430 e 3600 MHz rispettivamente per core, shader e memoria. Le specifiche standard sono pari a 675, 1350 e 3600 MHz. Il prezzo della revisione 2.0 dovrebbe essere simile a quello della proposta originaria.
