description.hltext_display: Aeroporto de Londres aumenta número de voos após caos aéreo
description.content:
Londres, 22 dez (EFE).- O aeroporto londrino de Heathrow, o maior da Europa, aumentará o número de voos após o caos dos últimos dias por conta da nevasca que atingiu o Reino Unido, onde os serviços ferroviários também se viram afetados.
Tal como informaram nesta quarta-feira fontes do Heathrow, dois terços dos voos devem operar, após a reabertura da pista secundária nesta terça-feira, uma vez que os serviços de limpeza retiraram totalmente a neve que a cobria desde sábado. Apesar de tudo, as autoridades do Heathrow pediram aos passageiros que entrem em contato com suas respectivas companhias aéreas antes de irem ao terminal aéreo, para garantirem que seus voos irão operar nesta quarta. "Agora trabalhamos com as companhias aéreas para voltar ao programa normal o mais rápido possível. Lamentamos muito pelos transtornos que o tempo causa a nossos passageiros", assinalou um comunicado do Heathrow. No sábado passado, o aeroporto se viu obrigado a fechar totalmente e funcionou sob condições mínimas nos três dias posteriores. Outros aeroportos britânicos advertiram que haverá problemas em seus serviços, especialmente os de Edimburgo (Escócia), Birmingham (centro da Inglaterra) e Gatwick (sul de Londres). Milhares de britânicos deviam ter viajado nos últimos dias ao exterior, segundo a associação de viagens Abta, que calcula em 4 milhões os cidadãos do Reino Unido que querem passar o Natal fora do país. No transporte terrestre, a linha de ferro Eurostar, que liga Londres a Paris e Bruxelas, terá nesta quarta-feira um serviço quase normal, pois 43 dos 53 trens irão circular, informou a companhia. A neve causou inúmeros transtornos nos meios de transporte britânicos, inclusive o ferroviário e rodoviário, o que criou problemas para milhares de pessoas que nesta época do ano viajam para celebrar o Natal fora de casa. Em algumas regiões da Inglaterra, os serviços ferroviários sofrem atrasos e alguns cancelamentos. Os responsáveis da rede rodoviária advertiram aos motoristas que viajem somente se for necessário, depois de muitos terem tido problemas para circular por causa da neve. . EFEOutros aeroportos britânicos advertiram que haverá problemas em seus serviços, especialmente os de Edimburgo, Birmingham e Gatwick

description.hltext_display: You Can Do With Internet Marketing Tips
description.content: Internet marketing is nothing but selling products online. In this article we will hand you some very powerful tips that successful marketers use everyday.The ability to produce targeted traffic to a site, or blog, is the lifeblood for all businesses on the net. That's one area where newer marketers drop the ball because they think all traffic is the same, and that is not true at all. But the real fact is that unless you're getting targeted visitors to your site, there is no way you will be able to gain anything out of your efforts. Always stay far away from sites that promise they can send you thousands of visitors to your site. Many of them use software that simulates traffic hits to your site, and if there is real traffic it will not ever convert to anything. You want to target your market and get real traffic from your market. You can see outstanding results from article marketing and search engine marketing using SEO. Article marketing hit really big several years ago, but the thing is that it can still work - but learn how to do it, first. With article marketing, you'll write them and submit to good article directories, and then hopefully readers will click through to your offers. With SEO, or search engine optimization, there's quite a bit you need to learn, and it isn't necessarily recommended for absolute newbies - although it is doable. People who use search engines are doing several things... sometimes it's just research, but if they're looking for a solution now, and you can give it to them, then you'll be in a good position to make a conversion. A tip that is worth remembering is that out of the box thinking can set you apart from the rest of the crowd. You can do what is proven to work and be successful but with one viral idea you can go really far, really fast. A little creativity can set you apart from the same humdrum techniques that consumers are used to seeing everyday. Do you want to be like everyone else, stuck in the matrix? Taking your marketing just one or two steps further than your competition with place you far ahead of them. For instance, instead of fearing PPC because mostly everyone else is failing at it, you should find good resources on the subject and study them like a college student is studying for their final exam. This is no secret, get good at the skills that you need to excel and then find ways to get the most out of your ideas, in ways that the majority of marketers aren't using.A pitfall of many new marketers is their perceived need to keep learning until they feel they are ready to take action. There are people who want to make money online and have been prepared long ago but they think they don't know enough. You can only get results from action. Buying a new book or course is not going to help you unless you actually apply the knowledge. The time is now. It may help you if you can just accept that there's a lot of work involved with IM, and then just try to deal fairly with people.

description.hltext_display: New Premier elected for Guadalcanal Province in Solomon Islands
description.content:
Anthony Veke is the new premier for Guadalcanal Province in Solomon Islands.
He polled 14 votes ahead of Walton Naezon who settled for five votes and the former Premier Stephen Panga received two votes.
Speaking to the Solomon Star after his victory, Veke said he was humble to be elected as the new premier.
“I want to thank my members for the trust and confidence vested on me to lead the province in the next four years,” he said.
The election went ahead smoothly at Tanagai School, west of Honiara amid allegations of bribery.
Mr Naezon has rejected claims from supporters of Veke that he promised between $11,000 to $15,000 dollars to lure provincial members to his camp.
Mr Veke’s supporters also allege Mr Naezon sought the services of former Guadalcanal militants to round up members and secure their support with large amounts of money.
The group claimed Mr Naezon was doing this with the backing of Malaysian loggers in the country.
However, Mr Naezon is denying loggers or ex-militants are involved in his campaign.
He said the allegations have been made up by people who do not want to see change in the province.
Mr Veke said his government will release their policy statement within 100 days in office.
“Briefly my government will like to see Guadalcanal Province united as one people,” he said.
“Also as one of the biggest provinces in the country with huge investment, our government will like to see resource owners partake any developments.”
Mr Veke is a teacher by profession.
SOURCE: SOLOMON STAR/PACNEWS

event_or_fact.property: the allegations have been made up by people who do not want to see change in the province
between $11,000 to $15,000 dollars to lure provincial members to his camp
his government will release their policy statement within 100 days in office
loggers or ex-militants are involved in his campaign

description.hltext_display: 金立手机：时尚生活情趣 M500首创荷塘互动游戏
description.content:
都市的生活压力大而又枯燥，于是随身携带的手机也就成为了放松的工具。第一眼看见金立M500手机就有一种爱不释手的感觉，其白色优雅的机身配上背面蓝色渐变的淡淡的兰色，不由把我带回了小时侯在荷塘边戏耍的尘封记忆，也不由的想起了童年时读过的朱自清文章。
金立M500是滑盖手机，推开键盘金立M500的按键设计非常人性化，而且除了配合荷花这个主题还在外观上进行了小小的调整。圆润的导航按键和透明材质都让这款手机看起来晶莹剔透，给人一种无比亲热的感受。
金立M500有很多种界面可以选择，但我惟独喜欢荷塘月色的界面，小鱼在游，荷花绽放，还能感觉天气季节的变化与关怀，在烦恼的时候好象提醒你：不要太着急和失落呀，生活就是简单而快乐的！
菜单方面，金立M500仍然采用的是一惯的十二宫格菜单，并且整个字体图表排列流畅。用户可以在三个主题之间进行切换，这样的话避免视觉疲劳。
作为平常喜欢听音乐的我，金立M500主打音乐功能，非常适合我的喜爱。试着听了一首张国荣《风继续吹》的老歌，戴上专门配送的价值98元的OVC耳机，不仅音质出色，而且充满震撼，不由的把我带回了大学的时代。同样该机还有Real影院、FM收音机、录音等功能。视频支持MP4格式，从实际效果来看还是比较不错的，画面也是比较的流畅。
金立M500还采用了300万像素摄像头，对于爱好摄影的我来说，这是一个很好的随身机器，我可以在不经意的游走中，拍下一个个美妙的瞬间，可自己平添许多美好的记忆。
总之，生活是由许多细节组成的，金立M500使人轻松又容易想起过去的美好时光，我正成为一个更加热爱生活而有情趣的人。

description.hltext_display: Christmas Message of His Beatitude Fouad Twal, Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem
description.content:
Below is the full text of the 2010 Christmas Message from His Beatitude Fouad Twal, Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem:
I welcome all of you journalists present here and thank you for your role in providing information and conscience formation, and for your commitment to the truth. The message of the recent Synod recognized your role: "We appreciate the role of the means of social communication, both printed and audio-visual. We thank you journalists for your collaboration with the Church in broadcasting her teachings and activities." (Nuntius 4.4)
To all of you and all the people of Israel, Palestine, Jordan and Cyprus, I wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year full of surprises at the global, local, and personal levels, and a year of peace and prosperity.
I greet the Bishops here present: Bishop Giacinto-Boulos Marcuzzo, our Patriarchal Vicar in Israel, and our new Auxiliary Bishop and Patriarchal Vicar for Jerusalem and the Palestinian Territories, Bishop William Shomali, who was ordained last May and comes with a new energy to help us in our mission. I also welcome Rev.Fr. David Neuhaus, SJ, our Patriarchal Vicar in Israel for the Hebrew-speaking Catholic community.
Like last year, I would like to present the important events that have happened this year, here in our Patriarchate. I would like to emphasize above all the positive events without, however, excluding the suffering and the concerns that remain.
1 -We thank our Holy Father for having convened the Synod for the Middle East, held in Rome from the 10th to 24th of October 2010. During that time, we were able to put our fingers on our wounds and our fears, and at the same time express our expectations and our hopes. The Synod called on Christians in the Middle East to live as true believers and good citizens, not distancing from public life, but involved in the development of our communities, whether in Arab countries or in Israel. The Synod also stressed the importance of ecumenical and interreligious dialogue. We hope that this dialogue will advance not only within intellectual circles, among scholars and theologians, but be a dialogue of life, for all segments of society. The Synod condemned violence, religious fundamentalism, anti-Semitism, anti-Judaism, anti-Christianity and Islamophobia, and called on religions “to assume their responsibilities in promoting dialogue among cultures and civilizations in our region and in the entire world.” (Nuntius 11)
2 - Religious tourism and pilgrimages in the Holy Land are experiencing record numbers. In November 2010, three million people have visited the Holy Places. This number could still increase to arrive at nearly 3.4 million visitors, a figure never reached before, even in 2000, the Jubilee Year, which recorded very significant results. This reflects the universal dimension of Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Nazareth, the welcoming reception extended to pilgrims by our people and our Churches, and the good work of the Ministries of Tourism in Israel and Palestine.
3 - I wish to highlight the improvement in the process of obtaining visas for religious, seminarians and volunteers. I thank all those who worked to achieve this result. We still have a long way to go.
4 - On December 7th, talks resumed between the Holy See and the Palestinian Authority for the application of the basic agreement signed in 2000. The deliberations focus on religious freedom and fiscal legislation. We pray for the success of these negotiations and those already under way with Israel.
5 - Last November, I had the joy of visiting several countries in Latin America: Chile, Argentina, Colombia, and Honduras. I met with the bishops of these countries, top government and civilian authorities, and especially our faithful living in the ‘diaspora.’ In Chile alone, there are over 400,000 who emigrated between 1900 and 1950, because of poverty and security problems. Now they are all well integrated into the local society, and many have expressed their willingness to support our projects in the Holy Land and come on pilgrimage.
Among the major projects that the Latin Patriarchate is trying to accomplish, I would like to mention: the new pediatric hospital in Bethlehem which will be named after Pope Benedict, the University of Madaba, which will open in October next year, and the new Pilgrims’ Center in Jordan, on the site of the Baptism of Christ.
6 - We were very concerned about the fire that destroyed entire forests in the Haifa area. We offer our condolences to the families of victims, and our admiration for the courage of those who died in the line of duty. This sad event made us experience international solidarity. The fact that the Palestinian Authority made available their team of firefighters was a very significant gesture and may be a beginning of a fruitful collaboration in the future, when peace will be stablished in this troubled land.
7 - We suffer from the failure of direct peace negotiations between Israel and the Palestinian Authority. This should not lead us to despair. We continue to believe that on both sides, and in the international community, there are men of goodwill who will work and put their energies together in their commitment for peace. We believe that nothing is impossible with God and we want to carry out the wishes sang by the angels on Christmas night : "Glory to God in the highest and on earth peace to those on whom his favor rests.”(Lk.2 :14) We also wish Europe to play a more significant role in this process.
8 - We were shocked and troubled by the massacre of Christians in Baghdad in the Church of Our Lady of Perpetual Help. These innocent victims are added to the thousands of victims of fundamentalism and violence afflicting our world. Readily, I echo the words of Pope Benedict: "Given the violence that continue to tear the peoples of the Middle East, I would like to renew my urgent appeal for peace. Peace is a gift of God. It is also the result of efforts by men of good will, of national and international institutions, all working together to put an end to all violence! "
Dear friends, let me conclude this message with my good wishes for a reconciliation between our peoples, the Israelis and the Palestinians. It is time to commit ourselves together for a genuine, true and long-lasting peace.
May the joy of Christmas be in our hearts and peace upon all of you. Merry Christmas!
+Fouad Twal, Latin Patriarch

description.hltext_display: L'hésitation est de mise sur le CAC40
description.author: Mathilde Golla
description.content:
L'indice vedette de la place de Paris qui a bien progressé au cours des deux dernières séances est indécis en début de séance, dans l'attente des statistiques américaines sur la croissance. Hermès continue de flamber en Bourse.Le CAC40 marque une pause ce mercredi au lendemain de deux séances de hausse consécutive et avance très légèrement à 3928,49 points. Les inquiétudes sur les dettes et les avertissements de Moody's sur la Grèce et l'Irlande pourraient peser sur les décisions d'investissement. L à l'inverse des Bourses asiatiques qui ont achevé la séance en repli. Les regards seront tournés ce mercredi vers les Etats-Unis qui publieront leur chiffre de croissance pour le troisième trimestre cet après-midi.
L'indice Nikkei de la terminé la journée de mercredi sur un repli de 0,23%, les investisseurs, déçus par les statistiques du commerce extérieur japonais et précautionneux avant un jour férié, ayant choisi d'empocher des bénéfices, selon des courtiers.
Les publications statistiques seront nombreuses ce mercredi. Outre, le PIB américain sur le troisième trimestre, les investisseurs s'intéresseront aux reventes de logements. En Grande-Bretagne, les chiffre de la croissance sur le troisième trimestre seront également dévoilés ainsi que la balance des paiements et les minutes de la banque d'Angleterre. Au moment ou , les chiffre de l'endettement sur 2010 tombent. Sans surprise, . Ainsi, la dette nette publique de l'État américain a augmenté de plus de 2.000 milliards de dollars sur l'année fiscale 2010. Même constat pour le Royaume-Uni: le déficit public du pays s'est creusé plus que prévu en novembre pour s'établir à 16,8 milliards de livres (19,8 milliards d'euros) sur un mois, soit 2 milliards de plus qu'en novembre 2009. Les endettements allemands et français atteignent des records.
Du côté des valeurs, Veolia prend la tête du classement avec un gain de 0,8%. Le de chiffre d'affaires sur un an pour l'exploitation de trois liaisons régionales en Bavière, confirmant ainsi une information de La Tribune. Ce contrat est le plus important de Veolia Transport en Allemagne.
Total est également bien orienté avec un gain de 0,4%. Le groupe pétrolier a annoncé via son partenaire Amyris dans le but de produire une série de produits biochimiques. En s'associant avec des entreprises brésiliennes, Total souhaite pouvoir revendiquer 5% à 10% de la production de la canne à sucre au Brésil d'ici 2020.
LVMH se replie légérement. Le groupe a indiqué qu'il détient plus de 20% d'Hermès (+3,4%) à la suite d'achats sur le marché et hors du marché, poursuivant sa montée dans le capital du groupe, tout en réaffirmant ne pas envisager de prendre le contrôle ou de lancer une OPA.
Par ailleurs, l'américain Genzyme serait, selon le Wall Street Journal, désormais davantage disposé à discuter avec le groupe Sanofi-Aventis (+0,2% à 49,3 euros). Le laboratoire américain affirmait jusqu'à présent son hostilité à toutes négociations tant que Sanofi n'aurait pas relevé son offre, jugée insuffisante.
Le comité d'entreprise d'EDF (0,1% à 31,9 euros) va essuyer près de 90 millions d'euros de pertes cette année et s'impose un Hors CAC40, Ingenico (-2,8% à 26,7 euros), qui a rejeté dimanche une offre sur l'intégralité de la société, a fait savoir mardi soir qu'iet ne menait aucune discussion sur son capital.
LIRE AUSSI : » Ls'effrite en fin de séance

description.hltext_display: 金立手机：从荷塘系列手机看国产手机差异化创新
description.content:
金立今年推出的荷塘系列手机，整个系列产品以荷塘为主题，并邀请民族歌手凤凰传奇出任产品形象代言人。凤凰传奇的同名单曲《荷塘月色》在9月正式发布后人气居高不下，网友对其更是嘉奖不断。最近在新浪年度国产手机投票中，荷塘系列音乐手机的票数也是比较高的。
多年来始终专注于手机领域的金立，从2009年起也先后推出了内置开心网的N98、专为女性设计的I8、拥有强大生活导航系统的A696等定制化产品，近期推出的金立音乐手机荷塘系列和本色系列手机，更是实现了从外观设计、应用功能、营销推广的全面创新。
“基于对用户深入研究的差异化创新，将成为金立着力打造的核心竞争力。”金立集团董事长兼总裁刘立荣表示。金立荷塘系列手机已成为成为金立差异化创新的集中体现。除了应用自主研发的荷塘FLASH桌面互动游戏之外，荷塘系列手机在外观上也充分体现了“荷塘”的元素。“后续我们还会在接下来的产品中植入‘我的荷塘’系统，这也是国内首款无线互联游戏平台。”刘总介绍。而本色系列手机三款手机外观功能上也都有所创新，最近打造的网络活动“就是要本色”更是吸引千人参加，发表本色宣言。
联想集团CEO杨元庆在乐phone上市时也表示“联想的优势在于更了解中国的胃口，比苹果拥有更广更深的渠道。”在营销手法上也采取了“傍大款”的有效方式。
显然，以联想、金立为代表的国产手机领军企业，已经意识到了差异化创新的重要性，并在产品上迅速跟进。荷塘系列、本色系列让人眼前一亮，中国手机企业围绕应用功能和外观设计的创新，显然更符合中国用户的口味，再配合差异化的营销手段，将为国产手机打出一片新天地。

description.hltext_display: Giá dầu sát mốc 90 USD/thùng
description.content:
Giá dầu thô tiến sát mốc 90 USD/thùng - Ảnh: Bloomberg
(TNO) Phiên giao dịch 21.12, giá dầu thô tại New York (Mỹ) tiếp tục tăng nhẹ và tiến sát mốc 90 USD/thùng.
>> Giá sữa đồng loạt tăng 10% / Hàng hóa tăng giá theo thời tiết / Cái khó của ngân hàng nhỏ
Ghi nhận tại thời điểm chốt phiên 21.12 (vào rạng sáng nay, 22.12, giờ VN), giá dầu thô giao kỳ hạn tháng 2 tại Sở Giao dịch hàng hóa New York (NYMEX) đạt mức 89,82 USD/thùng, tăng 45 cent, tương đương tăng 0,5% so với phiên giao dịch đầu tuần.
Đây là mức chốt phiên cao nhất ghi nhận được kể từ phiên 7.10.2008. So với hồi đầu năm nay, giá dầu tại NYMEX đã tăng tới 13%.
Giá dầu thô Brent giao tháng 2 tại London (Anh) chốt phiên 21.12 ở mức 93,2 USD/thùng, tăng 0,5% so với phiên đầu tuần, mức chốt phiên cao nhất kể từ 1.10.2008.
Phiên này, giá dầu thô tăng nhờ thông tin khả quan từ khu vực bán lẻ của Mỹ. Theo thống kê của Hội đồng Quốc tế các trung tâm mua sắm (ICSC) (trụ sở tại New York) phối hợp với Goldman Sachs, doanh số bán hàng của toàn ngành bán lẻ Mỹ tính riêng trong tuần trước (từ 13 đến 19.12) đã tăng tới 4,2%.
Theo nhận định của Michael Lynch, Chủ tịch Strategic Energy & Economic Research tại Winchester, Massachusetts (Mỹ), sức mua sắm trong những dịp nghỉ lễ tại Mỹ hiện đang rất mạnh mẽ, chính điều này sẽ giúp giới đầu tư lạc quan hơn vào tương lai của nền kinh tế số một thế giới trong năm 2011. Doanh số bán lẻ trong các dịp nghỉ lễ là một chỉ báo kinh tế quan trọng đối với kinh tế Mỹ.
Một nguyên nhân khác giúp giá dầu thô đi lên là thông tin lượng nhập khẩu dầu thô của Trung Quốc - khách hàng lớn thứ hai trên thế giới - trong tháng trước đã tăng gần gấp đôi, lên mức 1,44 triệu tấn. Bloomberg cho biết Trung Quốc sẽ tăng giá xăng lên mức 310 tệ/tấn (tương đương 47 USD/tấn) và tăng giá diesel lên mức 300 tệ/tấn.
Trước đó, Goldman Sach đã có báo cáo phân tích tốc độ lạm phát tại Trung Quốc trong tháng 11 vừa qua ở mức cao nhất trong vòng 28 tháng trở lại đây, điều này sẽ khiến chính phủ nước này có thể tăng lãi suất đồng nhân dân tệ trong năm tới, từ đó sẽ giảm lợi thế của Trung Quốc khi giao dịch trên thị trường dầu thô quốc tế.
Một khảo sát của Bloomberg tiến hành cho thấy, các chuyên gia phân tích kỳ vọng tăng trưởng GDP quý 3/2010 của Mỹ ở mức 2,8%. Báo cáo chính thức của Bộ Thương mại Mỹ về vấn đề này sẽ công bố tối nay (giờ VN).
Sau thời điểm chốt phiên, Viện Dầu mỏ Mỹ (API) công bố báo cáo tuần cho thấy dự trữ dầu thô tại Mỹ trong tuần trước (tính tới ngày 17.12) đã giảm mạnh 5,8 triệu thùng, xuống còn 342 triệu thùng. Thông tin này đã giúp giá dầu thô tăng lên mức 89,99 USD/thùng, ghi nhận lúc 3 giờ 34 phút (ngày 22.12, giờ VN).

description.hltext_display: Launching of CCTV camera system in Sri Lankan capital postponed
description.content:
* Dec 21, Colombo: The scheduled launching of the Closed-circuit television (CCTV) surveillance camera system for today in Sri Lankan capital Colombo has been postponed due to unavoidable circumstances, police said.
According to the police spokesman SP Prishantha Jayakody the launching has been rescheduled for December 29.
The government has set up CCTV surveillance cameras in major cities to enhance the security and combat crime. A network of 108 cameras has been set up at vantage points in the Colombo city.
Defense Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa had proposed the installation of security surveillance cameras in the cities a year ago but it was being delayed due to heavy cost of the technology.
In May this year, a team led by the head of the project, Senior DIG Gamini Navaratne, underwent a week-long training programme in Singapore on the usage of the CCTV system.
ColomboPage - Recent 10 Stories

description.hltext_display: 台积电有优势应对IBM技术竞争
description.content:
近年来IBM技术阵营不断坐大，Global Foundries与三星电子(Samsung Electronics)不仅全力争取人才及订单，在技术上亦加速追赶台积电与联电，值得注意的是，IBM阵营将于2011年1月于美国举办通用平台(Common Platform)技术论坛，揭露20纳米以下制程蓝图，颇有鸣鼓备战意味。对于竞争对手节节进逼，台积电董事长张忠谋显得老神在在，他认为，IBM技术已不是强大竞争对手，台积电在生产与伙伴关系上领先同业，是台积电成功关键。
IBM多年来在半导体先进制程领域可说是产业先驱，并将技术授权给晶圆代工厂，包括Global Foundries、三星、中芯及华润上华等，让这些晶圆代工厂能够快速取得技术，并进入量产，以中芯为例，取得IBM 45/40纳米制程技术进入量产后，未来在价格上恐将对台积电、联电造成影响。
在先进制程方面，包括IBM、三星、意法半导体(STMicroelectronics)与Global Foundries等联盟会员，为抢攻28纳米制程市场，日前宣布将进行厂房同步化，导入IBM联盟28纳米制程技术，未来一款芯片设计可望拥有多座晶圆厂产能支持，藉此吸引客户上门。
在客户设计环境方面，因应台积电推出开放创新平台(Open Innovation Platform;OIP)，IBM阵营亦不遑多让，力推通用平台，并将于2011年1月18日于美国举行技术论坛，将由IBM、Global Foundries与三星共同发表最新32/28纳米低功耗高介电层/金属闸(High-K Metal Gate;HKMG)，同时将揭橥20纳米以下制程蓝图，并邀集设计自动化(EDA)、硅智财(IP)等供应链伙伴共同参展，以壮大IBM阵营声势。
张忠谋20日以”台积电筚路蓝缕20年”为题进行演讲时指出，台积电成功关键在于掌握技术、生产，并且拥有稳固伙伴关系，若以此标准来看，Global Foundries主要技术来源是IBM，但IBM技术已不是强大竞争者，三星与英特尔(Intel)技术虽然顶尖，但在伙伴关系上都无法与台积电相比。
张忠谋表示，台积电目前是半导体业最重要公司之一，与英特尔、三星是三强鼎立，其中，三星是内存龙头，英特尔在高阶微处理器发展得很好，一如奔驰车路线，但台积电能成为三巨头之一，是因为台积电像汽车产业的丰田(Toyota)，以好的技术、高生产效率及合理价格，与顾客建立良好伙伴关系。
事实上，台积电在技术研发上亦相当积极。张忠谋强调，尽管台积电在成立之初技术相对落后，但由于把技术提升当作最重要事情，不断投入研发，才造就今日的成就。台积电2010年研发费用达到新台币360亿元，超过工研院全年预算，2011年研发经费上看500亿元，产量跻身世界第2，目前市值约新台币1.9兆元，逼近2兆元，是台湾最大的单一公司。

description.hltext_display: C-Water propõe purificação da água de superfícies
description.content:
Design, Água, Meio ambiente
Comentários (0)
Para deixar um comentário você precisa se identificar. Escolha um dos tipos de identificação abaixo:
Fazer login com Abril ID ou Fazer login
com Facebook
São Paulo – O designer chinês Chao Gao criou um pote plástico que “produz” água fresca. A idéia do designer é oferecer um objeto útil, prático e barato. A promessa é que o objeto evapore água salgada – e até água de esgoto – através do calor gerado pela luz solar.
O C-Water baseia-se na destilação: o objeto é colocado sobre qualquer superfície de água e, quando o líquido evapora, sobra apenas água limpa – que escorre para uma parte separada do objeto. É aplicável às zonas húmidas, praias, barcos, esgotos e outros lugares.
O objeto é portátil, o que o torna prático para viajantes. O C-Water foi um dos vencedores do Incheon International Design Awards.

description.hltext_display: 沃尔沃S60明年入华
description.content:
经济观察网 实习记者 王琛元 12月20日，瑞典沃尔沃汽车有限公司产品总监白柯南(DanielBackman)在接受采访时表示，2011年沃尔沃将为中国市场引进S60，但总的产品格局保持不变。
S60是沃尔沃新基因的代表，主打运动型和豪华型风格，白柯南希望沃尔沃S60在中国市场的表现超过S40。
目前沃尔沃在中国销售的产品涵盖六大系列、20余款型号，价格区间从24.8万元至148万元，包括S40、S80L加长版、C30、C70、XC60和XC90，其中，S40和S80L已实现国产。
作为衔接S40和S80L的S60，去年已有以进口车形式导入中国的计划，但因为中间出现的一些不确定因素，沃尔沃S60引进中国的时间比预计推迟。白柯南表示，S60将是沃尔沃中国明年唯一一款全新产品，预计明年第一季度上市，其他产品都会进行小改款。

description.hltext_display: Bruxelles souhaite un service minimum pour les aéroports
description.author: lefigaro.fr
description.content:
La Commission européenne réclame des explications aux responsables des aéroports européens, incapables de gérer la situation après les intempéries du week-end.Des perturbations «inacceptables» selon Bruxelles. Le transport aérien européen est accusé d'impréparation et de manque de transparence vis-à-vis des passagers retenus dans les aéroports, après les intempéries survenues depuis le week end dernier. La Commission européenne a fait part de sa colère par la voix de son commissaire aux Transports, Siim Kallas, qui a évoqué la possible mise en place d'un «service minimum» dans les aéroports de l'Union européenne.
Avions cloués au sol par la neige ou le verglas, voyageurs condamnés à passer la nuit à l'aéroport, manque d'informations : ces scènes se sont multipliées depuis dimanche dans plusieurs aéroports européens. Parmi les plus touchés : l'aéroport d'Heathrow à Londres et celui de Francfort, mais aussi celui de Bruxelles ou encore de Roissy-Charles-De-Gaulle à Paris. Des perturbations qui surviennent en pleine période de grands départs pour les vacances de Noël.
«Je suis extrêmement préoccupé par le niveau des perturbations que la neige a causé pour voyager en Europe. C'est inacceptable», a affirmé mardi le commissaire aux Transports, Siim Kallas, qui prévoit de demander des explications aux représentants des aéroports. Une réunion devrait se tenir en janvier, a-t-il précisé, avant de brandir la menace de mesures législatives «sur les exigences de service minimum pour les aéroports». Des déclarations qu'Aéroport de Paris (ADP) n'a pas souhaité commenter, alors que le trafic reprenait progressivement mardi, avec des retards d'environ 50 minutes à . «Défaut d'information»
Le gouvernement français a aussi haussé le ton contre les compagnies aériennes. La ministre de l'Ecologie, Nathalie Kosciusko-Morizet, leur a notamment reproché «un défaut d'information». «En théorie, les compagnies aériennes sont responsables de l'information des passagers. Là, il y en a qui ont été débordées, notamment du fait de la fermeture d'autres aéroports européens», a déclaré la ministre sur France Info, reconnaissant toutefois qu'il était impossible aux compagnies aériennes d'échapper à des retards de vols.
Le directeur exécutif d'Air France-KLM, Pierre-Henri Gourgeon, n'a toutefois pas attendu les reproches du gouvernement pour faire son mea culpa. Mardi matin sur Europe 1, il a présenté ses «excuses à tous les passagers parce qu'on ne peut pas trouver assez de chambres à Roissy». Il a également reconnu une «faiblesse» dans la communication aux passagers : «Pris par le rythme des opérations et des décisions à prendre, nous ne faisons pas assez d'efforts pour donner aux passagers des informations sur le fait qu'on ne sait pas encore quand on repartira, mais qu'on y travaille», a-t-il assuré.
En Grande-Bretagne, des militaires pourraient aider à améliorer la situation dans les aéroports britanniques. A Heathrow, un des premiers aéroports européens, seul un tiers des vols étaient assurés mardi, tandis que d'importants retards y étaient annoncés. Les voyageurs avaient reçu pour consigne de ne pas se déplacer à moins d'avoir reçu confirmation de leur vol auprès de leur compagnie.
LIRE AUSSI : » peinent à résorber les difficultés
» Pour plus d'informations : le site et le compte twitter d'Aéroports de Paris

description.hltext_display: Fed extends currency swaps
description.author: Neil Irwin and Howard Schneider
description.content:
The Federal Reserve will extend its program to make dollars available to central banks around the world through next summer, reflecting continued strains in European financial markets that could endanger the world economy in 2011.
The announcement by the Fed on Tuesday came amid signs that the fiscal crisis that has roiled Europe for much of the year continues apace, despite a series of efforts by the European Union, International Monetary Fund and European Central Bank to staunch it.
The Fed initially created swap lines with the European Central Bank, Bank of England, and other counterparts in advanced nations around the world during the thick of the 2007-2009 financial crisis, then resurrected the program in May 2010 when financial strains appeared in Europe. The lines were scheduled to expire Jan. 31, but now will be extended through at least Aug. 1.
Essentially, the Fed swaps dollars for euros, pounds or other currencies with a foreign central bank, which in turn can lend dollars to banks in its nation that are experiencing a shortage of dollars. The eligible foreign central banks, which also include those in Canada, Switzerland and Japan, protect the Fed against any losses. The program has been little-used this year, with only $60 million in outstanding lending last week (by contrast, a year earlier, the figure had been $14.4 billion).
Though the swap lines are little used now, the decision to keep them in place carries some symbolic weight, showing that the Fed stands behind efforts to address the European crisis, which Fed officials fear could affect the U.S. economy if it spirals out of control. "These swap lines are essentially the Fed's only available policy response to stresses involving the European sovereign debt crisis," said Michael Feroli, an economist at J.P. Morgan Chase.
European markets continue to grapple with a series of problems - from high government debt to a still-troubled banking system - with no clear resolution. Emergency bailouts have been required in Ireland and Greece this year, and there is concern that markets may abandon Portugal or Spain next.
On Tuesday, Moody's rating service warned that it may downgrade Portugal's bond rating next year, as the country struggles to keep its economy on track while making deep cuts in government spending. Spain, meanwhile, was forced to pay a higher price in its latest sale of short-term bonds. Some analysts fear that the large amount of money that Spanish governments and banks must raise early next year may undermine the country's creditworthiness.
Also Tuesday, ratings service Fitch said it is conducting an assessment of Greece's creditworthiness over the next six weeks that could result in the nation's debt being cut to junk bond status, if it is downgraded below its current BBB- rating.
As part of the continent's crisis response, the European Central Bank has been buying tens of billions of dollars in government bonds, and also has become a mainstay source of funds for banks that have trouble raising money on their own.
While the ECB has made clear its intent to make sure the region's banks have as much funding as they need, it can only provide the money in euros. The Fed's willingness to keep the swap window open ensures another important tool will be available to avoid a broader crisis.
irwinn@washpost.com schneiderh@washpost.com

event_or_fact.property: These swap lines are essentially the Fed's only available policy response to stresses involving the European sovereign debt crisis

description.hltext_display: Housing. Abitare in ambito rurale
description.content:
Il processo dell’urbanesimo delle campagne all’origine della modernità è prossimo alla sua conclusione; non perché la spinta alla concentrazione di popolazione nelle grandi aree metropolitane sia cessata ma perché sono venuti meno i processi socio/economici identificativi che distinguevano le collettività locali delle campagne dalle masse delle grandi città. I modelli di vita si sono uniformati in modo crescente e con essi i livelli di ricchezza, le modalità di produzione e consumo, la fruizione dello spazio pubblico.
Inserito da architetticom il giorno 22/12/2010 alle 9.49 - Voti: 1 - Commenti: 0

description.hltext_display: Cassidian opens Doha academy
description.content: Cassidian and the Ministry of Interior (Mol) of the State of Qatar have opened a jointly operated and expanded TETRA Academy in Doha. Established under the aegis of the Minister of State for Interior Affairs H.E. Sheikh Abdullah Bin Nasser Bin Khalifa Al Thani, it is the first of its kind in the Middle East. It is located at the brand new MoI Telecom Department.

description.hltext_display: INFLUENZA A: IN GRAN BRETAGNA CONTINUA A MIETERE VITTIME
description.content: 14 è il numero di vittime causate dal virus dellinfluenza A dallinizio dellinverno, 3 solo negli ultimi giorni. E con questi numeri che la Gran Bretagna si trova a fare i conti. Per Philip Monk, consulente della la Gran Bretagna si trova di fronte al peggior focolaio influenzale e virale degli ultimi 10 anni. I malati sono ancora tanti (ndr. secondo i media britannici sono quasi 200 le persone ricoverate nelle unita' di terapia intensiva, metà delle quali non presentano malattie pregresse) e soprattutto le persone più vulnerabili, come i bambini piccoli, purtroppo non guariranno. Le condizioni più gravi, al momento della pubblicazione della notizia, risultano essere quella di una 25enne, già madre di 4 bimbi e al quinto mese di gravidanza. Nelle prossime ore il compagno già avvertito dai medici dovrà decidere tra la vita della donna e quella del piccolo ancora non nato.

description.hltext_display: 金立手机：A696生活导航 细致服务体现智慧
description.content:
“金品质，立天下”，相信大家对这句话非常有印象。确实，金立手机一直强调品质，尤其在国产手机当中，是品质较为突出的品牌。
作为一款生活导航手机，金立A696的导航“品质”也格外让人眼前一亮，尤其是融合了很多综合信息的搜索和查询，提高了导航的准确性，也方便了导航的综合信息服务，可谓提升了导航“品质”。虽然不是带操作系统的智能机，但是A696体现了很有特点的智能特色。
在以往记者所使用过的手机导航中，导航很多只是提供简单的地图指引，其它的路标、路面等相关信息比较少。这样可能导致的一个问题是，导航会显得不够灵活，尤其是对于那些不怎么会看地图的人来说，可能不容易马上找到。
金立A696的导航在技术上修正了这个弊端。首先，它的导航地图信息量非常强大，据称包含了全国31个省和直辖市，333个地级市、865个辖区、2003个县市的数据，基本是涵盖了全国大部分的国土面积，各路信息都尽可能多地涵盖在其中，所以实用性非常强大，方便进行导航搜索。记者随意把老家的一个地址输入，便很快就找到了地址，而因为地点较小，此前一些手机的导航未必都能找到。
记者还注意到，A696的地图信息比较全面，可以把很多的信息，比如衣食住行的信息在地图里面。简单地说，可以解决“你要去哪儿”、“我该怎么去”、“带你过去”等问题。对于旅游、认路或者了解周边信息的用户来说，帮助会非常大。
基于这些信息，记者还留意到，在导航的输入方面，A696支持关键词搜索，比如首字母、交叉路口、门牌号码、周边查询、历史目的地等多种方式都可以进行搜索，如果地图没有更新，而所找的地方不在，还可以通过联网信息的方式进行检索。应当说，这大大增加了搜索的容易程度。
此外，特别值得一提的是，A696带了AGPS导航。AGPS导航在很多国产手机提供的搜索功能当中，还是比较少的，在诺基亚等外资品牌手机中则是比较多。简单地说，AGPS导航就是一种辅助导航技术。一般的GPS导航是利用卫星直接导航，但是在涵洞、隧道、桥梁等导航信号不是太理想的地方，AGPS就起到“辅助导航”的功能，通过移动信号基站的定位来帮助实现导航，因为基站本身就有GPS定位信息。
不过，值得注意的是，AGPS因为利用了基站的通信联络，因此会有一定的流量。当然，实测这种流量还是比较小的。对于已经开通了流量套餐的用户而言，流量可以说是微乎其微。

description.hltext_display: 上月領取綜援個案減少近千宗
Cats becoming too fat for cat flap!
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 21, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
A recent report by United Kingdom vets has shown the cats are steadily becoming so obese that in ten years time they will not be able to fit through the current standard size of cat flap. Some are arguing this change is a reflection of the society we live in with many having seen their owners pile on the pounds in recent times; obesity rates have certainly shot up in adults and more scarily children. Vets are warning that as many as half of all todays cats will be too fat for today's cat flap; the average cat by 2011 will weigh up to 20 pounds.
Current statistics show a third of all cats and dogs treated at veterinarian surgeries across the UK are already obese; the excess weight is already creating health problems for these animals. One of the most concerning aspect of this national problem is the fact the pet owners are oblivious to the plight of their animal; seventy percent of owners believe that their cat or dog has never been overweight although figures from vets show that this can not be true.
It has long been argued that pets grow to look like their owners; it is certainly unusual to see a trim and fit human being bring in an overweight animal in to a surgery. Like humans, cats and dogs lose confidence and as a result their health gradually starts to deteriorate.
Increasing the size of cat flaps to accommodate the increase in weight could be seen as a security concern as a relatively small adult or child could potentially fit through one. Several companies are already looking to solve this problem with a computer chip in the collar of the cat or a paw pad that will recognise the paw print to open the flap.

description.hltext_display: Damanaki takes first step in Iceland embargo
北汽纯电动车下线
description.content:
经济观察网 实习记者 陈晓伟 北汽集团首批30辆“北京”牌纯电动车日前正式下线，明年下半年北汽纯电动车将面向私人消费者进行销售。
首批下线的北京牌纯电动车有三款车型，其中，一款为基于萨博9-3整车技术研发的B级纯电动车Q60FB，另外两款为北汽自主品牌开发的A0级两厢电动车C30DB和纯电动微型客车M30RB，这些车辆将交付给北京市公安系统、首发租赁等5家单位进行试验运行。
同日，北汽与大洋电机组建的合资公司大洋电机科技有限公司也正式挂牌成立，该公司将为北汽新能源汽车提供电机及其控制系统。
按照规划，2015年，北汽集团旗下的北京汽车新能源汽车有限公司将实现整车业务年产15万辆、关键零部件年产超过33万套的规模。

description.hltext_display: Pak successfully test fires 'Ghauri Hataf-V' ballistic missile
description.content:
Pakistan has successfully test-fired its ballistic missile- Ghauri Hataf-V.
A spokesman for the Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR) stated that the missile is capable of carrying all kinds of warheads, Geo News reported.
The test-firing of Ghauri Hataf-V, which has a range of 1300 kilometers, was a normal experiment to identify its capability, it added.
Meanwhile, President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani have congratulated the Pakistan Army and the whole nation on the successful test-firing of the ballistic missile.
Earlier in March, Pakistan had reportedly test-fired a number of missiles and torpedoes, acquired from other countries, from ships and submarines in the Arabian Sea.
A statement issued by the Pakistan Navy had described the tests as 'successful', without disclosing much about the range or other technical details of the weapons fired.
"Pakistan navy fleet today tested its fire power in the north Arabian Sea to assess lethality, precision and efficacy of its weapon system," the statement said.
The tests included anti-surface missiles from an F-22P frigate, acquired recently from China, air-to-surface missiles from P-3C aircraft and sub surface-to-surface missiles from Agosta 90B submarines, which were bought from France. (ANI)

description.hltext_display: As ações mais castigadas e beneficiadas pela inflação
description.content:
Estudo do Itaú BBA mostra como a alta dos preços deve ter impacto sobre os diversos setores da bolsa
João Sandrini, de EXAME.com
foto 1/6
Tags:
Inflação, Bolsas, Aplicações financeiras
Comentários (0)
Para deixar um comentário você precisa se identificar. Escolha um dos tipos de identificação abaixo:
Fazer login com Abril ID ou Fazer login
com Facebook
Impacto será sentido pela maioria das empresas
A alta da inflação já se tornou uma realidade que investidor nenhum pode ignorar. Após um início de ano de preços sob controle, a alta dos últimos cinco meses surpreendeu o mercado e tem provocado uma série de revisões para cima nas expectativas inflacionárias. Não é possível prever que essa tendência se reverta já no começo de 2011 devido a ao menos quatro fatores: 1) o IGP-M fechará este ano acima de 11% e deverá pressionar o reajuste dos preços administrados no ano que vem; 2) os aluguéis e as mensalidades escolares devem continuar a subir acima da inflação devido à forte demanda; 3) o aumento dos preços do algodão fará a indústria têxtil repassar parte da alta dos custos aos consumidores; e 4) em um país que cresce a pleno emprego, os custos com mão de obra continuarão a subir. O Itaú BBA acredita que os preços continuarão pressionados em 2011, mas não haveria motivos para desespero. O Banco Central deve ser obrigado a elevar a taxa básica de juros em 1,50 ponto percentual e o IPCA deve fechar o próximo ano em 5,6%. Nas próximas páginas, a equipe de analistas da instituição, chefiada por Carlos Constantini, mostra quais setores serão mais ou menos afetados.

description.hltext_display: The Five Rules of Mobile Marketing
description.content:
Why Text message marketing must contain these 5 rules Text message marketing through a consumer cell phone is founded on the "concept of choice". This form of marketing is every business owners dream. Until SMS this type of consumer instant interaction was almost impossible.
The "concept of choice" means that your customer is proactive in their decision to receive your promotions. They have to opt-in to your program. They do this because they want to receive your promotions. In light of the fact that 90% of text messages are read and 95% of text messages are read in the first 4 – 6 minutes of receipt. You are virtually assured that your message will be read and decoded as a "Consistent with Expectation" message.
Mobile marketing through text messages is about creating long term consumer relationships. Relationships that provide value for your customer.
The 5 rules of Mobile Marketing
1) Promote your call to action
Every advertising venue you pursue must contain a call to action. You may have the best offers for your mobile subscribers to subscribe to. But if you don't promote them through your call to action for your mobile campaigns no one will know about them. Your call to action must be on
all your promotional material. Twitter, table tent cards, direct mail, news paper ads, facebook and every employee hawking your latest mobile marketing efforts to every customer. Etc...
2) When they sign up – Reward Them
People love to be rewarded just ask someone who has lost a dog. A cell phone number is the most sacred thing second only to a Social Security Number. Sometimes all it takes is a small reward via a bounce back message with an instant coupon to convince someone to become a new subscriber. If your a coffee shop you might use " Text VipCoffee to 68039" to join our vip mobile list and receive an instant coupon. The skies the limit. Rewarding them for opting in will increase your opt-in rate.
3) Don't send messages every day
You will maintain Mobile Marketings best practices and have a higher redemption rate if you don't text message your customers every day. Text messages should only be sent once a week less if possible. More then once a week and you need to have a very good reason. You want to create an atmosphere of anticipation. One where you customers know that if they don't respond to your message they might miss a great deal. And also that another great deal wont be arriving anytime soon. Make your messages time relevant. Come in by 3:00pm today and get! Create urgency about redemption.
4) Make you Opt-ins feel special
Be sure to send great offers to your opt-ins. Offers only they can receive because they are VIP opt-in members. Reward them for taking the time to opt-in to your program. Offers only available via their cell phone. Do it this way and watch your opt-ins and redemptions grow through the roof.
5) Let your customers spread the word
Be sure to include at the end of every message "FWD to a Friend" People love to share a great deal they have found.
Follow these 5 rules and watch your mobile marketing ROI soar and your mobile database grow. Todays marketing needs to follow a multi channel marketing approach. Mobile marketing allows you to position yourself with a USP "Unique Selling Proposition" a unique and growing way to connect to your customers through cell phones as well as social networks.
When using mobile marketing it is vital to respect a wireless subscriber's right to privacy. Always gain permission from the people you plan to engage by employing an opt-in procedure. Always have a clear explanation of your marketing intent."If you are going to text them, tell them etc.."
In the use of ANY text advertising campaign, a clear and concise disclaimer must be used to inform the customer that they are joining a multi-channel communication network and by opting-in they are going to receive text messages from you. But only messages "consistent with expectation" No Spam or marginally relevant text, email, etc…. Gaining permission saves money. Each message sent costs money, so ensuring the customer wants to receive messages avoids any waste of your marketing budget.
Following these simple guidelines ensures a long and prosperous future for mobile marketing. Be sure to read Mobile Marketings "Mobile Marketings Best Practices".

description.hltext_display: Lindsay gets violent!
金立手机：提升用户应用体验 金立加速前进
description.content:
中国移动互联网用户增速在不断增加，手机网民规模的迅速增长体现了用户需求的集体转向，催生了手机社交应用、手机音乐下载、手机电视等内容服务的出现。索爱、三星等国际品牌都先后跟进内容服务，推出了与SNS网站合作的社交手机，诺基亚则宣布将重心转向加速健全手机网络内容服务，朝手机“网络对策”营运商迈进。
对于注重提高性价比的国产手机来说，提升用户应用体验之路是势在必行，也是与洋品牌一较高下的利器。从2006年的音乐手机、拍照手机到现在的智能手机、3G手机，国产手机厂商在提升用户体验上的努力一方面促成了MP3、拍照等全民普及效应的新应用，一方面也成为新一轮手机创新最重要的驱动力。伴随时代发展，以优化用户体验为导向的手机浪潮从未停止向前。
金立董事长兼总裁表示“要提升用户体验，增强手机的内容服务不只是手机终端企业一方努力就可以实现的，它需要运营商、内容服务提供商、传统产业等多方的全面融合。”联想、海信、TCL等就将与淘宝网合作推出内置支付宝等软件的3G手机，以更为个性化内容服务满足用户需求。金立的3G终端也会着力在内容服务方面发力，以实用又好用的产品改善目前TD终端用户体验不佳的现状。”

description.hltext_display: FTSE 100 edges higher in early trade
description.content:
The FTSE 100 rose marginally in early trade today after advancing 1% on Tuesday.
Royal Bank of Scotland (LON:RBS) led the blue chips with a 4.5% gain.
Mining major Anglo American rose 4.2%.
Cruise operator Carnival Corp (LON:CCL) and miner Xstrata (LON:XTA) advanced 3.7% and 3.5% respectively.
Temporary power provider Aggreko (LON:AGK) was the heaviest faller in the FTSE 100 with a 2.9% loss.
Gold producer Randgold Resources (LON:RRS) lost 2%.
Oil and gas companies Cairn Energy (LON:CNE) and BG Group (LON:BG) shed just over 1%.
In Asia, China’s Shanghai Composite Index declined 0.9% and Japan’s Nikkei 225 dropped 0.25%, while Hong Kong’s Hang Seng and South Korea’s KOSPI held steady.
Australia’s S&P/ASX 200 tacked on 0.15%.
US stocks were on the rise yesterday.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 0.45%, the S&P 500 index advanced 0.5% and the NASDAQ composite rose 0.7%.
Updates on existing home sales and the house price index will be out in the US today.
Commodities
Oil prices rose with US light, sweet crude for February climbing to US$90.12/barrel.
Gold and silver reached US$1,389/oz and US$29.37/oz.
Copper held steady at US$4.24/lb and nickel rose to US$11.14/lb.

description.hltext_display: Traffic advisory for Highway 178
description.content:
Officials with Cal Trans say Highway 178 remains closed in the Kern River Canyon due to a rock slide covering the entire roadway.
Cal Trans estimates the roadway will possibly open December 31, 2010.
Drivers are advised to use an alternate route.

description.hltext_display: [社论]韩安全外交应在中俄身上找突破口
description.content:
在因韩国军队重启延坪岛射击演习而出现的紧张局势下，韩国被北韩刺中软肋的不是前线，而是外交。北韩邀请美国新墨西哥州州长比尔-理查森访北，转达了接受国际原子能机构（IAEA）核查人员重返北韩的意愿，在俄罗斯的要求下召开的联合国安理会紧急会议上，主要议题不是北韩炮击延坪岛，而是韩国军队重启演习的问题。经过一番精心部署后，北韩20日倒打一耙，大言不惭地宣称：“世界应该很清楚谁是真正的和平守护者，谁是真正的战争挑衅者。”
韩国的外交班子应该反思一下，在北韩开展这种本末倒置的外交工作的过去一个月里，韩方为在外交舞台上惩罚北韩这种反国际法、反民族、反人伦的突袭行为做出了哪些努力、取得了哪些成果。
俄罗斯外长14日对访问莫斯科的北韩外务相指责称：“对南韩领土发动炮击的行为应当受到谴责。”于是，韩国外交部便认为俄罗斯的立场和中国不同，并将其视为外交成果。但18日，俄罗斯要求联合国安理会召开紧急会议，使不希望在安理会讨论延坪岛炮击问题的韩国没有如愿以偿。俄罗斯似乎认为，上一次指责了北韩炮击行为，所以这一次应该站在北韩一边才能维持平衡态度。首尔的外交领导班子和韩国驻莫斯科大使馆丝毫没有察觉到俄罗斯的这一意图。可以说，韩国外交班子没有抓住先发制人的机会，反而遭到北韩当头一棒。
中美两国关系同时具有竞争与合作特点。在这种情况下，仅依靠韩国独立的外交力量很难有效解决日益突出的韩半岛问题。然而，中国特使戴秉国访问韩国只引发了外交失礼风波，没有取得任何成果，这彻底暴露了韩国外交的无能为力。
北韩因天安舰爆炸沉没事件和延坪岛炮击事件遭到国际舆论的谴责，但并未受到孤立，韩半岛局势变成了韩国、美国、日本与北韩、中国、俄罗斯对峙的冷战格局，这让韩国在外交上束手无策。但是，中国和俄罗斯的外交是和超越外交战术领域的韩国国家战略密切相连的。
韩国可以以韩美同盟为战略基本点，向中国发出“韩国不会成为包围中国的一个翅膀”的信号，消除中国的担忧。在与俄罗斯的关系上，可以在经济方面加上政治考虑，使利益不倾斜于某一方，实现双赢。在对中、对俄外交的僵局下寻求突破口现在已和构建完美的对北军事应对态势一样，成为韩国安全领域的最重要课题。 朝鲜日报中文网 chn.chosun.com 本文内容归朝鲜日报和朝鲜日报网版权所有，未经许可，不得摘编

description.hltext_display: 高校女子ソフトボール部に密着 ３０日・フジ系
文化庁芸術祭賞発表、異色の電脳声楽アンサンブル作品『モノ=ポリ』がレコード部門で優秀賞受賞！
description.content:
12月22日(水)16時32分配信 文化庁芸術祭賞が12月21日に発表されました。芸術祭賞は、演劇、音楽、舞踊、大衆芸能などの公演、テレビ・ドラマ、テレビ・ドキュメンタリー、ラジオ、レコードといった芸術作品の中から、高い独創性や企画性を基準として審査を行ない、8部門の対象を決定するものです。
各部門賞のうち、レコード部門としては4作品が受賞。大賞は『二世豊竹古靱太夫(山城少掾)義太夫名演集』、優秀賞は『モノ=ポリ』、『ブクステフーデ：ヴァイオリン、ヴィオラ・ダ・ガンバとチェンバロのためのソナタ』、『柴田南雄とその時代第一期』です。
なかでも松平敬による『モノ=ポリ』は異色のコンセプトで話題を呼んだ作品。すべて1人の声だけによる多重録音で、究極のワンマン・アカペラ=電脳声楽アンサンブルを作り上げた驚愕のアルバムです。“カノン”をテーマに、マショーからリゲティ、ケージまでを選曲、そのこだわりの配列にも注目です。
『ブクステフーデ：ヴァイオリン、ヴィオラ・ダ・ガンバとチェンバロのためのソナタ』は桐山建志（vn）、風早一恵（Vg）、平井み帆（hc）によるアンサンブル作品。バッハ以前のドイツ・バロック音楽において重要な作曲家の1人であるブクステフーデの室内楽の集大成です。
『柴田南雄とその時代第一期』は、作曲家、音楽学者、評論家として活躍した柴田の作品を4枚のCDと2枚のDVDにまとめた大作。戦後間もない最初期の弦楽四重奏曲から70年代の電子音の作品、87年の合唱作品までを収録した貴重なセットです。
いずれも“ほかでは誰もやらない”独創的かつ資料的にも貴重な企画のアルバムが揃いました。ぜひチェックしてみてください！

description.hltext_display: hotels.com revela qué prefieren los viajeros para comer durante l...
description.content:
hotels.com revela qué prefieren los viajeros para comer durante las vacaciones
Restaurantes. Noticias hispánicas
Nuevo estudio descubre que la cocina italiana se impone por mayorí­a indiscutida
DALLAS, 21 de diciembre de 2010 /PRNewswire-HISPANIC PR WIRE/ -- Marinara y mozzarella es lo que los viajeros estadounidenses prefieren durante su desplazamiento, según la encuesta más reciente del proveedor lí­der de alojamiento en todo el mundo, hotels.com®.
La encuesta se basó en los hábitos de alimentación de los viajeros, incluidas las selecciones de cocina regional, planes de alimentación versus exploración de restaurantes locales, y la gastronomí­a básica para viajes en carretera, resacas y nostalgia del hogar: las cadenas de comida rápida estadounidense.
"Los viajeros aventureros salen a la suerte cuando eligen restaurantes y una gastronomí­a desconocida durante su viaje", señala Taylor L.
Cole, APR, director de relaciones públicas y medios sociales para hotels.com.
"Se trate de tapas en España o de burritos al sur de la frontera, probar suerte en un restaurante ubicado fuera de la ruta conocida puede ser motivo de muchas satisfacciones para los viajeros, aunque también puede ser motivo de grandes decepciones.
Mantenerse dentro de lo que uno conoce parece una tendencia popular dentro de los viajeros estadounidenses menos aventureros".
Viajeros Estadounidenses son Selectivos en Cuanto a Gastronomí­a
La encuesta descubrió que casi dos tercios de los viajeros tienen por principio probar la gastronomí­a local durante su viaje.
Sólo el seis por ciento de los encuestados respondió que no probarí­a fuera de la ruta conocida y que sólo comerí­a alimentos que ya conocen.
De los encuestados, el 13 por ciento ni siquiera está dispuesto a probar la cocina local en absoluto.
El veintinueve por ciento eligió un destino a causa de su gastronomí­a, y el 18 por ciento prefiere comer en una cadena de comida rápida estadounidense en vez de un restaurante local.
Planificar o No Planificar la Comida: Esa es la Cuestión
La carne, los huevos y el queso son los elementos básicos de un verdadero desayuno estadounidense; muchos hoteles internacionales sirven desayunos "estilo americano" como una opción de plan de alimentación, que a menudo se incluye en el precio de la habitación.
La encuesta de hotels.com reveló que más de 40 por ciento de los viajeros estadounidenses prefieren el plan de alimento de desayuno, mientras que solo siete por ciento busca una opción con todo incluido.
El treinta y seis por ciento de los viajeros encuestados busca mercados y restaurantes locales en vez de optar por el plan de alimentación del hotel.

hotels.com es la manera más conveniente para viajar que ofrece welcomerewards®, un programa lí­der en la industria que premia la lealtad del usuario; las opiniones reales de otros pasajeros capturadas en más de 1.5 millones de Guest Reviews y; una Price Match Guarantee, para que las reservaciones con hotels.com sean una garantí­a de que se obtiene el mejor precio, sea por Internet o hablando directamente con un experto en viajes en 1-800-2-HOTELS disponible las 24 horas del dí­a.

description.hltext_display: 日本映画専門チャンネル 昭和の東京、ロケ地散策
Dangdang to diversify from books, plans expansion
description.content:
HONG KONG - Online retailer Dangdang Inc, considered as China's answer to Amazon.com, aims for sales of general merchandise to exceed that of books and other media as it diversifies in the highly competitive e-commerce sector.
Media products, including books and DVDs, make up about 84 percent of Dangdang's sales, with the remainder from other consumer products such as cosmetics, furniture, shoes and toys.
"There is no doubt that sales from general merchandise are going to rise faster than books, and will eventually exceed books," co-founder and Chairwoman Peggy Yu told Reuters via telephone in Beijing on Wednesday.
Yu also said the company had no plans to tap overseas markets, but would focus on China, where its 1.3 billion population is becoming increasingly affluent on the back of strong economic growth.
"It's hard to find another massive market like China where there is one language and a common consumer culture, apart from the United States in the 50s and 60s," she said. "If we can serve mainland customers really well, our business will have many years of development."
Dangdang shares have fallen by almost 30 percent since hitting a closing high of $32.79 days after its trading debut on December 8, as concern over its competitiveness in China's highly fragmented e-commerce sector.

description.hltext_display: LRF varnar för skoterskador
中信集团如愿获CBD“� �王” 将建北京第一高楼
description.content:
经济观察网 记者 周亚霖 昨天下午，中信集团终于如愿以偿，打败了海航和万达，以63亿取得CBD 六地块“标王”Z15地块。
该地块是此次出让的CBD六地块中规划建筑面积最大的一幅，高达35万平方米。依据招标文件的要求，该地块上将建成未来“北京第一高楼”，建筑高度达500米，远超当前北京最高建筑国贸三期的高度330米。
中信集团通过两个阶段的评标获得了该地块，且一开始就是势在必得。
在第一阶段对12幅地块方案设计的评标中，中信集团获得5个地块设计方案的评比第一。其中包括第二轮先期出让六地块中的Z15及Z14地块。而为了稳妥起见，中信集团后来选择放弃Z14，专攻Z15。至第二轮投标，Z15项目仅余万达、海航两家与中信竞标，由第一轮26家企业减缩为3家，中信报价63亿，海航集团报价59亿元。而万达在12月7日的第二轮投标中以45亿元低于底价直接出局。
据中信地产的一位内部人士表示：“中信集团提交的设计方案名为‘中国尊’，尊是一种古代礼器。意为敬奉，起时双手捧至顶，行顶天立地之势。按照目前的设计，这一建筑地下4层、地上118层，容纳办公、公寓、酒店三大功能，地下则会有商业，与CBD其他地块的环形商业空间和连接地铁的步行环廊连通。大厦顶部的几个楼层设置了开放特色餐厅和酒吧，最高层的顶部则为全玻璃幕墙。”
另外， 11家企业组成的联合体，（由正大置地、正大集团、卜蜂国际、上海帝泰、正大制药投资、中山凯茵、玖龙纸业、华康资本、金光纸业、上海世茂和华侨凤凰）以41亿拍得Z14地块。

description.hltext_display: Stato - Mafia
description.content:
Alla domanda se l’Italia è uno stato in cui ogni individuo può essere considerato libero, la risposta più comune sarebbe un misto di stupore e di sorpresa. Certo, siamo nel 2010, e la maggior parte del popolo italiano, ogni persona, ogni cittadino si sente libero. Forse però bisognerebbe analizzare certi aspetti. In Italia la prima “azienda” per fatturato è la Mafia. E’ stato calcolato che la Mafia S.P.A. nel 2009 fattura all’incirca 135 miliardi di euro, di cui 78 di utile. Cifre da capogiro! Sicuramente potremmo farci una buona manovra finanziaria se potessimo disporre , non dico di tutta , di una parte di questa cifra. Se la metà del loro fatturato proviene dalla droga, significa che inevitabilmente il resto proviene da: usura , estorsioni , eco-reati , appalti , forniture e contraffazione. L’inquinamento dell’economia made in italy è evidente. Forse un giorno esisterà il made in camorra…o il made in mafia come marchio di qualità e di provenienza del prodotto, altro che made in
Inserito da oniscire il giorno 22/12/2010 alle 9.49 - Voti: 1 - Commenti: 0
